U dar dunjo va oxirat zijon kardaast. In hamon zijoni oskor ast
[Insoni kofir] Ba coji Alloh taolo cizero mexonad, ki na ʙa u zijone merasonad va na sude meʙaxsad. In hamon gumrohii duru daroz ast
U kasero mexonad, ki qat'an, zijonas nazdiktar az sudas meʙosad va ci ʙad dust va ci ʙad hamdame ast

Be tardid, Alloh taolo kasonero, ki imon ovardaand va korhoe soista ancom dodaand, ʙa ʙoƣhoe [az ʙihist] vorid mekunad, ki cujʙorho az zeri [daraxtoni] on cori ast. Ba rosti, Alloh taolo on ciro, ki mexohad, ancom medihad

Kase, ki gumon mekunad, ki Alloh taolo u [pajomʙar]-ro dar dunjo va oxirat hargiz jori naxohad kard [va aknun himojati Allohro meʙinad va xasmgin ast], pas, ʙojad resmone ʙa saqf [-i xonaas] ʙijovezad va [xudro dor ʙizanad, to rohi nafas]-ro qat' kunad [va to sarhadi marg pes ravad], on goh ʙingarad, ki ojo [in guna fandu] najrangi u xasmasro az mijon meʙarad
Va ʙad-in guna Mo in [Qur'on]-ro [ʙa surati] ojote ravsan nozil kardem va Alloh taolo har kiro xohad, hidojat mekunad

Kasone, ki imon ovardaand va kasone, ki jahudi sudand va soʙeon [fitratgarojon] va masehijon va zartustijon va kasone, ki sirk varzidand, jaqinan, ruzi qijomat Alloh taolo mijonason dovari mekunad. Be gumon, Alloh taolo ʙar har cize guvoh ast

Ojo nadidi, ki har ki dar osmonho va har ki dar zamin ast va xursed va mohu sitoragon va kuhho va daraxton va cunʙandagon va ʙisjore az mardum ʙaroi Alloh taolo sacda mekunand? Va ʙisjore niz hastand, ki [dar naticai sarpeci az parastis farmoni] azoʙ ʙar onon tahaqquq joftaast va har ki Alloh taolo xoras sozad, kase giromias namedorad. Be tardid, Alloh taolo har ci ʙixohad ancom medihad

In du [guruhi mu'min va kofir] dusmanoni jakdigarand va dar ʙorai Parvardigorason sitez mekunand. Pas kasone, ki kufr varzidand, ʙarojason comahoe az otas ʙuridaand [va] az ʙoloi sarason [ʙar onon] oʙi cuson merezand
On ci dar darunason hast va [niz] pusthojason ʙo on gudoxta mesavad
Va ʙarojason gurzhoi ohanin [muhajjo] ast
Har goh ʙixohand, az [siddati] anduh az on co [duzax] xoric savand, ʙa on ʙozgardonda mesavand va [ʙa onon gufta mesavad]: «Azoʙi suzonro ʙicased»

Be tardid, Alloh taolo kasonero, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand, ʙa ʙoƣhoe [az ʙihist] vorid mekunad, ki az zeri [daraxtoni] on cujʙorho cori ast. Dar on co ʙa dastaʙandahoe az tillo va marvorid orosta mesavand va liʙosason dar on co aʙresim ast
Va [dar dunjo] ʙa suji guftori pok [tavhidu takʙir] hidojat mesavand va ʙa rohi sutuda [islom] rohnamoi mekardand

Be gumon, kasone, ki kufr varzidand va [monandi mocaroi Hudajʙija mardumro] az rohi Alloh taolo ʙozmedorand [azoʙe dardnok dar pes dorand] va Mascidu-l-harom, ki onro ʙaroi mardum [qiʙla va iʙodatgoh] qaror dodem, muqimu musofir dar on jaksonand va har ki dar on co ʙo sitamgori [va gunoh] inhirof ʙixohad, az azoʙe dardnok ʙa u mecasonem

Va [jod kun az] on goh ki mahalli xona [-i Ka'ʙa]-ro ʙaroi Iʙrohim ta'jin kardem [va guftem], ki: «Cizero sariki Man qaror nadeh va xonaamro ʙaroi tavofkunandagon va qijomkunandagon va ruku'kunandagon [va] cacdakunandagon pok gardon
Va ʙajni mardum ʙaroi [adoi] hac nido ʙideh, to pijoda va [savor] ʙar har [vasilai safar jo] suturi loƣare az har rohi dure ʙa sujat ʙijojand

To sohidi manofei [gunoguni] xes ʙosand va dar ruzhoe muajjan [ʙa hangomi qurʙoni] nomi Allohro ʙar cahorpojone, ki ʙa onon ruzi dodaem, jod kunand. Pas, az [gusti] on ʙixured va ʙa darmondai tihidast [niz] ƣizo ʙidihed
Sipas ʙojad oludagihojasonro ʙartaraf sozand va ʙa nazrhoi xes vafo kunand va [girdogirdi] in xonai kuhan [Ka'ʙa] tavof kunand

[Ahkom va manosiki hac] In ast va har ki [muharramot va] muqarraroti ilohiro ʙuzurg dorad, in [kor] nazdi Parvardigoras ʙaroi u ʙehtar ast va [ej mardum] cahorpojone ʙaroi [masrafi] sumo halol sudaast, magar on ci [hukmas] ʙar sumo xonda mesavad. Pas, az ʙuthoi palid duri kuned va az guftori ʙotil [va duruƣ] ictinoʙ namoed

Dar hole ki [ʙandai muxlisi Alloh taolo va] haqgaro ʙosed va ʙa U sirk navarzed va har ki ʙa Alloh taolo sirk varzad, cunon ast, ki gui az osmon furu aftad va murƣoni [sikori] vajro ʙiraʙojand va ʙod uro ʙa coje dur ʙijandozad
[Hukmi hac] In ast va har ki dasturhoi dini va ilohiro ʙuzurg ʙismorad, jaqinan, in [ʙuzurgdost nisonae] az parhezkorii dilhost
Dar on [cahorpojoni viƶai qurʙoni] to zamoni muajjan [hangomi zaʙh] ʙaroi sumo manofe' [va ʙahrahoe] ast. Pas, qurʙongohi onho xonai kuhani [Ka'ʙa] ast

Va ʙaroi har ummate oine [dar qurʙoni kardan] qaror dodem, to nomi Allohro [vaqti zaʙh] ʙar cahorpojone, ki ruziason kardaast, zikr kunand. Pas, ma'ʙudi sumo ma'ʙudi jagona ast. [Hama] Dar ʙaroʙari U taslim ʙosed va [ej pajomʙar, xajri dunjo va oxiratro] ʙa furutanon ʙasorat ʙideh

[Hamon] Kasone, ki cun nomi Alloh taolo ʙurda savad, dilhojason metarsad va [kasone, ki] dar ʙaroʙari musiʙathoe, ki ʙa eson merasad, sikeʙo hastand va onon, ki namozguzorand va az on ci ruzison kardaem, infoq mekunand

[Qurʙoni kardani] sutur [va gov dar mavsimi hac]-ro ʙaroi sumo az saoiri din [va nisonahoi iʙodati Alloh taolo] qaror dodem. Dar in [kor] ʙarojaton xajr [-u ʙarakat] ast. Pas, [hangomi qurʙoni] dar hole ki [suturon] ʙar po istodaand, nomi Allohro ʙar onho ʙiʙared [va nahrason kuned]. On goh cun ʙar xok aftodand, az [gusti] onho ʙixured va tihidastoni oʙrumand va gadojonro niz taom dihed. Onho [cahorpojon]-ro incunin ʙa xidmati sumo gumostem, ʙosad, ki sipos guzored

Gustu xuni in qurʙoniho hargiz ʙa Alloh taolo namerasad, ʙalki parhezkorii sumost, ki ʙa U merasad. U onhoro incunin ʙa xidmati sumo gumost, to Allohro ʙa [sukronai] on ki sumoro hidojat kardaast, ʙa ʙuzurgi jod kuned va nakukoronro [ʙa xajru rastagori] ʙasorat ʙideh
Alloh taolo az kasone, ki imon ovardaand, hatman, [dar ʙaroʙari dusmanonason] difo' mekunad. Be tardid, Alloh taolo hec xijonatkori nosiposero dust namedorad
Ba kasone, ki [musrikon] ʙo onon cangidaand, icozat [-i cihod] doda sudaast, caro ki sitam didaand va jaqinan, Alloh taolo ʙar joriason tavonost

[Hamon] Kasone, ki ʙa nohaq az dijorason ronda sudand, [va gunohe nadostand] cuz in ki meguftand: «Parvardigori mo Alloh taolo ast». Va agar Alloh taolo [zulmu kufri] ʙarxe az mardumro ʙa vasilai ʙarxe digar daf' namekard, savmaaho[-i rohiʙon] va maoʙid [-i masehijon] va iʙodatgohho [-i jahudijon] va masocide, ki nomi Alloh taolo dar onon ʙisjor ʙurda mesavad, hatman, vajron megardid. Va Alloh taolo kasero, ki [dini] Uro jori dihad, jaqinan, jori mekunad. Be tardid, Alloh taolo qudratmandi sikastnopazir ast

[Hamon] Kasone, ki har goh dar zamin ʙa onon qudrat [va hukumat] ʙiʙaxsem, namoz ʙarpo medorand va zakot mepardozand va [mardumro] ʙa neki farmon medihand va az nopisand ʙozmedorand. Va sarancomi korho az oni Alloh taolo ast
[Ej pajomʙar] Agar [in qavmi ʙutparast] turo duruƣgu meangorand, [sikeʙo ʙos] hatman, pes az onon qavmi Nuh va Od va Samud [niz pajomʙaronasonro] duruƣgu meangostand
Va [hamcunin] qavmi Iʙrohim va qavmi Lut

Va ashoʙi Madjan [Suajʙro duruƣgu medonistand] va Muso [niz tavassuti fir'avnijon] duruƣgu xonda sud. Pas, ʙa kofiron muhlat dodam, on goh ononro [ʙa azoʙ] furu giriftam. Pas, [ʙingar, ki naticai] inkori [ojot va mucozoti] Man ci guna ʙuvad

Ci ʙisjor sahrhoero, ki [cun mardumas kofiru] sitamgor ʙudand, noʙudason kardem va [inak] saqfhojas furu rextaast va ci ʙisjor coh [-ho]-i matruk va qasr [-ho]-i ustuvor [va ʙosukuh, ki sokinonasro az azoʙi ilohi nacot nadod]

Ojo onon dar zamin gardis nakardaand, to dilhoe dosta ʙosand, ki [haqiqatro] ʙo on darjoʙand jo gushoe, ki [axʙori guzastagonro] ʙo on ʙisnavand? Ba rosti, tanho casmho nest, ki noʙino megardad, ʙalki dilhoe, ki dar sinahost [ʙeʙasirat gasta va ʙaroi didani haq] noʙino mesavad

[Ej Pajomʙar, kofiron] ʙa sitoʙ az tu darxosti azoʙ mekunand va Alloh taolo hargiz va'daasro xilof namekunad va dar voqe', jak ruz [az azoʙi oxirat] nazdi Parvardigorat ʙo hazor sol, ki sumo mesumored, jakson ast
Va ci ʙisjor [aholii] sahrhoe, ki ʙa onon muhlat dodam, dar hole ki sitamgor ʙudand [ammo ʙoz ham sarpeci kardand], pas, ononro [ʙa azoʙ] furu giriftam va ʙozgast [-i hama] ʙa sui Man ast
Bigu: «Ej mardum, cuz in nest, ki man ʙaroi sumo ʙimdihandae oskoram»
Pas, kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand, omurzisu ruzii nek [dar pes] dorand
Va kasone, ki dar [rohi inkor va takziʙi] ojoti Mo mekusand, to [ʙa pindori xes] Moro darmonda kunand, onon ahli duzaxand

Va [Mo] hec rasul va pajomʙarero pes az tu nafiristodem, magar in ki cun [ojoti ilohiro] tilovat mekard, sajton dar tilovatas [kalimoti istiʙoh] ilqo mekard. On goh Alloh taolo on ciro, ki sajton ilqo namuda ʙud, az mijon meʙurd va sipas ojoti xesro ustuvor mesoxt va Alloh taolo donoi hakim ast

To [ʙad-in vasila Alloh taolo] on ciro, ki sajton ilqo mekunad, ʙaroi kasone, ki dar dilhojason ʙemori [sakku nifoq] ast va [hamcunin ʙaroi] sangdilon vasilai ozmois qaror dihad. Va jaqinan, sitamgoron [-i musrik] dar dusmanii duru daroze [ʙo Alloh taolo va pajomʙaras] hastand

Va to kasone, ki donis joftaand, ʙidonand, ki in [Qur'on] haq ast [va] az coniʙi Parvardigori tust va ʙa on imon ʙijovarand va dilhojason ʙarojas [narmu] furutan gardad; va ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo kasonero, ki imon ovardaand, ʙa rohi rost hidojat mekunad
Kasone, ki kufr varzidand, hamvora dar mavridi on [ci dar Qur'on nozil kardaem] tardid dorand, to on goh ki nogahon qijomat faro rasad jo azoʙi ruzi ʙexajru rahmat ʙar onon [furud] ojad
Dar on ruz farmonravoi az oni Alloh taolo ast [va] mijoni onon dovari mekunad. Pas kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand, dar ʙoƣhoi purne'mat [-i ʙihist] hastand
Va kasone, ki kufr varzidand va ojoti Moro duruƣ angostand, azoʙi xorkunandae [dar pes] dorand
Va kasone, ki dar rohi Alloh taolo hicrat kardand, sipas kusta sudand jo vafot kardand, jaqinan Alloh taolo ʙa onon ruzii nakue medihad. Ba rosti, ki Alloh taolo ʙehtarin ruzidihanda ast
Be tardid, ononro ʙa cojgohe vorid mekunad, ki az on xusnud ʙosand va ʙa rosti, ki Alloh taolo donoi ʙurdʙor ast

In ast [hukmi ilohi dar ʙorai kofir va mu'min] va har kas ʙa hamon miqdor, ki ʙa u sitam sudaast, mucozot kunad, sipas [ʙoz] mavridi sitam qaror girad, Alloh taolo jorias xohad kard. Be tardid, Alloh taolo ʙaxsandai omurzanda ast
In [jorii mazlumon] az on rust, ki Alloh taolo [ʙar har kore tavonost; cunon ki] saʙro dar ruz mekasonad va ruzro dar saʙ darmeovarad; va ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo sunavoi ʙinost
In ʙad-on saʙaʙ ast, ki Alloh taolo haq ast va on ciro, ki [musrikon] cuz u mexonand, [hama] ʙotil ast va Alloh taolo ʙalandmartaʙai ʙuzurg ast
Ojo nadidi, ki Alloh taolo az osmon oʙe furu firistod va zamin [ʙar asari on xurramu] sarsaʙz megardad? Be tardid, Alloh taolo ʙorikʙini ogoh ast
On ci dar osmonho va zamin ast, az oni Ust va ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo ʙenijozi sutuda ast

Ojo nadidi, ki Alloh taolo on ciro dar zamin ast, ʙa xidmati sumo gumostaast va kistiho ʙa farmonas dar darjo ravonand va osmonro nigah medorad, ki cuz ʙa icozati U ʙar zamin naaftad. Be tardid, Alloh taolo [nisʙat] ʙa mardum dilsuzi mehruʙon ast
Va Ust, ki sumoro zinda kard, sipas memironad va on goh [ʙori digar] zinda mekunad. Ba rosti, ki inson [nisʙat ʙa ne'mathoi ilohi] ʙisjor nosipos ast

Baroi har ummate oine muqarrar kardaem, ki ʙa on amal kunand, pas, [ej pajomʙar, pajravoni soiri adjon] naʙojad ʙo tu dar in amr sitez kunand. Ba rohi Parvardigorat da'vat kun, [caro ki] tu jaqinan, ʙar [oini durust va] rohi rost qaror dori
Va agar [dar ʙorai haqqonijati din] ʙo tu mucodala kardand, pas, ʙigu: «Alloh taolo ʙa on ci ancom medihed, donotar ast
Alloh taolo ruzi qijomat dar mavridi on ci dar ʙoraas ixtilof mekarded, mijonaton dovari mekunad»
Ojo nadonistai, ki Alloh taolo on ciro dar osmon va zamin ast medonad? Be gumon [hamai] inho dar kitoʙe [saʙt] ast. Musallaman, in [kor] ʙar Alloh taolo oson ast

Va [musrikon] ʙa coji Alloh taolo cizero meparastand, ki hec dalele ʙar [haqqonijati] on nozil nakardaast va ʙad-on ogohi [va sinoxte niz] nadorand va sitamgoron [-i musrik dar ʙaroʙari azoʙi ilohi] hec jorikunandae nadorand

Va hangome ki ojoti ravsani Mo ʙar onon xonda mesavad, dar cehrai kasone, ki kufr varzidaand, [osori karohat va] noxusojandi meʙini. Nazdik ast ʙa kasone, ki ojoti Moro ʙarojason mexonand, hamlavar savand. [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa kofiron] Bigu: «Ojo sumoro ʙa ʙadtar az in [ki dar intizoraton ast] xaʙar diham? Otas [-i duzax] ast, ki Alloh taolo onro ʙa kasone, ki kufr varzidand, va'da dodast va ci ʙad sarancomest!»

Ej mardum, [dar ʙorai notavonii ʙutho] masale zada sudaast, pas, ʙa on gus dihed: Kasonero, ki ʙa coji Alloh taolo [ʙa parastis] mexoned, hargiz nametavonand magasero ʙijofarinand, hatto agar [hamagi] ʙaroi in [kor] cam' savand. Va agar on magas cize az onon ʙiraʙojad, nametavonand onro ʙozpas girand. [Ore] Xostor va xosta [ʙut va magas] har du notavonand
[Onon] Allohro cunon ki sazovori [ʙuzurgdosti] Ust, nasinoxtaand. Be tardid, Alloh taolo nerumandi sikastnopazir ast

Alloh taolo az mijoni faristagon firistodagone [ʙaroi iʙloƣi vahj ʙa pajomʙaron] ʙarmeguzinad va az mijoni insonho niz [pajomʙarone ʙaroi rasonidani pajomi ilohi ʙa mardum intixoʙ mekunad]. Be tardid, Alloh taolo sunavoi ʙinost
U ojanda va guzastai ononro medonad va [hamai] korho ʙa Alloh taolo ʙozgardonda mesavad
Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, ruku' kuned va sacda guzored va Parvardigoratonro ʙiparasted va kori nek ancom dihed, ʙosad, ki rastagor saved

Va dar rohi Alloh taolo – cunon ki sazovori cihod [dar rohi] Ust – cihod kuned. U sumoro ʙarguzid va dar din ʙarojaton hec saxti [va tangnoe] qaror nadod. Oini padaraton Iʙrohim [niz cunin ʙud]. U [Alloh taolo] pes az in [dar kitoʙhoi osmonii guzasta] va dar in [Qur'on] sumoro musulmon nomid, to pajomʙar ʙar [iʙloƣi pajomas ʙa] sumo guvoh ʙosad va sumo [niz] ʙar mardum guvoh ʙosed [ki hamai pajomʙaron pajomi ilohiro ʙa qavmi xud rasonidaand]. Pas, namoz ʙarpo dored va zakot ʙipardozed va ʙa Alloh taolo panoh ʙiʙared [va ʙar U tavakkal kuned], ki U [dustu] korsozi sumost. Pas, ci naku korsozu ci nek jovarest
Ba rosti, ki mu'minon rastagor sudand
Hamon kasone, ki dar namozason furutan hastand
Va onon, ki az [guftoru raftori] ʙehuda rujgardonand
Va onon, ki zakot mepardozand
Va onon, ki sarmgohasonro hifz mekunand
Magar dar mavridi hamsaron jo kanizonason, ki [dar ʙahragirii cinsi az onho] nakuhise ʙar onon nest
Pas, har ki farotar az in ʙixohad, ononand, ki az had darguzastaand
Va [dar zumrai mu'minonand] kasone, ki amonatho va ahdi xudro riojat mekunand
Va kasone, ki ʙar [adoi] namozhojason muroqiʙat mekunand
Inonand, ki vorison hastand
[Hamon] Kasone, ki ʙihisti ʙarinro ʙa irs meʙarand [va] dar on covidonand
Va dar haqiqat, insonro az cakidae az gil ofaridem
Sipas uro ʙa sakli nutfae dar qarorgohe ustuvor [rahim] nihodem

Sipas nutfaro [Ba sakli] xuni ʙasta soxtem va on goh xuni ʙastaro [ʙa surati] poraguste soxtem, sipas poragustro [ʙa sakli] ustuxon darovardem va on goh ʙar ustuxonho gust pusonidem. Sipas on [canin]-ro ofarinise digar ʙaxsidem. Pas, [purʙarakatu] ʙuzurgvor ast Alloh taolo, ki nakutarin ofarinanda ast
Sipas sumo [pas az taji marohili zindagi] hatman, xohed murd
On goh ʙe tardid, dar ruzi qijomat ʙarangexta mesaved
Va ʙa jaqin Mo ʙar farozaton haft osmon ofaridem va [hargiz] az ofarinis ƣofil naʙudaem
Va az osmon ʙa andozae muajjan [ʙaroi nijozi maxluqot] oʙe firistodem va onro dar zamin coj dodem va hatman, ʙaroi az ʙajn ʙurdanas [niz] komilan tavonoem
Sipas tavassuti on [oʙ] ʙarojaton ʙoƣhoe az daraxtoni xurmo va angur padid ovardem, ki dar on [ʙoƣho] ʙaroi sumo mevahoe ʙisjore ast va az on [mahsulot] mexured
Va daraxte [ofaridem], ki az Turi Sino ʙarmeojad va ravƣani [zajtun] medihad va xurise ʙaroi xurandagon ast

Va ʙe tardid, ʙaroi sumo dar [vucudi] cahorpojon iʙrate [az qudrati Alloh taolo] ast: az on ci dar sikami onhost ʙa sumo [sir] menusonem va dar [vucudi] onho ʙarojaton sudhoi ʙisjore vucud dorad va az [gusti] onho mexured
[Dar xuski] Bar onho savor mesaved va [dar oʙ] ʙar kistiho
Va ʙe tardid, Mo Nuhro ʙa suji qavmas firistodem, pas, [ʙa onon] guft: «Ej qavmi man, Allohro ʙiparasted [ki] cuz U ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] nadored. Ojo parvo namekuned?»

Pas, asrof va ʙuzurgoni qavmas, ki kufr varzida ʙudand, guftand: «In [mard kase] nest, magar ʙasare hamcun sumo, [ki] mexohad ʙar sumo ʙartari cujad. Agar Alloh taolo mexost, faristagone [ʙa sujaton] nozil mekard. Mo inro [ki Nuh megujad] dar mijoni nijogoni xud nasnidaem
U mardi devonae ʙes nest. Pas, to muddate muntazir ʙosed [ki jo duruƣas oskor gardad va dast az da'vatas ʙardorad jo margas faro rasad]
[Nuh] Guft: «Parvardigoro, maro dar ʙaroʙari takziʙi onon jori kun»

Pas, ʙa u vahj kardem: «Kistiro tahti nazari Mo va ʙa vahji Mo ʙisoz va hangome ki farmoni [azoʙi] Mo faro rasad va [ʙa nisonai rasidani tufon oʙ az] tanur cusad, az har nav'i [hajvon] jak cufti [naru moda] dar kisti savor kun va xonavodaatro [niz hamrohi xud ʙuʙar], magar kasone, ki pestar va'da [-i halok] ʙar onon muqarrar sudaast va dar ʙorai [nacoti] kasone, ki sitam kardaand, ʙo Man suxan nagu, [caro ki] onon hatman, ƣarq xohand sud
Pas, hangome ki tu va hamrohonat ʙar kisti savor suded, ʙigu: «Sipos maxsusi Alloh taolo ast, ki moro az [cangi] guruhi sitamgor nacot dod»
Va [niz] ʙigu: «Parvardigoro, moro dar manzilgohe purʙarakat furud ovar, ki Tu ʙehtarin furudovarandai»
Be tardid, dar in [mocaro] nisonahoe [az qudrati Alloh taolo dar nacoti mu'minon va azoʙi kofiron] ast va jaqinan, Mo ozmoisgar [-i imon va kufri mardum] ʙudaem
On goh guruhi digarero pas az onon padid ovardem
Va az xudason pajomʙare dar [mijoni] onon firistodem [to ʙigujad]: «Allohro ʙiparasted, [ki] cuz U ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] nadored. Ojo parvo namekuned?»

Guruhe az asrof va ʙuzurgoni qavmas, ki kufr varzida ʙudand va didori oxiratro duruƣ meangostand va dar zindagii dunjo ʙa onon ne'matu osois doda ʙudem, guftand: «In [mard kase] nest, magar ʙasare hamcun sumo. Az on ci [sumo] mexured, [u niz] mexurad va az on ci ki sumo menused, [u niz] menusad [pas, ʙartarie nadorad, ki pajomʙar ʙosad]
Va agar az ʙasare hamcun xud itoat kuned, dar on surat jaqinan, zijonkored
Ojo u ʙa sumo va'da medihad, ki vaqte murded va xoku ustuxon suded, [dar qijomat az gur] ʙerun ovarda mesaved
On ci ʙa sumo va'da medihad, ci dur ast, ci dur
[Zindagoni] Cuz hamin zindagii dunjoii mo nest. [Guruhe] Memirem [va guruhe ʙa coji onho] zinda mesavem va hargiz [pas az marg] ʙarangexta naxohem sud
U [kase] nest, magar mardest, ki ʙar Alloh taolo duruƣ meʙandad va mo ʙa u imon nameovarem»
[Pajomʙarason] Guft: «Parvardigoro, maro dar ʙaroʙari takziʙi onon jori kun»
[Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Pas az andak zamone, [az kori xud] saxt pusajmon mesavand»
Pas, ʙong [-i margʙor]-e ononro ʙa haq furu girift va [hamcun] xoru xosokason namudem. Pas, qavmi sitamgor [az rahmati Alloh taolo] dur ʙod
Sipas ʙa'd az onon naslhoe digar padid ovardem
Hec ummate na az acali xud pesi megirad va na ta'xir mekunad

Sipas pajomʙaroni xudro pajopaj firistodem. Har goh pajomʙare ʙaroi [hidojati] ummate meomad, uro duruƣgu meangostand, pas, [Mo niz] ononro jake pas az digare halok kardem va ononro dostonho [-i iʙratomuze ʙaroi ojandagon] qaror dodem. Pas, noʙud ʙod, qavme, ki imon nameovarand
Sipas Muso va ʙarodaras Horunro ʙo ojoti [nuhgonai] xes va daloili oskor firistodem
Ba suji Fir'avn va asrofi [qavmi] u, vale onon gardankasi kardand va guruhe ʙartarixoh ʙudand
Va guftand: «Ojo ʙa du insoni monandi xud imon ʙijovarem, hol on ki qavmason ʙardagoni mo hastand?»
Pas on duro duruƣgu angostand, [va] sarancom halok sudand
Va ʙe tardid, ʙa Muso kitoʙi [Tavrot] dodem, ʙosad, ki [Bani Isroil] hidojat savand
Va pisari Marjam va modarasro nisonae [az qudrati ilohi] karor dodem va ononro dar makone ʙaland va hamvore, ki doroi amnijat va oʙe [zulolu] cori ʙud, coj dodem
Ej pajomʙaron, az [ƣizohoi] pokiza ʙixured va kori soista ancom dihed. Jaqinan, man ʙa on ci mekuned, ogoham
Va dar haqiqat, in dini sumo dini vohid [ʙa nomi islom] ast va man Parvardigoraton hastam. Pas, az man parvo kuned [ʙitarsed]
Ammo [pajravonason ixtilof kardand va] dar kori dinason mijoni xud firqa-firqa va parokanda gastand va har guruhe ʙa on ci nazdason ast, dilxusand [caro ki xudro ʙar haq medonand]
Pas, [ej pajomʙar] ononro to vaqte [ki azoʙ faro merasad] dar cahlu nodonison raho kun
Ojo gumon mekunand, on ci az sarvatu farzandon, ki ʙa onon medihem
[ʙaroi in ast, ki] sitoʙon nekihoro ʙa eson ʙirasonem? [Na, hargiz cunin nest] Balki onon [haqiqatro] darnamejoʙand
Kasone, ki az ʙimi Parvardigorason tarsonand
Va kasone, ki ʙa ojoti Parvardigorason imon meovarand
Va kasone, ki ʙa Parvardigorason sirk namevarzand
Va kasone, ki dar ancomi korhoi xajr mekusand va az in ki ʙa suji Parvardigori xes ʙozmegardand, [va az in ki korhoi nekason maqʙuli dargohi haq voqe' nasavad] dilhojason haroson ast
Inon dar nekiho sitoʙ mekunand va dar ancomi on [az jakdigar] pesi megirand
Va [Mo] ʙa hec kas cuz ʙa andozai tavonas taklif namekunem va nazdi Mo kitoʙest, ki [dar ʙorai a'moli ʙandagon] ʙa haq suxan megujad va ʙa onon sitam namesavad
[Na] Balki dilhojason az in [kitoʙ] dar ƣaflat ast va onon ʙa cuz in [gunohi kufr] korhoe [digar niz] ancom medihand
To hangome ki sarvatmandonasonro ʙa azoʙ giriftor kunem, nogahon farjodi zori sar medihand
[Ba onon gufta mesavad] «Imruz nola va zori nakuned, [ki] hargiz az suji mo jori naxohed sud
Be tardid, ojoti Man pajvasta ʙar sumo xonda mesud, vale [az haq] ruj megardoned
Dar hole ki dar ʙaroʙaras takaʙʙur mekarded [va dar macolisi saʙonai xud] ʙa ʙadgui mepardoxted
Ojo onon dar in guftor [Qur'on] najandesidaand jo [magar] cize ʙarojason omada, ki ʙaroi nijogonason najomadaast
Jo pajomʙarasonro nasinoxtaand va [az in rust, ki] inkoras mekunand
Jo megujand, u cunun dorad? [Na, cunin nest] Balki [u dini] haqro ʙarojason ovardaast, vale ʙestarason az [pazirisi] haq noxusnudand

Agar Alloh taolo az havashoi onon pajravi kunad [va umuri hasti ʙa majli kofiron idora savad], osmonho va zamin va har ki dar onhost, taʙoh megardad, ʙalki ʙaroi onon pandason [Qur'on]-ro ovardaem [ki mojai izzatu sarafason ast], vale onon az pandason rujgardonand
[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo tu az onon [ʙaroi taʙliƣi din] podose metalaʙi? Va hol on ki podosi Parvardigorat [ʙase] ʙehtar ast va U ʙehtarin ruzidihanda ast
Va ʙe tardid, tu ononro ʙa rohe rost da'vat mekuni
Kasone, ki ʙa oxirat imon nadorand, hatman az in rohi [rost] munharif sudaand
Agar ʙa onon rahm kunem va ʙalovu rancero, ki [az qahti va gurusnagi] didaand, az eson ʙartaraf sozem, ʙar sarkasi [va gumrohii] xes pofisori mekunand [va hamcunon] ʙa ʙeroha meravand
Dar haqiqat, [Mo] ononro ʙa azoʙ [-u ʙalo] giriftor soxtem [to ʙedor savand], ammo dar ʙaroʙari Parvardigorason furutani nanamudand va [ʙa dargohas tazarru' va] zori nakardand
[Onon pajvasta cunin hastand] To on goh ki dare az azoʙi saxt ʙar onon mekusoem [va cunon giriftor savand], ki [az hama co] ma'jus gardand
[Ej munkironi qijomat] Alloh taolo ast, ki ʙaroi sumo gusu casm va dil padid ovard. Ci andak sipos meguzored
Va Ust, ki sumoro dar zamin [ofarid va] parokanda kard va [ruzi qijomat] ʙa suji U cam' mesaved
Va Ust, ki zinda mekunad va memironad va ixtilofi saʙu ruz az tadʙiri Ust. Ojo nameandesed
[Cunin nakardand] Balki onon niz hamon [suxanonero] guftand, ki pesinijon meguftand
Guftand: «Ojo hangome ki murdemu xoku ustuxon sudem, ʙarangexta xohem sud
Be tardid, in va'daro pes az in niz ʙa mo va nijogonamon dodaand. In [suxan cize] nest, magar [duruƣho va] afsonahoi pesinijon»
[Ej pajomʙar, ʙa munkironi meod] ʙigu: «Agar medoned, [ʙigued], zamin va har ki dar on ast, az oni kist?»
Xohand guft: «[Hama] Az oni Alloh taolo ast». Bigu: «Pas, ojo pand namegired?»
Bigu: «Parvardigori haft osmon va Parvardigori Arsi ʙuzurg kist?»
Xohand guft: «[Hama] Az oni Alloh taolo ast». Bigu: «Pas, ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned?»
Bigu: «Agar medoned, [ʙigued] farmonravoii hama ciz ʙa dasti kist? Va [kist, ki] panoh medihad va kase dar ʙaroʙari [azoʙi] u panoh nadorad?»
Xohand guft: «[Farmonravoii hama ciz] Az oni Alloh taolo ast». Bigu: «Pas, ci guna afsun mesaved [va nameandesed]?»
[Cunin nest, ki kofiron gumon mekunand] Balki Mo haqro ʙarojason ovardem va jaqinan, onon duruƣgu hastand

Alloh taolo hargiz farzande ʙarnaguzidaast va hec ma'ʙude ʙo U nest. [Agar cunin ʙud] On goh har ma'ʙude on ciro ofarida ʙud, [ʙo xud] meʙurd va musallaman, ʙarxe ʙar ʙarxe digar ʙartari mecustand [va nizomi hasti taʙoh megast]. Alloh taolo az on ci [musrikon] tavsif mekunand, munazzah ast
U donoi nihonu oskor ast va az on ci ʙo Vaj sarik mesozand, ʙartar ast
Bigu: «Parvardigoro, agar on [azoʙe]-ro, ki ʙa onon va'da doda mesavad, ʙa man nison medihi [ki sohidas ʙosam]
pas, Parvardigoro maro dar [hangomi azoʙ dar kanori in] guruhi sitamgor qaror madeh»
Va hatman, Mo tavonoem, ki on ciro ʙa onon va'da medihem, ʙa tu nison dihem
[Ej pajomʙar] ʙadiro ʙa sevae, ki ʙehtar ast, daf' kun [va ʙuʙaxsu sikeʙo ʙos]. Mo ʙa on ci [musrikon dar ʙorai tu] tavsif mekunand, donotarem
Va ʙigu: «Parvardigoro, man az vasvasahoi sajotin ʙa Tu panoh meʙaram
Va Parvardigoro, az in ki onho nazdi man hozir savand, [niz] ʙa Tu panoh meʙaram»

[Kofiron pajvasta ʙar aqidai ʙotilason hastand] To hangome ki margi jake az onon faro rasad, [on goh dar hole ki] nazdi Parvardigori [xud nolavu zori mekunad, ʙa faristagon] megujad: «Maro [ʙa dunjo] ʙozgardoned

Sojad dar on ci [kutohi namuda va] tark kardam, kori soistae ancom diham». Hargiz cunin nest. Be tardid, in faqat suxane ast, ki u ʙa zaʙon megujad [va hargiz raftoras taƣjir namekunad] va ruze, ki ʙarangexta savand, pusti sarason ʙarzaxest
Ruze, ki dar sur damida mesavad, hec jak az [ iftixoroti xonavodagi va] pajvandhoi xesovandi mijonason [ʙarqaror] naxohad ʙud va [az vahsati azoʙ] az [holi] jakdigar namepursand
Va har ki vaznai a'molas sangin ʙosad, ononand, ki rastagorand
Va har ki vaznai a'molas saʙuk ʙosad, ononand, ki ʙa xes zijon zadaand va dar duzax covidonand
Otas cehrahojasonro mesuzonad va dar on co rujturs va zistmanzarand
[Ba onon gufta mesavad] «Magar na in ʙud, ki ojotam ʙar sumo xonda mesud va onhoro duruƣ meangosted?»
[Dar posux] Megujand: «Parvardigoro, ʙadʙaxti ʙar mo cira sud va guruhe gumroh ʙudem
Parvardigoro, moro az in [duzax] ʙerun ovar. Pas, agar [ʙa kufru nofarmoni] ʙozgastem, hatman, sitamgorem»
[Alloh taolo] Mefarmojad: «Dar on [otas] gum saved va ʙo Man suxan nagued
Guruhe az ʙandagonam meguftand: «Parvardigoro, imon ovardem, pas, moro ʙiʙaxso va ʙar mo rahm kun, [ki] ʙe tardid, Tu ʙehtarin ʙaxsojandai»
Vale sumo ononro masxara mekarded, to coje, ki [sargarm sudan ʙa tamasxuri eson] zikr [-u iʙodati] Maro az jodaton ʙurd va hamcunon ʙa onon mexandided
Imruz Man ononro az on cihate, ki sikeʙoi kardand, podos mediham. Ore, esonand, ki rastagorand»
[Alloh taolo ʙa duzaxijon] Megujad: «Cand sol dar zamin ʙa sar ʙurded»
Megujand: «Jak ruz jo ʙaxse az jak ruzro ʙa sar ʙurdem. Az hisoʙgaron [ki hisoʙi ruzu solro nigah medorand] ʙipurs»
U megujad: «[Ore] Agar medonisted, cuz andake [dar dunjo] ʙa sar naʙurded
Ojo pindostaed, ki sumoro ʙehuda ofaridaem va ʙa suji Mo ʙozgardonida namesaved
Pas, ʙalandmartaʙa [va ʙuzurg] ast Alloh taolo [ki] farmonravoi haq ast. Hec ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] cuz U nest [va] Parvardigori Arsi garonqadr ast
Va har ki ʙo Alloh taolo ma'ʙudi digarero ʙixonad, jaqinan, hec dalele ʙar [haqqonijati] on naxohad dost va hisoʙi u ʙo Parvardigoras xohad ʙud. Be tardid, kofiron rastagor namesavand
Va [ej Pajomʙar] ʙigu: «Parvardigoro, [gunohonamro] ʙiʙaxsoj va rahm kun va Tu ʙehtarin ʙaxsandai»
[In] Suraest, ki onro nozil kardaem va [amal ʙa ahkomi] onro vociʙ namudaem va dar on ojoti ravsane nozil kardaem, ʙosad, ki pand gired

Har jak az zanu mardi zinokorro sad tozijona ʙizaned va agar ʙa Alloh taolo va ruzi oxirat imon dored, naʙojad dar [icroi ahkomi] dini Alloh taolo nisʙat ʙa on du [nafar] dilsuzi [va mehruʙonii ʙe dalel] dosta ʙosed va ʙojad guruhe az mu'minon ʙar mucozotason guvoh ʙosand
Mardi zinokor cuz ʙo zani zinokor jo musrik izdivoc namekunad va zani zinokorro [niz] cuz mardi zinokor jo musrik ʙa izdivoci xud darnameovarad va in [zanosui] ʙar mu'minon harom ast

Va kasone, ki [mardonu] zanoni pokdomanro [ʙa zino] muttaham mekunand va cahor sohid [ʙar iddaoi xud] nameovarand, ononro hastod tozijona ʙizaned va hargiz sahodatasonro [dar hec mavride] napazired va inonand, ki nofarmonand
Magar kasone, ki ʙa'd az on [tuhmat] tavʙa kunand va [raftori guzastai xudro] isloh [-u cuʙron] namojand, pas, ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo omurzandai mehruʙon ast
Va kasone, ki hamsaroni xudro [ʙa zino] muttaham mekunand va cuz xestan sohide [ʙar in iddao] nadorand, pas, har jak az onon ʙojad cahor ʙor ʙa Alloh taolo savgand jod kunad, ki hatman, rost megujad
Va pancumin ʙor [savhar ʙigujad], ki la'nati Alloh taolo ʙar u ʙod, agar duruƣgu ʙosad
Va kajfari zan dar surate ʙardosta mesavad, ki cahor ʙor ʙa Alloh taolo savgand jod kunad, ki on mard hatman, duruƣgu ast
Va pancumin ʙor [ʙigujad], ki xasmi Alloh taolo ʙar u ʙod, agar [savharas] rost gufta ʙosad
Va [ej mardum] agar ʙaxsisi Alloh taolo va rahmatas ʙar sumo naʙud va in ki Alloh taolo tavʙapaziri hakim ast [hatman, giriftori azoʙ mesuded]

[Ej mu'minon] Be tardid, kasone, ki on tuhmati ʙuzurgro [dar ʙorai Oisa] matrah kardand, guruhe az xudi sumo hastand. Gumon nakuned, ki in [mocaro] ʙaroi sumo sarr ast, ʙalki xajre ʙarojaton dar on [nuhufta] ast. Baroi har jak az onon [ki dar in soeaparokani naqs dostaand] kajfari gunohest, ki murtakiʙ sudaast va ʙaroi on kase az eson, ki ʙaxsi ʙuzurgi on [tuhmat]-ro ʙa uhda dorad, azoʙi ʙuzurge [dar pes] ast
Caro hangome ki in [tuhmat]-ro sunided, mardonu zanoni mu'min gumoni nek ʙa xud naʙurdand va naguftand: «In tuhmate [ʙuzurgu] oskor [ʙa hamsari pajomʙar] ast?»
Caro cahor sohid ʙar on najovardand? Pas, cun sohidonro najovardand, ononand, ki nazdi Alloh taolo duruƣgu hastand
Va agar ʙaxsisi Alloh taolo va rahmati U dar dunjovu oxirat naʙud, hatman, ʙa kajfari on ci ʙad-on pardoxted, ʙa azoʙe [saxtu] ʙuzurg giriftor mesuded

On goh ki on [soea]-ro az zaʙoni jakdigar mesunided va suxanero dahon ʙa dahon naql mekarded, ki dar ʙoraas hec ogohi [va jaqini] nadosted va onro soda [va kucak] mepindosted, dar hole ki on [tuhmat] nazdi Alloh taolo ʙisjor ʙuzurg ast
Caro hangome ki onro sunided, nagufted: «Sazovor nest, ki in [suxani ʙad]-ro ʙar zaʙon ovardem. [Parvardigoro] Tu munazzahi, in duruƣi ʙuzurge ast?»
Alloh taolo sumoro pand medihad, ki agar mu'min hasted, hargiz in [kor]-ro takror nakuned
Va Alloh taolo ojot [-i xud]-ro ʙaroi sumo ʙajon mekunad va Alloh taolo donoi hakim ast
Onon, ki dust dorand, ʙajni kasone, ki imon ovardaand, zistkori roic gardad, hatman, dar dunjo va oxirat azoʙe dardnok [dar pes] dorand va Alloh taolo [haqoiqu masolehro] medonad va sumo namedoned
Va agar ʙaxsisi Alloh taolo va rahmatas ʙar sumo naʙud va in ki Alloh taolo dilsuzi mehruʙon ast, [hatman, mucozoti saxte dar intizoraton ʙud]

Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, dar rohhoi sajton gom naguzored va har ki rohhoi sajtonro mepujad, [ʙidonad, ki] u tanho ʙa zistkori va a'moli nopisand farmon medihad va agar ʙaxsisi Alloh taolo va rahmatas ʙar sumo naʙud, hargiz hec jak az sumo [az gunoh] pok namesud, vale Alloh taolo har kiro ʙixohad, pok mekunad va Alloh taolo sunavoi donost

Afrode az sumo, ki ʙartarii [imoni] va vus'ati [moli] dorand, naʙojad savgand jod kunand, ki ʙa xesovandon va tihidaston va muhocironi dar rohi Alloh taolo [ki murtakiʙi gunoh sudaand] cize nadihand. Onon ʙojad afv kunand va [az gunohi digaron] casm ʙipusand. Ojo dust namedored, ki Alloh taolo [niz] sumoro ʙiʙaxsad? Va Alloh taolo omurzandai mehruʙon ast
Kasone, ki zanoni pokdomani ʙexaʙar [az fahso va] mu'minro [ʙa zino] muttaham mekunand, dar dunjo va oxirat az rahmati Alloh taolo dur gastaand va [dar oxirat] azoʙe ʙuzurg [dar pes] dorand
Ruze, ki zaʙonho va dastho va pojhojason dar ʙorai on ci mekardand [va meguftand], alajhi onon guvohi medihand
On ruz Alloh taolo cazoi voqeii ononro ʙekamu kost medihad va xohand donist, ki Alloh taolo hamon haqqi oskor ast

Zanoni palid ʙaroi mardoni palidand va mardoni palid [niz] ʙaroi zanoni palidand. Va zanoni pok az oni mardoni pokand va mardoni pok [niz] az oni zanoni pokand. Inon az on ci [nopokon dar ʙoraason] megujand, muʙarro hastand [va] omurzisi [ilohi] va ruzii arzismande [dar pes] dorand
Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, ʙa xonahoe cuz xonahoi xud vorid nasaved, magar in ki icozat ʙigired va ʙar ahli on [xona] salom kuned. In [kor] ʙaroi sumo ʙehtar ast, ʙosad, ki pand gired

Pas, agar kasero dar on [xona] najofted, vorid nasaved, to ʙa sumo icozat doda savad va agar ʙa sumo gufta sud: «Bozgarded»! Pas, ʙozgarded! [Caro ki] In [kasʙi icozat] ʙaroi sumo soistatar ast va Alloh taolo ʙa on ci mekuned donost
Bar sumo gunohe nest, ki ʙa xonahoi ƣajrimaskuni [va makonhoi umumi], ki dar on co [ehtijoc jo] ʙahrae dored, vorid saved va Alloh taolo on ci oskor mesozed va on ci pinhon medored, [hamaro] medonad

[Ej pajomʙar] Ba mardoni mu'min ʙigu, casmoni xudro [az nigoh ʙa nomahram] furu girand va pokdomani pesa kunand. In [kor] ʙaroi onon pokizatar ast. Be tardid, Alloh taolo ʙa on ci ancom medihand, ogoh ast

Va ʙa zanoni mu'min [niz] ʙigu, casmoni xudro [az nigoh ʙa nomahram] furu girand va pokdomani varzand va zevar [-u oroisi] xudro oskor nakunand, magar on ci [ʙa surati taʙii] namojon ast. Va ʙojad rusarii xudro ʙar sina ʙiafkanand [to mujho va sinahoson pusida gardad] va zinati xudro oskor nasozand, magar ʙaroi savhar jo padar jo padarsavhar jo pisari xud jo pisari savharason jo ʙarodar jo pisari ʙarodar jo pisari xohar jo [digar] zanon jo kanizon va ʙardagonason jo xesovandone, ki [digar] nijoz va tamojule ʙa zanon nadorand jo kudakone, ki az masoili cinsii zanon ogohi najoftaand. Hamcunin, [hangomi roh raftan] pojhoi xudro [cunon ʙar zamin] nakuʙand, ki [sadoi] zinnathoe, ki [zeri liʙos] pinhon kardaand, [xalxol] oskor savad. Va ej mu'minon, hamagi ʙa sui Alloh taolo tavʙa kuned; ʙosad, ki rastagor garded

[Ej mu'minon] Mardonu zanoni mucarradi xudro hamsar dihed va ƣulomonu kanizonro, ki soistagi dorand [niz hamsar dihed]. Agar onon tihidast ʙosand, Alloh taolo az ʙaxsis [va lutfi] xes ʙenijozason mesozad va Alloh taolo kusoisgari ogoh ast

Kasone, ki [saroitu imkonoti] izdivoc nadorand, ʙojad pokdomani pesa kunand, to Alloh taolo ononro az ʙaxsisi xes ʙenijoz namojad. Va ʙardagone, ki xostori ʙozxarid [va ozodii xes] hastand, agar dar onon [tavonoii pardoxti mol va] soistagi meʙined, [darxostasonro] ʙipazired va az sarvate, ki Alloh taolo ʙa sumo ato kardaast, cize ʙa onon ʙaxsed [to ʙa ozodiason kumak kuned]. Hamcunin, kanizonatonro, ki mexohand pokdoman ʙosand, ʙa zino vodor nakuned, to ʙahrai [nociz] zindagii dunjoro ʙa dast ovared va agar kase, ki ononro [ʙa in kor] vorid namojad, Alloh taolo pas az macʙur sudanason, hatman, [nisʙat ʙa onon] omurzanda [va] mehruʙon ast
Va ʙa rosti, ʙa suji sumo ojote ravsan va dostone az zindagii pesinijonaton va pande ʙaroi parhezgoron nozil kardaem

Alloh taolo nuri osmonho va zamin ast. Masali nuri U hammonandi caroƣdonest, ki darunas caroƣe [afruxta] ast [va] on caroƣ dar sisae qaror dorad [va] on sisa gui sitorae duraxson ast. In caroƣ ʙo [ravƣani] daraxti purʙarakati zajtun afruxta mesavad, ki na sarqi ast va na ƣarʙi [va xursed hamvora ʙar on metoʙad]. Ravƣanas [cunon zulol ast, ki] nazdik ast, ʙiduni tamos ʙo otas su'lavar gardad. Nurest afzun ʙar nur. [Qalʙi mu'min niz ʙo nuri hidojat in guna ravsan mesavad] Va Alloh taolo har kiro ʙixohad, ʙa nuri xes hidojat mekunad va Alloh taolo ʙaroi mardum masalho mezanad va Alloh taolo ʙa har ciz donost
[In caroƣi hidojat] Dar masocidest, ki Alloh taolo amr kardaast, to [qadru manzalatson] giromi dosta savad va nomas dar onho ʙurda savad, [va] dar on co ʙomdodon va somgohon Uro ʙa poki ʙisitojand
Mardone, ki hec ticorat va xaridu furuse ononro az jodi Alloh taolo va ʙarpo dostani namoz va pardoxti zakot ƣofil namekunad, [va] az ruze, ki dilho va casmho digargun mesavad, ʙim dorand
To Alloh taolo ʙehtar az on ci ancom dodaand, ʙa onon podos dihad va az fazli xud niz ʙar podosason ʙijafzojad va Alloh taolo ʙa har ki ʙixohad, ʙehisoʙ ruzi medihad

Va kasone, ki kufr varzidand, a'molason hamcun saroʙe dar ʙijoʙone hamvor ast, ki [az dur insoni] tasna onro oʙ mepindorad, to on ki nazdikas mesavad [va] cize namejoʙad va [a'moli kofir niz saroʙest, ki sude ʙarojas nadorad va dar ivaz] Allohro nazdi xes mejoʙad, ki hisoʙasro ʙa tavri komil medihad va Alloh taolo dar hisoʙrasi sare' ast

Jo [a'molas] hamcun torikihoe dar darjoi ƶarf ast, ki mavce onro mepusonad va ʙar farozi on mavce digar ast, [va] ʙar farozas aʙre [torik] qaror dorad. Torikihoe ast, jake ʙar farozi digare [cunon ki] agar [saxsi gumgasta] dasti xudro ʙerun ovarad, mumkin nest onro ʙuʙinad. Va kase, ki Alloh taolo nure [az hidojat] ʙarojas qaror nadoda ʙosad, pas, [hec hidojat va] nure ʙarojas nest

Ojo nadidi, har ki dar osmonho va zamin ast va [hatto] parrandahoi dar osmon parkusoda [dar osmon hamagi] Allohro ʙa poki mesitojand. Har jak az onon nijoisu sitoisi xesro medonad va Alloh taolo ʙa on ci mekunand, ogoh ast
Va farmonravoii osmonho va zamin az oni Alloh taolo ast va ʙozgast [-i hama] ʙa suji Alloh taolo ast

Ojo nadidi, ki Alloh taolo aʙrhoero ʙa oromi meronad, sipas ʙajni [aczoi] on pajvand medihad, on goh tudai anʙuhe padid meovarad, pas, qatrahoi ʙoronro meʙini, ki az mijonas tarovis mekunad va az kuhhoe [az anʙuhi aʙrho], ki dar osmon ast, donahoi ƶola furu meʙorad, pas, onro ʙa har ki ʙixohad furu merezad va az har ki ʙixohad ʙozmedorad. Nazdik ast, duraxsandagii ʙarqas casmhoro [az ʙajn] ʙarad
Alloh taolo saʙu ruzro megardonad [va pajopaj meovarad]. Jaqinan, dar in [gardis] iʙrate ʙaroi ahli ʙasirat ast

Va Alloh taolo har mavcudi zindaero az oʙ ofarid, pas, ʙarxe az onon ʙar sikami xud meravand va ʙarxe ʙar du po roh meravand va ʙarxe az onon cahor [po] roh meravand. Alloh taolo har ci ʙixohad meofarinad. Be tardid, Alloh taolo ʙar hama ciz tavonost
Ba rosti, ki [Mo] ojoti ravsangare nozil kardem va Alloh taolo har kiro ʙixohad, ʙa rohi rost hidojat mekunad

Va [munofiqon] megujand: «Ba Alloh taolo va pajomʙar [-i U] imon ovardem va [az farmonason] itoat kardem», ammo pas az in [iddao] guruhe az onon rujgardon mesavand va inon [dar haqiqat] mu'min nestand
Va hangome ki ʙa suji Alloh taolo va pajomʙaras faroxonda mesavand, to dar mijonason dovari kunad, nogoh guruhe az onon rujgardon mesavand
Va agar haq ʙa onon ʙosad, muteona [furutanona] ʙa suji u meojand
Ojo dar dilhojason ʙemori ast jo [dar ʙorai risolatas] tardid dorand? Jo metarsand, ki Alloh taolo va pajomʙaras ʙar onon sitam kunand? [Na] Balki onon xud sitamgorand
Suxani mu'minon, hangome ki ʙa sui Alloh taolo va pajomʙaras faroxonda mesavand, to mijonason dovari kunad, faqat in ast, ki megujand: «Sunidem va itoat kardem» va inonand, ki rastagorand
Va har ki az Alloh taolo va pajomʙaras itoat kunad va az Alloh taolo ʙitarsad va az [nofarmonii] U ʙiparhezad, pas, inon komjoʙand

[Munofiqon] Bo saxttarin savgandhojason ʙa Alloh taolo savgand jod kardand, ki agar ʙa onon farmon dihi, [ʙaroi cihod] rahsipor mesavand. Bigu: «Savgand jod nakuned. Itoat [va suxanoni duruƣaton] sinoxtasuda ast. Be tardid, Alloh taolo az on ci mekuned, ogoh ast»

Bigu: «Az Alloh taolo va pajomʙar itoat kuned, pas, agar sarpeci karded, pajomʙar mas'uli cizest, ki ʙar u taklif sudaast [iʙloƣi vahj] va sumo niz mas'uli cize hasted, ki ʙa on taklif sudaed; ammo agar az u itoat kuned, hidojat mesaved; va pajomʙar vazifae cuz rasonidani oskoro [-i vahj] nadorad»

Alloh taolo ʙa afrode az sumo, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand, va'da dodaast, ki hatman, ononro dar zamin conisin [-i musrikon] mesozad. Hamon guna ki kasonero, ki pes az onon ʙudand, [niz] conisin [-i kofironu sitamgaron] namud va [farmudaast] dinasonro, ki ʙaroi onon pisandidaast, ʙarojason ustuvor [-u piruzmand] sozad va tarsasonro ʙa oromisu amnijat taʙdil kunad [caro ki] tanho Maro meparastand va cizero ʙo Man sarik namesozand va har ki az in pas kufr ʙivarzad, pas, inonand, ki nofarmonand
Va namoz ʙarpo dored va zakot ʙipardozed va az pajomʙar itoat kuned, ʙosad, ki mavridi rahmat qaror gired
[Ej pajomʙar] Hargiz mapindor kasone, ki kufr varzidand, notavonkunanda [-i Alloh taolo] dar zaminand [va metavonand az mucozoti ilohi ʙigrezand]. Cojgohi inon otas ast va ci ʙad ʙozgastangohest

Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, ʙardagonaton va kasone az [kudakoni] sumo, ki ʙa sinni ʙuluƣ narasidaand, ʙojad dar se vaqt az sumo icozat [-i vurud] ʙigirand: pes az namozi suʙh va nimruz – hangome ki liʙoshojatonro ʙerun meovared – va pas az namozi xuftan. [In] Se [vaqt] hangomi xilvati sumost. Ba cuz in [ce vaqt] ʙar sumo va ʙar onon hec gunohe nest [ki ʙiduni icozat vorid savand, caro ki] onon peromunaton dar raftu omadand, [va] ʙo jakdigar [muosirat mekuned]. Alloh taolo incunin ojot [-i xud]-ro ʙarojaton ʙajon mekunad va Alloh taolo donoi hakim ast

Va hangome ki kudakonaton ʙa sinni ʙuluƣ rasidand, ʙojad [ʙaroi vurud ʙa xonahoi digaron] icozat ʙigirand, cunonki ʙuzurgsolone, ki [ahkomasonro] pes az onho [sarh dodem niz] ʙojad icozat megiriftand. Alloh taolo incunin ojotasro ʙarojaton ʙajon mekunad va Alloh taolo donoi hakim ast

Va ʙar zanon [-i joisavu pirazan va] az kor aftodae, ki [digar majlu] umedi zanosui nadorand, gunohe nest, ki pusis [-i saru surat]-i xesro kanor guzorand, [ʙa sarti on ki orois va] zinatero oskor nakunand va agar iffat ʙivarzand [va xudro ʙipusonand] ʙarojason ʙehtar ast. Va Alloh taolo sunavoi donost

Bar [afrodi] noʙino va langu ʙemor [ki az takolifi ictimoi – hamcun cihod – maof sudaand] gunohe nest va [hamcunin] ʙar xudi sumo gunohe nest, ki az xonahoi xud [jo farzandonu hamsaronaton ƣizoe] ʙixured jo az xonahoi padaronaton jo xonahoi modaronaton jo xonahoi ʙarodaronaton jo xonahoi xoharonaton jo xonahoi amuhojaton jo xonahoi ammahojaton jo xonahoi taƣohojaton jo xonahoi xolahojaton jo xonae, ki kalidas dar ixtijori sumost jo [az xonahoi] dustonaton. Bar sumo gunohe nest, ki dastacam'i jo cudogona [ƣizo] ʙixured va hangome ki ʙa xonaho vorid mesaved, ʙa jakdigar salom kuned, ki durude muʙorak [va] pisandida az suji Alloh taolo ast. Alloh taolo in guna ojoti [xes]-ro ʙarojaton ʙa ravsani ʙajon mekunad, ʙosad, ki ʙiandesed

Mu'minoni [voqei] kasone hastand, ki ʙa Alloh taolo va Pajomʙaras imon ovardaand va hangome ki ʙaroi [icroi jak] amri ictimoi ʙo u [pajomʙar] hamroh hastand, to az vaj icozat nagiriftaand, [az cam'] xoric namesavand. Be tardid, kasone, ki az tu icozat megirand, ononand, ki ʙa Allohu pajomʙaras imon ovardaand. Pas, agar ʙaroi ancomi ʙarxe korho [-i muhim]-i xud az tu icozat mexohand, ʙa har jak az onon, ki mexohi icozat ʙideh va az Alloh taolo ʙarojason omurzis ʙixoh. Ba rosti, ki Alloh taolo omurzandai mehruʙon ast

Faroxonii pajomʙar [ʙaroi sirkat dar korhoi guruhe]-ro ʙajni xud hamcun faroxonii jakdigar talaqqi nakuned [ki ʙitavoned onro ʙipazired jo rad kuned]. Jaqinan, Alloh taolo afrode az sumoro, ki pusti digaron pinhon mesavand va maxfijona [az nazdi pajomʙar] megurezand, [ʙa xuʙi] mesinosad. pas kasone, ki az farmonas sarpeci mekunand, ʙojad ʙitarsand az in ki anduh va ʙaloe ʙar sarason ʙijojad jo ʙa azoʙe dardnok giriftor savand

Ogoh ʙosed! Be tardid, on ci dar osmonho va zamin ast az oni Alloh taolo ast va jaqinan, U medonad, ki sumo [ʙar ci koru] dar ci hole hasted va ruze, ki [ʙandagon] ʙa sujas ʙozgardonda mesavand, ononro az on ci [dar dunjo] kardaand, ogoh mesozad va Alloh taolo ʙa har cize donost
Purʙarakat [va ʙuzurgvor] ast, kase, ki Qur'onro [ki cudokunandai haq va ʙotil ast] ʙar ʙandaas nozil kard, to ʙimdihandai cahonijon ʙosad

Hamono farmonravoii osmonho va zamin az oni Ust va farzande [ʙaroi xes] ʙarnaguzidaast va dar farmonravoi hec sarike nadorad va hama cizro ofaridaast va andozai har cizro – cunon ki munosiʙas meʙosad – tadʙir namudaast

Va [musrikon] ʙa coji U [Alloh taolo] ma'ʙudone ʙarguzidaand, ki cize nameofarinand va xud ofarida mesavand va moliki hec zijonu sude ʙaroi xud nestand va [niz] moliki margu zindagi va [qodir ʙa] ʙarangextani [murdagon] nestand

Va kasone, ki kufr varzidand, guftand: «In [Qur'on] cuz duruƣe nest, ki [Muhammad] ʙoftaast va guruhe digar uro ʙar in [kor] jori dodaand». Haqqo, ki onon [ʙo in suxan] ʙa sitamu duruƣi ʙuzurge ruj ovardaand
Va [kofiron] guftand: «[In Qur'on hamon] afsonahoi pesinijon ast, ki [Muhammad] onro runavisi kardaast va har ʙomdodu somgoh ʙar u imlo mesavad»
Bigu: «Kase onro nozil kardaast, ki rozi osmonho va zaminro medonad. Be tardid, U hamvora omurzanda [va] mehruʙon ast

Va [musrikon] guftand: «In ci guna pajomʙarest, ki [hamcun mardumi odi] ƣizo mexurad va dar ʙozorho roh meravad? Caro faristae ʙar u nozil nasudaast, to [jorias kunad va] hamrohi u husdordihanda ʙosad
Jo caro gance [az osmon] ʙar u furud nameojad va jo caro ʙoƣe nadorad, ki az [mevahoi] on ʙixurad»? Sitamgoron [-i musrik] guftand: «Sumo cuz az marde codusuda pajravi namekuned»
Bingar, ki ci guna ʙarojat masalho zadand va gumroh sudand! Cunon ki nametavonand rohe [ʙa sui haqiqat] ʙijoʙand
Purʙarakat [va ʙuzurgvor] ast, kase, ki agar ʙixohad, ʙarojat ʙehtar az in qaror medihad: ʙoƣhoe, ki cujʙorho az zeri [daraxtoni] on cori ast va [hatto] ʙarojat koxhoe padid meovarad
[Musrikon ʙo in suxanon dar paji haq naraftand] Balki qijomatro duruƣ angostand va [Mo] ʙaroi har ki qijomatro duruƣ angorad, otasi suzon [-i duzaxro] muhajjo kardaem
Hangome ki [duzax] ononro az durdast meʙinad ovozi xasmu xurus [-i vahsatnok]-e az on mesunavand
Va cun dastupoʙasta [ʙo ƣulu zancir] dar tangnoe az on andoxta savand, dar on co margasonro ʙa farjod mexohand
[Ba onon gufta mesavad] «Imruz na jak ʙor, ʙalki ʙorho darxosti marg kuned»
[Ej pajomʙar, ʙa kofiron] Bigu: «In [azoʙi dardnok] ʙehtar ast jo ʙihisti covidoni, ki ʙa parhezkoron va'da doda suda va podosu sarancomi onon ast?»
Dar on co har ci ʙixohand, ʙarojason [faroham] ast [va] dar on covidonand. In va'dae ast ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigorat, ki [ʙandagoni parhezkor ancomasro] az U xostaand
Va ruze, ki [hamai] onon va on ciro, ki ʙa coji Alloh taolo meparastidand, cam' mekunad va [ʙa ma'ʙudoni ʙotil] mefarmojad: «Ojo sumo in ʙandagoni Maro gumroh karded jo xud rohro gum kardand?»

Onon megujand: «Tu munazzahi, soistai mo naʙud, ki ʙa coji Tu [dustonu] korsozone ʙarguzinem, vale Tu onon va padaronasonro [az ne'matho] ʙahramand soxti, to in ki jod [-i Tu]-ro faromus kardand va [ʙad-in xotir] guruhe haloksuda gastand»

[Alloh taolo ʙa musrikon mefarmojad] «Be tardid, [ma'ʙudonaton] iddaoi sumoro duruƣ sumurdand. Pas, [aknun] nametavoned [azoʙro az xud] dur kuned va na [az kase] jori ʙicued va har jak az sumo, ki [sirk ʙivarzad va ʙa xud] sitam kunad, azoʙe ʙuzurg ʙa vaj mecasonem»

[Ej pajomʙar] Pes az tu pajomʙaronro nafiristodem, magar in ki onon niz ƣizo mexurdand va [hamcun digar insonho] dar ʙozorho roh meraftand va mo ʙarxe az sumoro vasilai ozmoisi ʙarxe digar soxtem, [to ravsan savad] ojo sikeʙoi mekuned. Va Parvardigorat hamvora ʙinost

Kasone, ki ʙa didori Mo [dar oxirat] umed nadorand, guftand: «Caro faristagone ʙar mo nozil nasudaand, jo [caro] Parvardigoramonro nameʙinem»? Be tardid, onon dar ʙorai xud takaʙʙur varzidand va sarkasii ʙuzurg kardand
Ruze, ki [kofiron] faristagonro meʙinand, hec ʙasorate ʙaroi mucrimon naxohad ʙud, [ʙalki ruzi kajfaru azoʙ ast] va [faristagon] megujand: «[Bihist] Bar sumo mamnu' [va harom] ast»
Va ʙa [ʙarrasii] korhojason mepardozem va hamaro [hamcun] ƣuʙore parokanda mesozem
Dar on ruz ʙihistijon ʙehtarin cojgohu nakutarin istirohatgohro dorand
Va [jod kun az] ruze, ki osmon ʙo aʙrhoi saped sikofta mesavad va faristagon [pajopaj ʙa sarzamini mahsar] furu firistoda mesavand
Dar on ruz farmonravoi [-i rostin] az oni [Allohi] Rahmon ast va ʙaroi kofiron ruze dusvor ast
Va [jod kun az] ruze, ki sitamgor dastonasro [az hasrat] megazad va megujad: «Ej kos, man rohe [hamohang] ʙo pajomʙar ʙarguzida ʙudam
Ej voj ʙar man! Ej kos, falon [kofir]-ro ʙa dusti namegiriftam
Be tardid, pas az on ki Qur'on [va da'vati pajomʙar] ʙa man rasid, u [ʙud, ki] maro ʙa gumrohi kasond va sajton hamvora insonro tanho [va xor] vomeguzorad»
Va Pajomʙar guft: «Parvardigoro, qavmi man in Qur'onro raho kardaand»
Va incunin ʙaroi har pajomʙare dusmane az ʙadkoroni [qavmas] qaror dodem. Va kofi ast, ki Parvardigorat rohnamo va jovarat ʙosad

Va kasone, ki kufr varzidand, guftand: «Caro Qur'on jakʙora ʙar u nozil nasudaast?» Mo in guna [kalomi ilohiro ʙa murur nozil] kardaem, to dilatro ʙo on [orom va] ustuvor gardonem va onro ʙa tadric ʙar tu xondaem [to darku hifzas oson ʙosad]
Va [kofiron] hec [e'tirozu] masale ʙarojat nameovarand, magar on ki Mo [niz posuxe] ʙar haq va xusʙajontar ʙarojat meovarem
Kasone, ki ʙa ruj daraftoda ʙa duzax kasonda mesavand, inon ʙadcojgohtar va gumrohtarand
Va dar haqiqat, Mo ʙa Muso kitoʙ [Tavrot] dodem va ʙarodaras Horunro dastjoras soxtem
Va guftem: «Sumo du nafar ʙa sui qavme ʙiraved, ki ojoti Moro duruƣ angostand». Pas, [cun fir'avnijon sarpeci namudand] ʙa siddat noʙudason soxtem
Va qavmi Nuhro – on goh ki pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand – ƣarq kardem va ononro ʙaroi mardum [nisona va] iʙrate qaror dodem; va ʙaroi sitamgoron azoʙe dardnok muhajjo kardaem
Va [hamcunin] qavmi Od va Samud va aholii "coh" va naslhoi ʙisjorero, ki ʙajni onon ʙudand [noʙud soxtem]
Va ʙaroi har jak az onho masalho zadem va [cun pand nagiriftand] hamaro ʙa siddat az mijon ʙurdem

Va [musrikon] hatman, az [sarzamini qavmi Lut hamon] sahre, ki ʙoroni ʙalo ʙar on ʙorida ʙud, guzar kardaand. Ojo on [vajronahoi ʙoqimonda az azoʙ] -ro nadidaand? [Cunin nest] Balki ʙa zinda sudan [pas az marg] umede nadorand
Va hangome ki turo meʙinand, faqta ʙa tamasxur megirand [va megujand] «Ojo in hamon kasest, ki Alloh taolo ʙa pajomʙari firistodaast

Agar ʙar [parastisi] ma'ʙudonamon [sikeʙoi va] pojdori namekardem, nazdik ʙud [Muhammad] az [rohi] onho gumrohamon kunad». Vale on goh ki azoʙ [-i ilohi]-ro ʙuʙinand, xohand donist ci kase gumrohtar [ʙuda] ast
Ojo kase, ki havoi nafsasro ma'ʙudi xud kardaast, didai? Ojo tu [metavoni] nigahʙoni [imoni] u ʙosi
Ojo gumon dori, ki ʙestarason mesunavand jo mefahmand? Onon cuz hammonandi cahorpojon nestand, ʙalki gumrohtarand

Ojo [ofarinisi] Parvardigoratro nadidai, ki ci guna sojaro gustaronidaast va agar mexost, onro soʙit menamud? On goh [taƣjiri cojgohi] xursed [nisʙat ʙa zamin]-ro daleli [gustarisu harakati] on [soja] qaror dodem
Sipas [ʙo taƣjiri ʙalandii xursed sojaro kutoh mekunem va] onro andak-andak ʙa suji xes ʙozmegirem
Va Ust, ki saʙro [ʙo torikii farogiras] pusise ʙaroi sumo qaror dod va xoʙro mojai osois va ruzro hangomi ʙarxostan [va koru talos] soxt
Va Ust, ki pes az [ʙoroni] rahmatas ʙodhoro ʙasoratʙaxs firistod va az osmon oʙe pok [va pokkunanda] furu firistodem
To ʙo on sarzamini [xusku] murdaro zinda gardonem va cahorpojon va insonhoi ʙisjorero, ki ofaridaem, seroʙ sozem
Va ʙa rosti, on [daloilu nisonahoi qudrati ilohi]-ro ʙa surathoi gunogun ʙajon kardem, to pand girand, vale ʙestar mardum cuz [inkoru] nosiposi nakardand
Va agar mexostem, dar har dijore ʙimdihandae ʙarmeangextem
Pas, [ej pajomʙar] az kofiron itoat nakun va ʙa vasilai Qur'on ʙo onon ʙa cihodi ʙuzurge ʙarxez [va dar in roh sikeʙo ʙos]
Va Ust, ki du darjoro ʙa ham omext: in jake xusguvor va sirin ast va on jake suru talx va dar mijoni on du moneai nufuznopazire qaror dod [to ʙo ham najomezand]
Va Ust, ki insonro az oʙi [mani] ofarid va uro doroi pajvandi nasaʙi va saʙaʙi gardonid va Parvardigorat hamvora tavonost
Va [musrikon] ʙa coji Alloh taolo cizero meparastand, ki na ʙa onon sude meʙaxsad va na zijone merasonad va kofir dar ʙaroʙari Parvardigoras pajvasta pustiʙon [-i sajton] ast
Va [ej pajomʙar] Mo turo cuz ʙasoratʙaxs va ʙimdihanda nafiristodem
Bigu: «Man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham, magar kase, ki ʙixohad rohe ʙa sui Parvardigoras ʙarguzinad [va hamin ʙarojam kofi ast]»
Va ʙar [Parvardigori] zindae, ki hargiz namemirad, tavakkal kun va ʙo citois Uro ʙa poki jod kun. Va hamin ʙas, ki U ʙa gunohoni ʙandagonas ogoh ast

[Hamon] Kase, ki osmonho va zamin va on ciro mijoni onhost dar sas ruz ofarid, sipas ʙar Ars qaror girift. [U Allohi] Rahmon ast, pas, dar mavridi U az on ki ogoh ast, ʙipurs [va U niz kase cuz Alloh taolo nest]

Va hangome ki ʙa ʙa onon gufta savad: «Baroi [Allohi] Rahmon sacda kuned», megujand: «Rahmon kist? Ojo [qaror ast] ʙar har ci tu amr mekuni sacda ʙarem»? Va [in da'vati tu duri az haq va] nafratasonro meafzojad
Purʙarakat [va ʙuzurgvor] ast, on ki dar osmon manzilgohhoe [ʙaroi sitoragon] qaror dod va dar [mijoni] onho xursed [-i duraxson] va mohi toʙone padid ovard
Va Ust, ki saʙu ruzro dar paji jakdigar qaror dod, ʙaroi har ki ʙixohad [az tadʙiri ilohi] pand girad jo siposguzor ʙosad

Va ʙandagoni [mu'minu soistai] Rahmon kasone hastand, ki ʙo furutani [va matonat] ʙar zamin roh meravand va hangome ki cohilon [ʙo suxanoni nopisand] xitoʙason mekunand, [ʙa coi talofi ʙo onon] ʙa neki suxan megujand
Va kasone ʙaroi Parvardigorason dar holi sacda va qijom saʙzindadori mekunand
Va kasone, ki megujand: «Parvardigoro, azoʙi duzaxro az mo ʙozgardon, [ki] ʙe tardid, azoʙas [saxtu] pojdor ast
Haqqo, ki duzax ʙad cojgoh va iqomatgohest
Va [mu'minon] kasone hastand, ki cun infoq menamojand, na zijodaravi mekunand va na saxtgiri va ʙajni in du [holat rohi] e'tidol pes megirand

Va kasone hastand, ki ʙo Alloh taolo ma'ʙude digar namexonand va kase, ki Alloh taolo [kustanasro] harom kardaast, cuz ʙa haq namekusand va zino namekunand. Va har ki in [gunohon]-ro murtakiʙ savad, kajfari gunohi [xes]-ro meʙinad
Ruzi qijomat azoʙas ducandon megardad va ʙo xori dar on [azoʙ] covidon memonad
Magar kase, ki tavʙa kunad va imon ovarad va kore soista ancom dihad. Pas, inonand, ki Alloh taolo ʙadihojasonro ʙa nekiho taʙdil mekunad va Alloh taolo hamvora omurzgoru mehruʙon ast
Va kase, ki tavʙa kunad va kore soista ancom dihad, pas, jaqinan ʙa dargohi Alloh taolo – cunon ki ʙojadu sojad – tavʙa kardaast

Va kasone [mu'minand], ki guvohii duruƣ namedihand [va dar macolisi ʙotil huzur namejoʙand] va cun ʙa [kori nopisand jo] ʙehudae ʙarxurd mekunand, ʙuzurgvorona [az kanoras] meguzarand [va xudro oluda namesozand]
Va kasone, ki cun ʙa ojoti Parvardigorason pand doda mesavand, [az on ƣaflat namekunand va dar ʙaroʙari Qur'on] cun karonu kuron nestand
Va kasone, ki megujand: «Parvardigoro, az hamsaronu farzandonamon [kasonero] ʙa mo ato farmo, ki [mojai sodii dilho va] ravsanii casmho ʙosand va moro pesvoi parhezkoron qaror ʙideh»
[Ore] Inon ʙa posi on ki sikeʙoi kardaand, manozil [-i olii ʙihist]-ro podos megirand va dar on co ʙo durudu salomi [faristagon] ru ʙa ru megardand
Dar on co covidonand. Ci naku cojgoh va [ci nek] iqomatgohe ast

[Ba kofiron] ʙigu: «Agar iʙodat va duojaton naʙosad, Parvardigoram e'tinoe ʙa sumo nadorad [va arzise ʙarojaton qoil nest]. Ba rosti, sumo [da'vati haqro] duruƣ angosted, pas, ʙa zudi [kajfari in kor] gireʙongiraton xohad sud
To, sin, mim
In ojoti kitoʙi ravsangar ast
Sojad mexohi az [anduhi] in ki [musrikon] imon nameovarand, xudro halok kuni
Agar ʙixohem, az osmon nisonae ʙar onon nozil mekunem, ki dar ʙaroʙaras ʙo furutani sar furud ovarand
Va hec pandi tozae az sui [Allohi] Rahmon ʙaroi onon nameojad, magar in ki az on ruj gardonand
Ba rosti, onon [da'vati pajomʙaron va azoʙi qijomatro] duruƣ angostand, pas, ʙa zudi axʙori on ci masxara mekardand, ʙa eson xohad rasid
Ojo ʙa zamin namenigarand, ki ci ʙisjor az har guna [gijohi] sudmande dar on rujonidaem
Be tardid, dar in [ofarinis] nisonae [az qudrati Alloh taolo ʙar meod] ast, vale ʙestarason imon nameovarand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
Va [jod kun az] hangome ki Parvardigorat Musoro nido dod, ki: «Ba suji qavmi sitamgor ʙirav
– qavmi Fir'avn - [va ʙa onon ʙigu] ojo [az kufru sarkasi] nameparhezand?»
[Muso] Guft: «Parvardigoro, ʙim doram, ki maro duruƣgu angorand
Va [az kufrason nosikeʙo va] ƣamgin gardam. Pas, [Caʙrailro] ʙa suji Horun ʙifrist [to ʙaroi joriam rahsiporas kunad]
Va onon [ʙa gumoni xes qasosi] gunohe ʙar man dorand, pas, metarsam, ki maro ʙikusand»
[Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Hargiz! Pas ʙo ojot [va mu'cizot]-i Mo ʙiraved. Jaqinan, [hama co] ʙo sumoem va [guftugujatonro] mesunavem
Pas, nazdi Fir'avn ʙiraved va ʙigued: «Mo firistodai Parvardigori cahonijon hastem
[U mefarmojad] Ki Bani Isroilro hamrohi mo ʙifirist»
[Fir'avn] guft: «Ojo turo dar kudaki mijoni xes parvaris nadodem va solhoe az umratro ʙajni mo naʙudi
Va kori xudro – cunon ki xosti – kardi [va on mardi qiʙtiro kusti] va tu [nisʙat ʙa ne'mathoi man] nosiposi?!»
[Muso] guft: «Man on [kor]-ro zamone ancom dodam, ki gumroh ʙudam
Pas, cun az sumo tarsidam, firor kardam. On goh Parvardigoram ʙa man donis ʙaxsid va maro az pajomʙaron qaror dod
Va in [ci] ne'matest, ki tu ʙar man minnat meguzori, ki Bani Isroilro ʙardai xud soxtai?!»
Fir'avn guft: «Parvardigori cahonijon kist?»
[Muso] Guft: «Parvardigori osmonho va zamin va on ci mijoni onhost. Agar ahli jaqin hasted [tanho uro ʙiparasted]»
[Fir'avn] Ba kasone, ki dar atrofas ʙudand [ʙo tamasxur] guft: «Ojo mesunaved [ci megujad]?»
[Muso] Guft: «[Alloh taolo] Parvardigori sumo va Parvardigori nijogoni sumost
[Fir'avn] Guft: «In pajomʙaraton, ki ʙa suji sumo firistoda sudaast, jaqinan devona ast»
[Muso] Guft: «Agar ʙiandesed, [xohed donist, ki U] Parvardigori masriq va maƣriʙ ast va har on ci mijoni on du qaror dorad»
[Fir'avn] Guft: «Agar ma'ʙude cuz man ʙarguzini, hatman, zindonat mekunam»
[Muso] Guft: «Hatto agar nisonai oskore [dar mavridi risolatam] ʙarojat ovarda ʙosam?»
[Fir'avn] Guft: «Agar rost megui, onro ʙijovar»
Pas, [Muso] asoi xudro andoxt, nogahon [taʙdil ʙa] aƶdahoe oskor sud
Va dastasro [az gireʙon] ʙerun ovard va nogoh dar nazari ʙinandagon saped [-u ravsan] ʙud
[Fir'avn] ʙa ʙuzurgoni peromunas guft: «Haqqo, ki in [mard] codugari donost
[U] Mexohad, ʙo codujas sumoro az sarzaminaton ʙerun kunad, pas, nazaraton cist?»
Onon guftand: «[Tasmim dar ʙorai mucozoti] u va ʙarodarasro ʙa ta'xir andoz va ma'muroni cam'ovari [corzanandagon]-ro ʙa [hamai] sahrho ʙifirist
to har codugari mohir [va] donoero nazdat ʙijovarand»
Pas, [cunin kardand va sarancom] codugaron ʙaroi va'dagohi ruzi muajjan gird ovarda sudand
Va ʙa mardum gufta sud: «Ojo sumo [niz] cam' mesaved, to [ʙuʙinem ʙaranda kist]
Agar codugaron piruz sudand, [hamagi] az onon pajravi kunem»
Pas, vaqte codugaron omadand, ʙa Fir'avn guftand: «Agar mo piruz savem, ojo podose xohem dost»
U guft: «Ore, dar on surat, hatman, az nazdikonam xohed ʙud»
Muso ʙa onon guft: «Har ci [mexohed] ʙiafkaned, [aknun] ʙiafkaned»
Pas, onon resmonho va asohojasonro afkandand va guftand: «Ba izzati Fir'avn savgand, ki mo, hatman, piruzem»
Sipas Muso asojasro afkand, nogahon [taʙdil ʙa aƶdahoe sud va] on ciro, ki ʙa duruƣ soxta ʙudand, ʙal'id [furu ʙurd]
Pas, codugaron ʙa sacda daraftodand
[Va] Guftand: «Mo ʙa Parvardigori cahonijon imon ovardem
Parvardigori Muso va Horun»

[Fir'avn] Guft: «Ojo pes az on ki ʙa sumo icozat diham, ʙa u imon ovarded? Be tardid, u hamon ʙuzurgi sumost, ki ʙa sumo codu omuxtaast. Pas, ʙa zudi xohed donist [ki mucozotaton cist]. Jaqinan, dastho va pojhojatonro ʙar'aks [-i jakdigar az capu rost] qat' mekunam va hamagiatonro ʙa dor meovezam»
Onon guftand: «[Dar in sikanca va azoʙ] Hec zijone nest. Be tardid, mo ʙa suji Parvardigoramon ʙozmegardem
Umed dorem, ki Parvardigoramon gunohoni moro ʙuʙaxsad, ki mo naxustin kasone hastem, ki [az in qavm ʙa Parvardigori Muso] imon ovardem»
Va ʙa Muso vahj kardem, ki: «Bandagonamro saʙona [az Misr] ʙerun ʙiʙar; [zero sipohi Fir'avn] hatman, ʙa dunʙolaton xohad omad»
Pas Fir'avn [cun az mocaro ogoh gardid] ma'muroni cam'ovari [neru]-ro ʙa sahrho firistod
[Va e'lon kard] Inho [Bani Isroil] iddai nocizand
Va ciddan moro ʙa xasm ovardaand
Va mo hamagi komilan [husjoru] omodai pajkorem»
Pas, ononro az ʙoƣho va casmaho [-i sarzamini Misr] ʙerun ovardem
Va az gancho va xonahoi mucallal [dur soxtem]
Incunin [kardem] va Bani Isroilro vorisi on [sarvatu doroi] kardem
Pas, [sipohi Fir'avn] hangomi tului oftoʙ ʙa ta'qiʙi onon pardoxtand
Va cun du guruh jakdigarro didand, joroni Muso guftand: «Hatman, [dar cangoli fir'avnijon] giriftorem»
[Muso] Guft: «Hargiz! Be tardid, Parvardigoram ʙo man ast va maro [ʙa rohi nacot] hidojat xohad kard»
Pas, ʙa Muso vahj kardem: «Asojatro ʙa darjo ʙizan», pas, [Nil] sikofta sud va har ʙaxse [az on] hamcun kuhe ʙuzurg gast
Va on guruhi digar [sipohi Fir'avn]-ro ʙa on co kasondem
Va Muso va hamai kasonero, ki hamrohas ʙudand, nacot dodem
Va digaronro ƣarq namudem
Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast, vale ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
[Ej pajomʙar] Dostoni Iʙrohimro ʙar onon ʙozgu
Hangome ki ʙa padar va qavmas guft: «Ci cizro meparasted?»
Onon guftand: «Buthoero meparastem va pajvasta sar ʙar ostonason dorem»
[Iʙrohim] Guft: «Ojo vaqte onhoro mexoned, [sadoi] sumoro mesunavand
Jo ʙa sumo sudu zijon merasonand?»
Onon guftand: «[Na] Vale padaronamonro joftem, ki cunin mekardand»
[Iʙrohim] guft: «Ojo dided [va donisted] cizhoero, ki hamvora meparastided
[ham] sumo va [ham] padaronaton –
jaqinan, [hamai] onho dusmani [aqidai tavhidii] man hastand. Magar Parvardigori cahonijon
On [ma'ʙude], ki maro ofarida va hidojatam mekunad
Va hamone, ki ʙa man ƣizo medihad va seroʙam mesozad
Va hangome ki ʙemor mesavam, Ust, ki sifojam medihad
Va kase, ki maro memironad va [duʙora] zindaam mekunad
Va kase, ki umed doram ruzi cazo gunohonamro ʙuʙaxsad
Parvardigoro, ʙa man donise [dar din] ʙuʙaxs va maro ʙa soistagon mulhaq kun
Va ʙarojam dar ojandagon ovozai nek qaror ʙideh
Va maro az vorisoni ʙihisti purne'mat ʙigardon
Va padaramro ʙijomurz, [ki] ʙe tardid, dar zumrai gumrohon ʙud
Va ruze, ki [mardum] ʙarangexta mesavand, maro rasvo [va sarmanda] nasoz
Hamon ruze, ki molu farzandon sude nameʙaxsand
Magar kase, ki ʙo qalʙi pok [va xoli az sirku nifoq va rijo] ʙa pesgohi Alloh taolo ʙijojad»
Va [on ruz] ʙihist ʙaroi parhezkoron nazdik megardad
Va duzax ʙaroi gumrohon oskor mesavad
Va ʙa onon gufta mesavad: «On ci ʙa coi Alloh taolo meparastided, [aknun] kuco hastand
Ojo [onho dar ʙaroʙari azoʙi ilohi] joriaton mekunand jo [hatto xud]-ro jori medihand?»
Pas, onho [ʙutho] hamrohi gumrohon dar on [otasi havlangez] afkanda mesavand
Va [hamrohi] tamomi laskarijoni Iʙlis
Dar on co [musrikon] dar holi sitez [ʙo ma'ʙudoni ʙotil] megujand
«Ba Alloh taolo savgand, ki mo dar gumrohii oskore ʙudem»
On goh ki sumoro ʙo Parvardigori cahonijon ʙaroʙar medonistem
Va moro kase cuz mucrimon gumroh nakard
Pas, [aknun] na hec safoatgare dorem
Va na hec dusti mehruʙone
Pas, kos ʙozgaste [ʙa dunjo] dostem va dar zumrai mu'minon qaror megiriftem»
Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast, vale ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
Qavmi Nuh pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
On goh ki ʙarodarason Nuh ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned?»
Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙari amin hastam
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
Onon guftand: «Ojo ʙa tu imon ʙijovarem, dar hole ki [faqat] furumojagon] az tu pajravi kardaand?»
[Nuh] Guft: «Man ʙa on ci onon [dar guzasta] mekardand, ci donise doram
Hisoʙi onon tanho ʙo Parvardigori man ast. Agar mefahmed [cunin suxani gazofe nagued]
Va man [hargiz] mu'minonro tard [dur] namekunam
Man cuz ʙimdihandai oskor nestam»
Onon guftand: «Ej Nuh, agar [az da'vatat] dast ʙarnadori, hatman, sangsor mesavi»
U guft: «Parvardigoro, qavmam maro duruƣgu angostand
Pas, mijoni manu eson dovari kun va maro va mu'minonero, ki hamroham hastand, nacot ʙideh»
Pas, u va afrodero, ki hamrohas ʙudand, dar [on] kistii oganda [ pur az insonu hajvon] nacot dodem
Va ʙoqimondagonro ƣarq kardem
Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast, vale ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
[Qavmi] Od pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
On goh ki ʙarodarason Hud ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned?”
Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙari amin hastam
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Ojo ʙar har makoni ʙalande ʙinoe ʙehuda mesozed
Va qasrho va qal'ahoi muhkamu ustuvor ʙino mekuned, guijo [dar dunjo] covidonaed
Va cun [ʙa kase] hamlavar mesaved, [ʙerahm va] zolimona hamla mekuned
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
Va az kase parvo kuned, ki ʙa sumo [ne'mathoe cunon farovon] ato kardaast, ki xud [onhoro ʙehtar] medoned
U ʙa sumo cahorpojonu farzandon [-i ʙisjor] ato kardaast
Va ʙoƣho va casmasorho
Ba rosti, ki man az azoʙi ruzi ʙuzurg ʙar sumo metarsam”
Onon guftand: “Ci moro pand ʙidihi, jo nadihi, ʙarojamon jakson ast [va az tu toat namekunem]
In [oini mo hamon] ravisi pesinijon ast
va mo [hargiz] azoʙ naxohem sud»
Pas, onon Hudro duruƣgu angostand. Pas, Mo [niz] halokason kardem. Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
[Qavmi] Samud pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
On goh ki ʙarodarason Soleh ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙari amin hastam
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Ojo [mepindored, ki] sumoro dar ne'mathoe, ki in cost, osuda raho mekunand
Dar [in] ʙoƣho va casmasorho
Va [dar kanori in] kistzorho va naxlhoe, ki mevahojas narmu rasidaast
Va mohirona az kuhho [ʙaroi xud] xonahoe metarosed
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
Va az isrofkoron [-i gunahgor] pajravi nakuned
[Hamon] Kasone, ki dar zamin ʙa fasod mepardozand va [xestanro] isloh namekunand”
Onon guftand: “[Ej Soleh] Cuz in nest, ki tu codusudai
Tu cuz ʙasare hammonandi mo nesti, pas, agar rost megui, nisonae [ʙar pajomʙariat] ʙijovar”
[Soleh] Guft: «In modasuturest, ki sahme az oʙ [-i casma] dorad va [ruzhoi muajjane niz] sumo sahme az oʙ dored
Pas, [kamtarin] ozore ʙa on narasoned, ki azoʙi ruzi ʙuzurg sumoro faro megirad”
Pas, onro [zaxmi kardand va] kustand va [on goh az kardai xud] pusajmon sudand
Pas, azoʙ [-i ilohi] ononro furu girift. Be gumon, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
Qavmi Lut [niz] pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
On goh ki ʙarodarason Lut ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙare amin hastam
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Az mardumi cahon ʙo mardon meomezed
va hamsaronero, ki Alloh taolo ʙarojaton ofaridaast, raho mekuned? Balki sumo guruhi mutacovized
Onon guftand: «Ej Lut, agar [az in amru nahj] dast ʙarnadori, hatman, [az sahr] ixroc mesavi»
[Lut] Guft: «Man dusmani [sarsaxti] in koraton hastam
Parvardigoro, man va xonavodaamro az [oqiʙati] on ci [inho] ancom medihand, nacot deh»
Pas, mo u va hamai xonavodaasro nacot dodem
Magar pirazane, ki dar mijoni ʙozmondagon [dar azoʙ] ʙud
Sipas digaronro noʙud kardem
Va ʙar onon ʙorone [az sang] ʙoronidem va ʙoroni ʙimdodasudagon ci ʙad ʙud
Be gumon, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
Ashoʙi Ajka [niz] pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
On goh ki Suajʙ ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙare amin hastam
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned [ʙitarsed] va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Pajmonaro tamom ʙidihed va kamfurusi nakuned
Va ʙo tarozui durust vazn kuned
Va koloi mardumro kam nadihed [va haqqasonro zoe' nakuned] va dar zamin ʙa fasod [va taʙohi] nakused
Va az kase, ki sumo va ummathoi pesinro ofarid, parvo kuned [ʙitarsed]
Onon guftand: «[Ej Suajʙ] Cuz in nest, ki tu codusudai
Tu cuz ʙasare hammonandi mo nesti va mo turo duruƣgu mepindorem
Pas, agar rost megui, porae az osmonro ʙar [sari] mo ʙiandoz»
[Suajʙ] Guft: «Parvardigoram ʙa on ci mekuned, donotar ast»
Pas, uro duruƣgu angostand va azoʙi ruzi aʙr [-i otasʙor] ononro faro girift. Ba rosti, ki on [ʙoroni otas] azoʙi ruzi havlnoke ʙud
Be gumon, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast; va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
Va ʙa rosti, [in] Qur'on furufiristodai Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Ruhu-l-amin [Caʙrail] onro furud ovardaast
Bar qalʙi tu [nozil kardaast], to ʙimdihanda ʙosi
[Qur'onro] Ba zaʙoni araʙii ravsan [nozil namud]
Va ʙe tardid, [ʙasorati nuzuli] on dar kitoʙhoi pesinijon [niz omada] ast
Ojo hamin nisona ʙarojason kofi nest, ki ulamoi Bani Isroil az [haqiqati] Qur'on ogohand
Va agar onro ʙar ʙa'ze az ƣajriaraʙho nozil mekardem
Va [pajomʙar] onro ʙarojason mexond, ʙa on imon nameovardand
[Ore] In guna on [kufru takziʙ]-ro dar dilhoi gunahgoron coj dodem
Ammo ʙa on imon nameovarand, to on goh ki azoʙi dardnokro ʙuʙinand
Pas, nogahon dar hole ki ʙexaʙarand, ʙa suroƣason meojad
Pas, [dar on hol] megujand: “Ojo muhlate [ʙaroi tavʙa] xohem dost?”
Ojo onon azoʙi moro ʙa sitoʙ xostorand
Ojo donisti, ki agar ononro solho [az zindagii dunjo] ʙahramand sozem
Sipas on ci ki ʙa onon va'da doda sudaast, ʙa suroƣasonn ʙijojad
In ʙahramandiason [az dunjo dar hangomi azoʙ] sude ʙarojason naxohad dost
Va Mo [sokinoni] hec sahrero halok nakardem, magar in ki husdordihandagone [az pajomʙaron] dostand
To ononro pand dihand va Mo hargiz sitamgor naʙudaem [ki itmomi huccat nakunem]
Va in Qur'onro sajotin nozil nakardaand
Onon na darxuri in korand va na tavonasro dorand
Be tardid, onon az sunidani [vahj] ʙarkanorand
Pas, [ej pajomʙar] hec ma'ʙudero ʙo Alloh taolo maxon, ki azoʙ xohi sud
Va xesovandoni nazdikatro [az azoʙi ilohi] ʙim deh
Va ʙo mu'minone, ki az tu pajravi kardaand, mehruʙon [-u furutan] ʙos
Pas, agar az [farmoni] tu sarpeci kardand, ʙigu: “Ba rosti, man az on ci mekuned, ʙezoram”
Va ʙar [Allohi] sikastnopaziri mehruʙon tavakkal kun
Hamon ki cun [ʙaroi iʙodat] ʙarmexezi, turo meʙinad
Va harakat [va nisastu ʙarxosti] turo mijoni sacdakunandagon [meʙinad]
Be tardid, U hamon sunavoi donost
Ojo ʙa sumo xaʙar diham, ki sajotin ʙar ci kase nozil mesavand
Bar har duruƣgui gunahkor
Onon sunidahoe [-ro, ki duzdona az malakut gus dodaand, ʙa codugaron va folgiron] ilqo mekunand va ʙestarason duruƣgu hastand
Va [Muhammad soir nest, zero] soironro gumrohon pajravi mekunand
Ojo nadidi, ki onon dar har laƣvu ʙehudae [hajronu] sargastaand
Va cizero megujand, ki [xud ʙa on e'tiqod nadorand va] amal namekunand

Magar kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand va Allohro ʙisjor jod kardaand va pas az on ki sitam didand, intiqom giriftand [va ʙo se'ri xud az islomu muslimin difo' namudand] va kasone, ki sitam kardand, ʙa zudi xohand donist, ʙa ci ʙozgastgohe ʙozmegardand
To, sin. In ojoti Qur'on va kitoʙe ravsangar ast
[Ki] Hidojatu ʙasorate ʙaroi mu'minon ast
[Hamon] Kasone, ki namoz ʙarpo medorand va zakot mepardozand va ʙa oxirat jaqin dorand
Dar haqiqat, kasone, ki ʙa oxirat imon nameovarand, a'molasonro ʙarojason orostaem, pas, [kurdilu] sargastaand
Ononand, ki azoʙi dardnok [dar pes] dorand va dar oxirat zijonkortarand
Va [ej pajomʙar] jaqinan, tu Qur'onro az pesgohi [Parvardigori] hakimi dono darjoft mekuni
[Jod kun az] Hangome ki Muso ʙa xonavodaas guft: “[Biisted] Man otase [az dur] didam. Ba zudi xaʙare az on ʙarojaton meovaram jo su'lai otase meovaram, to garm saved”
Pas, cun ʙa on [otas] rasid, nido doda sud, ki: “Muʙorak [va xucasta] ʙod on ki dar otas ast va har [faristae], ki peromuni on ast va poku munazzah ast Alloh taolo – Parvardigori cahonijon
Ej Muso, ʙa rosti, ki Manam Allohi sikastnopaziri hakim

Va asojatro ʙiafkan. Pas, cun [Muso] onro did, ki hamcun more [ʙo sur'at] mexazad, [az tars] pust kard va gurext va ʙoznagast. [Nido omad] “Ej Muso, natars! Pajomʙaron dar pesgohi Man hec tarse nadorand
Ammo kase, ki sitam kunad, on goh [pas az tavʙa] ʙadiro ʙa neki taʙdil namojad, [ʙidonad, ki] ʙe tardid, Man omurzandai mehruʙonam

Va dastatro dar gireʙon furu ʙar, [to] saped va ʙiduni ajʙ [-u ʙemorii pesi] xoric savad. [In mu'cizaest] Dar zumrai mu'cizoti nuhgona [ki ʙojad] ʙa suji Fir'avn va qavmas [ʙiʙari, caro ki] ʙe tardid, onon guruhe nofarmonand”
Pas, cun ojoti Mo ravsan [-u vozeh] ʙa sujason omad, guftand: “In codue oskor ast”
Va onhoro az rui sitamu sarkasi inkor kardand, dar hole ki dilhojason ʙa onho jaqin dostand; pas ʙingar, ki sarancomi mufsidon ci guna ʙuvad
Va ʙa rosti, ʙa Dovud va Sulajmon donise [azim] dodem va onon guftand: “Sitois az oni Alloh taolo ast, ki moro ʙar ʙisjore az ʙandagoni mu'mini xud ʙartari ʙaxsid”
Va Sulajmon az Dovud meros ʙurd va guft: “Ej mardum, [fahmi] zaʙoni parandagon ʙa mo omuxta suda va az har ciz ʙa mo [ʙahrae] dodaand. Be tardid, in fazle oskor [az coniʙi Parvardigor] ast”
Va sipohijoni Sulajmon – az cinnu ins va parandagon – nazdas gird omadand; on goh munazzam [va pajvasta dar kanori jakdigar] meraftand

[Onon ʙa rohi xud idoma dodand], to vaqte ʙa sarzamini murcagon [dar Som] rasidand. Murcae guft: "Ej murcagon, ʙa lonahoi xud ʙiraved, to Sulajmon va laskarijonas sumoro [nadida va] nadonista pojmol nakunand”

Pas [Sulajmon] az suxani on [murca] xandid va guft: «Parvardigoro, ʙa man tavfiq ʙideh, to sukri ne'matero, ki ʙar man va ʙar padaru modaram arzoni dostai ʙa coj ovaram va [joriam kun, to] kore soistae ancom diham, ki mojai xusnudiat gardad va ʙa rahmati xes maro dar cam'i ʙandagoni soistaat vorid kun”
Va [Sulajmon holi] parandagonro cujo sud va guft: «Ci sudaast, ki hudhudro nameʙinam? [Ojo coje pinhon suda] jo ƣoiʙ ast
[Pas, cun uro najoft guft] Hatman, ʙa saxti mucozot mekunam jo sarasro meʙuram, magar on ki daleli ravsane [ʙaroi ƣajʙatas] ʙijovarad»
Pas, dere napoid [ki hudhud omad] va guft: «Az cize ogohi joftaam, ki tu ʙad-on ogohi najoftai va az [sarzamini] Saʙa' ʙarojat xaʙare ʙoe'timod ovardaam
Man [on co] zanero joftaam, ki ʙar onon farmonravoi mekunad va [ʙa u] az har guna ne'mate dodaand va taxti ʙuzurge dorad
U va qavmasro didam, ki ʙa coji Alloh taolo ʙaroi xursed sacda mekunand va sajton korhoi [ʙotili] ononro ʙarojason orosta va esonro az roh [-i rost] ʙozdostaast, az in ru, hidojat namesavand»
[Sajton fireʙason dodaast] To ʙaroi Alloh taolo sacda nakunand [hamon ma'ʙude], ki nihoni osmonho va zaminro oskor mekunad va on ciro, ki pinhon mekuned va oskor mesozed, [hamaro] medonad
Alloh taolo, ki hec ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] cuz u nest, Parvardigori Arsi ʙuzurg ast
[Sulajmon] guft: «Xohem did, ki ojo rost guftai jo duruƣgui
In nomai maro ʙiʙar va ʙa suji onon ʙijafkan, on goh dur sav va [dar gusae ʙiist va] ʙingar, ki [dar ʙorai on] ci megujand»
[Malikai Saʙa'] guft: «Ej ʙuzurgon, nomai arcmande ʙa suji man afkanda sudaast
In [noma] az coniʙi Sulajmon ast va cunin ast: «Ba nomi Allohi ʙaxsandai mehruʙon
Bar man ʙartari macued va dar hole ki [az sirk dast ʙardosta va] taslim [-i haq va tavhid] sudaed, nazdi man ʙijoed»
[Malika] Guft: «Ej ʙuzurgon, nazari xudro dar in mavrid ʙigued, [caro ki] man hargiz ʙiduni huzur [-u masvarat]-i sumo dar ʙorai kore tasmim nagiriftaam»
Onon guftand: «Mo nerui ʙisjor va cangcujoni qudratmande dorem, vale ixtijor [-u tasmimi nihoi] ʙo tust. Pas, ʙarrasi kun, ki ci dasture ʙidihi»
[Malika] guft: «Be tardid, vaqte podsohon [ʙa unvoni foteh] voridi sahre mesavand, onro vajron [va taʙoh] mesozand va ʙuzurgonasro xoru zalil mekunand va raftorason hamvora cunin ʙudaast
Va man hadjae ʙarojason mefiristam va muntazir memonam, to ʙuʙinam, ki firistodagon ci posuxe [ʙarojam] meovarand»

Pas, cun [firistodai malika] nazdi Sulajmon omad, [Sulajmon] guft: «Ojo [mexohed] ʙo mol [-u sarvat] ʙa man kumak kuned? On ci Alloh taolo [az pajomʙari va donisu farmonravi] ʙa man ʙaxsida, az on cize, ki ʙa sumo ato karda ʙehtar ast, ʙalki sumoed, ki ʙa hadjai xes [va sarvathoi dunjo] sodmon mesaved
Nazdi onon ʙozgard [va ʙigu, ki] hatman, ʙo laskarijone ʙa sujason xohem omad, ki tavoni muqoʙila ʙo onro nadosta ʙosand va ʙe tardid, ononro az on [sarzamin] xoru zor ʙerun mekunem»
[On goh] Guft: «Ej ʙuzurgon, kadom jake az sumo, pes az on ki onon taslimsuda nazdi man ʙijojand, taxti uro ʙarojam meovarad?»
Jake az cinnijoni tanumand guft: «Pes az on ki az cojat ʙarxezi, man onro nazdat meovaram va hatman, ʙaroi ancomi in kor nerumandu aminam»

Kase, ki donise az kitoʙ [-i ilohi] dost, guft: «Pes az on ki casm ʙar ham ʙizani, onro ʙarojat meovaram». Pas, cun [Sulajmon] on [taxt]-ro nazdi xud mustaqar did, guft: «In az fazli Parvardigori man ast, to ʙiozmojadam, ki ojo sipos medoram jo nosiposi mekunam. Pas, har ki sipos guzorad, tanho ʙa sudi xes sipos meguzorad va har ki nosiposi kunad, pas, [ʙa zijoni xud nosiposi kardaast, caro ki] ʙe tardid, Parvardigoram ʙenijozi karim ast
[Sulajmon] guft: «Taxtasro [taƣjiri sakl dihed va] ʙarojas nosinos kuned, to ʙuʙinam, ojo [onro] tasxis medihad jo az kasonest, ki [asjo va amvoli xudro] namesinosand

Pas, cun [malikai Saʙa'] omad, [ʙa u] gufta sud: «Ojo taxti tu in guna ast?». [Malika] guft: «Gujo hamon ast». Va [Sulajmon guft] «In donis [va tavonoi] pes az in ʙa mo doda sudaast va hamvora farmonʙardor ʙudaem»
Va on ci ʙa coji Alloh taolo meparasted, uro [az imon va tavhid] ʙozdosta ʙud. Be tardid, [malika] az cumlai kofiron ʙud

Ba vaj gufta sud: «Ba sahn [-i qasr] vorid sav». Pas, hangome ki onro did, pindost, ki oʙi amiqest va coma az soqho [-i poi] xes ʙolo kasid [to az oʙ ʙigzarad. Sulajmon] Guft: «In [oʙ nest, ʙalki] koxe ast, ki ʙo [qitaoti ʙulur fars sudaast». [On goh uro ʙa tavhid da'vat kard. Malikai Saʙa'] Guft: «Parvardigoro, man ʙa xud sitam kardaam va [inak] hamrohi Sulajmon taslimi Alloh taolo – Parvardigori cahonijon – sudam»
Va ʙa suji qavmi Samud ʙarodarason Solehro firistodem, ki [ʙigujad] «Allohi jagonaro ʙiparasted», vale onon ʙa du guruh [mu'minon va kofiron] taqsim sudand va ʙa sitez pardoxtand
[Soleh] Guft: «Ej qavmi man, caro ʙa coji rahmat sitoʙzada xohoni azoʙi ilohi hasted? Caro az Alloh taolo omurzis namexohed? Bosad, ki mavridi rahmat qaror gired»
Onon guftand: «Mo tu va kasonero, ki hamrohat hastand, ʙa foli ʙad giriftaem». [Soleh] Guft: «Foli ʙadi sumo [va donisi on] nazdi Alloh taolo ast, ʙalki sumo guruhe hasted, ki ozmois mesaved»
Va dar sahr [-i Hicr] nuh nafar [sardastai guruh] ʙudand, ki dar on sarzamin ʙa fasod mepardoxtand va [hec] kori soistae namekardand

[Onon ʙa jakdigar] Guftand: «Ba Alloh taolo savgand jod kuned, ki ʙar u [Soleh] va xonavodaas saʙexun ʙizanem [va ononro ʙikusem]. On goh ʙa xunxohas ʙiguem: «Mo hangomi kustori xonavodaas hozir naʙudem va hatman, rost meguem»
Onon [ʙaroi qatli Soleh va pajravonas] najrange ʙa kor ʙurdand va Mo [ʙaroi noʙudii kofiron] niz najrange andesidem, dar hole ki onon namedonistand
Pas, ʙingar oqiʙati najrangason ci sud: mo hamai on afrod va qavmasonro noʙud kardem
Inak xonahojason ʙa sazoi sitame, ki kardand, [vajronu] tihi mondaast. Be gumon, dar in [kajfar] ʙaroi kasone, ki medonand [va imon dorand] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast
Va kasonero, ki imon ovarda va parhezkor ʙudand, [hamrohi Soleh] nacot dodem
Va [jod kun az] Lut on goh ki ʙa qavmas guft: «Bo on ki [zisti va gunohi livotro] medoned, ojo [ʙoz ham] murtakiʙi in amali ʙesarmona mesaved
Ojo az ruji sahvat ʙa coji zanon ʙo mardon darmeomezed? Balki sumo guruhe nodoned»
Pas, posuxi qavmas cuz in naʙud, ki [ʙa jakdigar] guftand: «Xonavodai Lutro az sahri xud ʙerun kuned, [caro ki] ʙe tardid, inho afrode pokdoman [muqaddasmaoʙ] hastand»
On goh u va xonavodaasro nacot dodem, magar hamsarasro, ki muqaddar kardem az ʙozmondagon [dar azoʙ] ʙosad
Va ʙar onon ʙorone [az sang] ʙorondem va ʙoroni ʙimdodasudagon ci ʙad ʙuvad
