[Ej pajomʙar, ʙa musrikon] ʙigu: «Ci kase az osmonho va zamin ʙa sumo ruzi medihad?» [Dar posux] ʙigu: «Alloh taolo; va jaqinan [jak guruh az ʙajni] mo va sumost jo ʙar [rohi] hidojat jo dar gumrohii oskor»
Bigu: «[Ruzi qijomat] Sumo az gunohe, ki mo murtakiʙ sudaem, ʙozxost namesaved va moro [niz] ʙa xotiri on ci sumo ancom medihed, ʙozxost namekunand
Bigu: «[On ruz] Parvardigoramon [hamai] moro gird meovarad, sipas mijoni mo ʙa haq [va adolat] dovari mekunad va U dovari donost»
Bigu: «Kasonero, ki [dar qudrat va tadʙir] sariki U [Alloh taolo] soxtaed, nisonam dihed. Hargiz [cunin nest, ki mepindored], ʙalki U sikastnopaziri hakim ast
[Ej pajomʙar] Mo turo cuz ʙasoratʙaxs va ʙimdihandae ʙaroi hamai mardum nafiristodaem; ammo ʙestari mardum [in haqiqatro] namedonand
Va [kofiron] megujand: «Agar rostgued, in va'da [qijomat] kaj xohad ʙud?»
Bigu: «Va'dagohaton ruzest, ki na soate az on ta'xir mekuned va na [ʙar on] pesi megired»

Va kasone, ki kufr varzidand megujand: «Mo hargiz ʙa in Qur'on va ʙa on [kitoʙhoe], ki pes az on ʙudaast, imon nameovarem». Kos medidi on vaqtro, ki in sitamgoron dar pesgohi Parvardigorason nigoh dosta mesavand [va] suxani jakdigarro rad mekunand [va har jak gunohro ʙa gardani digare meandozad]. Onon, ki [dar dunjo] ʙa notavoni kasida suda ʙudand ʙa kasone, ki gardankasi mekardand, megujand: «Agar sumo naʙuded, mo hatman, imon meovardem»

Onon, ki gardankasi mekardand, [dar posux ʙa] kasone, ki ʙa notavoni kasida suda ʙudand, megujand: «Ojo mo [ʙudem, ki] sumoro az hidojat-pas az on ki ʙa sujaton omad- ʙozdostem? [Hargiz] Balki sumo xud gunahgor [va ahli fasod] ʙuded»

Onon, ki ʙa notavoni kasida suda ʙadand, ʙa kasone, ki gardankasi mekardand, megujand: «[Cunin nest] ʙalki najrangi saʙu ruz [-i sumo saʙaʙ sud, ki az hidojat ʙozmonem] ongoh, ki ʙa mo dastur medoded, ʙa Alloh taolo kofir savem va ʙarojas [dar qudrat va parastis] hamtojone qaror dihem». Onon hangome ki azoʙ [-i ilohi]-ro meʙinand, pusajmonii xudro [dar dil] pinhon mekunand va Mo ƣulu zancirhoro dar gardani onone, ki kufr varzidaand, meandozem. Ojo cuz [ʙa kajfari] on ci mekardand, mucozot mesavand
Va dar hec sahre ʙimdihandae nafiristodem, magar in ki sarvatmandoni sarkasi onco guftand: «Pajomero, ki ma'mur ʙa [iʙloƣi] on sudaed, hatman, inkor mekunem»
Onon meguftand: «Amvol va farzandoni mo [az sumo] ʙestar ast va hargiz mucozot naxohem sud»
[Ej pajomʙar] ʙigu: «Be tardid, Parvardigoram [ʙaroi ozmoisi mardum, ne'mat va] ruziro ʙar har ki ʙixohad, gusturda medorad va [jo] tang megirad; vale ʙestari mardum namedonand

Va amvolu farzandonaton [fazilate] nest, ki sumoro ʙa pesgohi Mo nazdik sozad, magar kase, ki imon ovarda va kore soista ancom dodaast; pas, onon dar ʙaroʙari on ci kardaand, podosi ducandon dorand va dar xonahoi ʙalandi ʙihist dar amnu osoisand
Va kasone, ki dar [dur kardani mardum az] ojoti Mo mekusand, to [ʙa pindori xes] Moro darmonda kunand, ononand, ki [ʙa azoʙi duzax] faro xonda mesavand

[Ej Pajomʙar] Bigu: «Be tardid, Parvardigoram [ne'mat va] ruziro ʙar har ki ʙixohad, gusturda medorad va [jo] tang megirad; va har cizero [ki dar rohi Alloh taolo] infoq kuned, U ʙa coji on [mol- va ʙehtar az on –ʙa sumo] ʙozpas medihad; va U ʙehtarin ruzidihanda ast»
Va [jod kun az] ruze, ki Alloh taolo hamai ononro ʙarmeangezad, ongoh ʙa faristagon megujad: «Ojo inho sumoro meparastidand?»
[Faristagon] megujand: «Tu munazzahi; [dust va] korsozi mo Tu hasti, na onon; ʙalki [in musrikon] sajotinro meparastidand va ʙestarason ʙa onho imon dostand»
Pas, imruz hec jak az sumo sud va zijone ʙaroi digare nadorad; va ʙa kasone, ki [ʙo sirk varzidan] ʙa xud sitam mekardand, meguem: «Bicased azoʙi otasero, ki duruƣas meangosted

Va hangome ki ojoti ravsani Mo ʙar onon [kofiron] xonda mesavad, megujand: «In cuz marde nest, ki mexohad sumoro az on ci padaronaton meparastidand, ʙozdorad»; va [niz] megujand: «In [Qur'on] cuz duruƣe ʙarʙofta nest»; va kasone, ki kufr varzidand, dar ʙorai haq – vaqte ʙa sujason omad – guftand: «In [Qur'on, cize] nest, magar codue oskor»
Mo [pes az in Qur'on] hec kitoʙe ʙa onon [musrikon] nadodaem, ki onro ʙixonand [va ʙo istinod ʙa matoliʙas turo duruƣgu ʙidonand] va pes az tu hec ʙimdihandae ʙa sujason nafiristodaem

Kasone, ki pes az onon ʙudand [niz pajomʙaroni ilohiro] duruƣgu angostand va [in dar hole ast, ki musrikoni qavmi tu, hatto] ʙa dahjaki on ci [az qudratu sarvat] ʙa onon doda ʙudem, narasidaand, vale [on kofiron] pajomʙaronamro duruƣgu angostand; pas, [ʙingar, ki] kajfari Man ci guna ʙud

[Ej Pajomʙar, ʙa musrikon] ʙigu: «Man faqat sumoro ʙa jak [suxan] pand mediham, ki: du-du va jak-jak [guruh-guruh jo infirodi] ʙaroi Alloh taolo ʙarxezed, sipas [dar ahvol va zindagii pajomʙar] ʙijandesed, [to ʙidoned, ki] in hamnisini sumo [Muhammad] devona nest; u ʙimdihandaest, ki pes az [faro rasidani] azoʙi saxt, ʙaroi [hidojati] sumo omadaast»
Bigu: «Har podose, ki [ʙaroi risolatam] az sumo xostaam, ʙaroi xudaton ʙosad. Podosi man cuz ʙar [uhdai] Alloh taolo nest va U ʙar har cize guvoh ast»
Bigu: «Jaqinan Parvardigoram, ki donoi rozhoi nihon ast, [istidlolhoi] haqro ʙar ʙotil furu meafkanad [va onro noʙud mesozad]»
Bigu: «Haq [Islom] faro rasid va ʙotil nametavonad [ta'sir va qudrati cadide] oƣoz kunad va na [nufuzi guzastaasro] ʙozgardonad

Bigu: «Agar [man ʙo rasondani in pajom] gumroh suda ʙosam, cuz in nest, ki ʙa zijoni xes gumroh sudaam va agar hidojat jofta ʙosam, ʙa saʙaʙi on [suxane] ast, ki Parvardigoram ʙar man vahj mekunad. Be tardid, U sunavo [va] nazdik ast»
Kos hangomero medidi, ki [kofiron az musohidai azoʙ] vahsatzada mesavand va [hec rohi] gureze nest va ononro az coji nazdike [ki intizorasro nadorand] dastgir mekunand
Onon [dar in hol] megujand: «Ba in [qijomat] imon ovardem»; va [aknun, ki murdaand] ci guna az coji [cunin] dur dastrasi [ʙa imon] ʙarojason mumkin ast
Hol on ki onon dar dunjo in [qijomat]-ro inkor mekardand va az dur [va ʙiduni donis va ogohi, ʙa Pajomʙar] nisʙathoi noravo medonand

Va [sarancom] mijoni onon va on ci [az lazzathoi dunjavi] ki xus dorand, cudoi aftod; cunonki pes az in niz ʙo amsoli [va hamfikroni] eson niz cunin raftore sud [caro ki] jaqinan onon [niz nisʙat ʙa qijomat] saxt dar tardid ʙudand

Sipos [va sitois] az oni Allohi ofarinandai osmonho va zamin ast; [Parvardigore, ki] faristagonro ʙo ʙolhoi dugona va segona va cahorgona, firistodagon [-i xes ʙa suji mardum] qaror dod [va] har ci ʙixohad dar ofarinis meafzojad. Be tardid, Alloh taolo ʙar har cize tavonost
Har [ʙaxsois va] rahmate, ki Alloh taolo ʙaroi mardumon ʙikusojad, hec ʙozdorandae ʙarojas nest va har ciro ʙozgirad, firistandae pas az U vucud nadorad; va U sikastnopaziru hakim ast
Ej mardum, ne'mati Allohro ʙar xud ʙa jod ovared. Ojo ofarinandae cuz Alloh taolo hast, ki sumoro az osmon va zamin ruzi dihad? Hec ma'ʙude cuz U nest. Pas, ci guna [az haq] munharif mesaved
[Ej pajomʙar] Agar musrikon turo duruƣgu meangorand [ƣamgin maʙos; zero] pajomʙaroni pes az turo niz duruƣgu angostand va [sarancom hamai] korho ʙa Alloh taolo ʙoz gardonida mesavad

Ej mardum, jaqinan, va'dai Alloh taolo [dar mavridi qijomat] haq ast; pas, [husjor ʙosed, ki lazzathoi] zindagii dunjo sumoro nafireʙad va sajton sumoro nisʙat ʙa [ta'xir dar azoʙ va sikeʙoi] Alloh taolo nafireʙad
Be tardid, sajton dusmani sumost; pas, sumo niz uro dusman [-i xud] gired. Cuz in nest, ki u pajravonasro [ʙa kufr] mexonad, to az ahli otas ʙosand
Kasone, ki kufr varzidaand, azoʙe saxt [dar pes] dorand va kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand omurzis va podose ʙuzurg [dar itizor] dorand

Pas, ojo kase, ki kirdori zistas dar nazaras orosta gastaast va onro neku meʙinad [hamcun mu'mini haqiqatʙin ast?] pas, ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo har kiro xohad gumroh mesozad va har kiro ʙixohad hidojat mekunad; pas, [ej pajomʙar] vucudatro ʙa xotiri dareƣho [-i farovon] ʙar [gumrohii] onon taʙoh nakun. Be tardid, Alloh taolo ʙar on ci mekunand, ogoh ast

Alloh taolo ast, ki ʙodhoro ravon mekunad va [onho niz] aʙrero ʙarmeangezand; sipas Mo on [aʙr]-ro ʙa suji sarzamine [xusk va] murda mefiristem va ʙa [vasilai] on zaminro – pas az xuski va xazonas–zinda mekunem. Barangextan [-i murdagon az qaʙrho niz] cunin ast

Har ki sarʙalandi [-i dunjo va oxiratro] mexohad, [ʙidonad, ki] sarʙalandi hama az oni Alloh taolo ast. Guftori pok [va zikri ilohi] ʙa sujas avc megirad va kirdori soistai on [guftor]-ro ʙolo meʙarad; va onon, ki zistiho [va gunohon]-ro dasisacini mekunand, azoʙi saxte [dar pes] dorand va [naqsa va] najrangason noʙud megardad

Va Alloh taolo [naxustin] sumoro az xoke ofarid va on goh [farzandonas] az nutfae [padid ovard]; sipas sumoro cuftho [-i jakdigar] qaror dod. Hec [condori] modae ʙordor namesavad va zojmon namekunad, magar ʙo donis [va ogohii] U; va hec [condori] kuhansole umri tuloni namekunad va az umras kosta namegrdad, magar on ki dar kitoʙe [Lavhi mahfuz] saʙt ast. Ba rosti, ki in kor ʙaroi Alloh taolo oson ast

Va on du darjo jakson nestand: in jake sirin va xusguvor ast va nusidanas guvorost va on jake suru talx ast; va az [sajdi] har jak guste toza mexured va zevare [hamcun marvorid va marcon az a'moqas] ʙerun meovared, ki onhoro ʙar tan mekuned; va kistihoro dar on darjo meʙini, ki [sinai amvocro] mesikofand, to az ʙaxsoisi on ʙahramand garded; ʙosad, ki sipos guzored

[Alloh taolo] saʙro dar ruz darmeovarad va ruzro dar saʙ darmeovarad [va incunin ʙar tuli har jake meafzojad] va xursed va mohro ʙa xidmat [-i inson] gumost, ki har jak to zamone muajjan [ dar madori xud] ravon ʙosand. In ast Alloh taolo–Parvardgori sumo; farmonravoi az oni Ust va kasonero, ki ʙa coji U mexoned, [dar ʙaroʙaras cunon faqirand, ki hatto] pusti hastai xurmoero doro nestand

Agar ononro ʙixoned, sadojatonro namesunavand va [ʙa farzi mahol] agar ʙisnavand, posuxatonro namedihand va ruzi qijomat az sirki sumo ʙezori mecujand; va [ej pajomʙar] hec kas hamcun [Parvardgori] ogoh turo [az haqoiq] xaʙardor namesozad
Ej mardum, [hamai] sumo ʙa Alloh taolo nijozmanded va [tanho] Alloh taolo ast, ki ʙenijozi sutuda ast
U agar ʙixohad, sumoro [az mijon] meʙarad va ofarinise cadid [ʙa coji sumo padid] meovarad
Va [ancomi] in kor ʙaroi Alloh taolo dusvor nest

Va hec gunahgore, ʙori gunohi digarero ʙa dus namegirad va agar [saxsi] garonʙore, [digarero] ʙaroi hamli ʙori [gunohoni] xes faro ʙixonad, [cize az on ʙor] ʙardosta namesavad; harcand, ki u xesovand [-i nazdikas] ʙosad. [Ej pajomʙar] Cuz in nest, ki tu faqat ʙa kasone husdor medihi, ki dar nihon az [mucozoti] Parvardgorason metarsand va namoz ʙarpo medorand. Har ki [az gunohon] pok savad, pas? jaqinan tanho ʙa sudi xes pok gastaast va ʙozgast [-i hama] ʙa suji Alloh taolo ast
Va [kofir va mu'min ʙaroʙar nestand; cunonki] noʙino va ʙino jakson nestand
Va na torikiho va nur
Va na soja va ʙodi suzon
Va zindagon va murdagon jakson nestand. Be tardid, Alloh taolo [nidoi haqro] ʙa gusi har ki ʙixohad merasonad va tu [ej pajomʙar] nametavoni kasonero, ki dar gurho hastand, sunavo sozi
Tu cuz ʙimdihandae [ʙes] nesti
Ba rosti, Mo turo ʙa haq ʙasoratdihanda va ʙimdihanda firistodem va [dar naslhoi guzasta niz] hec ummate naʙud, magar on ki mijonason ʙimdihandae guzasta ast

Va agar [musrikon] turo duruƣgu meangorand, [aciʙ nest; caro ki] ʙe tardid, kasone, ki pes az onon ʙudand, [niz] pajomʙaronasonro, ki ʙo daloili ravsan va kitoʙhoi osmoni va kitoʙi ravsangar ʙa suroƣason omadand, duruƣgu angostand
On goh [Man niz] kasonero, ki kufr varzida ʙudand, noʙud kardam; pas, [ʙingar, ki] kajfari Man ci guna ʙud

Ojo nadidai, ki Alloh taolo az osmon oʙe nozil kard va ʙa [vasilai] on [az daraxtoni muxtalif] mevahoe padid ovardem, ki ranghojas gunogun ast va az kuhho [niz ragaho va] rohhoe safed va qirmiz va komilan sijoh [ofaridem], ki ranghojas gunogun ast

Va hamcunin az insonho va cunʙandagon va cahorpojon [niz maxluqote ofaridem, ki] ranghojas gunogun ast. Ba rosti, az [mijoni] ʙandagoni Alloh taolo, tanho donojon [hastand, ki ʙa sifot va ahkomi ilohi ogohi dorand va] az U metarsand. Be tardid, Alloh taolo sikastnopaziri omurzanda ast

Dar haqiqat, kasone, ki kitoʙi Allohro mexonand va namoz ʙarpo medorand va az on ci ʙa eson ruzi dodaem, pinhonu oskor infoq mekunand, ʙa ticorate [pursud] umed dorand, ki hargiz zijon [va kasodi] nadorad
To [Alloh taolo] podosasonro ʙa tamomi ʙidihad va az fazli xes ʙar [haqqi] onon ʙiafzojad. Be tardid, U omurzandai siposguzor ast
[Ej pajomʙar] on ci az in kitoʙ ʙa tu vahj kardem haq ast va on [kitoʙhoi osmoni]-ro, ki pestar ʙudaast, tasdiq mekunad. Be tardid, Alloh taolo ʙa [holi] ʙandagonas ogoh va ʙinost

Ongoh in kitoʙ [Qur'on]-ro ʙa guruhe az ʙandagonamon, ki ʙarguzidem [ummati Muhammad] ʙa meros dodem; pas, [ʙarxe] az onon dar haqqi xes sitamgorand va [ʙarxe digar] az onon mijonarav hastand va [ʙarxe] az onon ʙa farmoni Alloh taolo dar nekiho pestozand. In [musulmoni va ʙahramandi az Qur'on, fazilat va] ʙaxsoisi ʙuzurg ast
[Podosason] ʙoƣhoi covidon [-i ʙihisti] ast, ki ʙa on vorid mesavand. Dar on co ʙa dastʙandhoe az tillo va marvorid orosta megardand va liʙosason az harir ast
[Onon pas az vurud] megujand: «Sipos [va sitois] az oni Alloh taolo ast, ki anduhro az mo dur kard. Ba rosti, ki Parvardigoramon omurzandai siposguzor ast
On [ma'ʙude], ki az fazli xes moro dar in saroi covid coj dod; dar on co rance ʙa mo namerasad va ducori xastagi [va kasolat] namesavem

Va ʙaroi kasone, ki kufr varzidaand otasi duzax [dar pes] ast. Na farmon [-i marg] ʙar onon cori mesavad, to ʙimirand va na [cize] az azoʙas ʙar onon kosta megardad. Mo har nosiposero cunin cazo medihem

[Duzaxijon] Dar on [otas] farjod mezanand: «Parvardigoro, moro [az in azoʙ] ʙerun ovar, to ƣajr az on ci [pestar] mekardem, kori soistae ancom dihem». [Ba onon gufta mesavad] «Ojo ʙa sumo [on qadar fursat va] umr nadodem, to har ki pandpazir ast, dar on [muddat] pand girad? Va [pajomʙar niz ʙa unvoni] ʙimdihanda nazdaton omad; pas, [holo ki itoat nakarded, ta'mi azoʙro] ʙicased, ki sitamgoron hec jorigare nadorand
Be tardid, Alloh taolo donoi nihoni osmonho va zamin ast [va] Ust, ki ʙa rozi dilho donost

Ust, ki sumoro dar zamin conisin [-i pesinijon] qaror dod; pas, har ki kufr ʙivarzad, kufras ʙa zijoni xudi ust; va kofironro kufrason nazdi Parvardgorason cuz xasm [va ʙezori] nameafzojad; va kofironro kufrason cuz zijon [va gunoh, cize] nameafzojad

[Ej pajomʙar, ʙa musrikon] ʙigu: «On ma'ʙudone, ki ʙa coji Alloh taolo mexoned, nisonam dihed, ci cize az zaminro ofaridaand? Jo [hamrohi Alloh taolo] dar ofarinisi osmonho sirkat dostaand? Jo ʙa onon [musrikon] kitoʙe dodaem va az [matoliʙi] on nisonai ravsane [ʙar haqqonijati xud] dorand?» [Cunin nest] Balki sitamgoron [-i musrik] cuz fireʙ, ʙa jakdigar va'dae namedihand

Ba rosti, Alloh taolo, ki osmonho va zaminro nigah medorad, to [az masiru madori xud] munharif nasavand va agar inhirof joʙand, pas, az U kase onhoro nigah namedorad. Be tardid, Alloh taolo hamvora ʙurdʙori omurzanda ast

[Kofiron] Bo saxttarin savgandhojason ʙa Alloh taolo savgand jod kardand, ki agar [pajomʙari] ʙimdihandae ʙar eson ʙijojad, az har ummate rohjoftatarand; ammo cun [Muhammad ʙa unvoni] ʙimdihandae nazdason omad, cuz duri [va nafrat az haq cize] ʙar onon naafzud

[Savgandhojason sodiqona naʙud; ʙalki] Az ruji gardankasi dar zamin va najrangi zist [ʙud] va najrangi zist, cuz domangiri sohiʙas namegardad. Pas, ojo [kofiron cize] cuz sunnati [ilohi va kajfari] pesinijonro intizor dorand? Pas, hargiz dar sunnati Alloh taolo taʙdile namejoʙi va hargiz dar sunnati Alloh taolo taƣjire namejoʙi

Ojo [kofiron] dar zamin gardis nakardaand, to ʙuʙinand sarancomi kasone, ki pes az onon va nerumandtar az onon ʙudand, ci guna sud? Hec cize dar osmonho va zamin nest, ki Allohro notavon sozad [va az havzai qudratas ʙerun ravad]. Be tardid, U hamvora donovu tavonost

Va agar Alloh taolo mardumro ʙa saʙaʙi on ci kardaand, mucozot mekard, hec cunʙandaero ʙar pusti zamin ʙoqi nameguzost, ammo [muhlat medihad va kajfari] ononro to saromadi muajjane ʙa ta'xir meandozad; pas, hangome ki acalason [dar qijomat] faro rasad, jaqinan, Alloh taolo ʙa holi ʙandagonas ʙinost
Jo, sin
Savgand ʙa Qur'oni hakim
Be tardid, tu az pajomʙaron [-i Mo] hasti
[Va] Bar rohi rost [Islom qaror dori]
[In Qur'on] Furufiristodai [Parvardigori] sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
To mardumero [dar ʙorai azoʙi qijomat] ʙim dihi, ki padaronason husdor najoftaand va [ʙad-in saʙaʙ] onho niz ƣofiland
Jaqinan, farmon [-i azoʙi ilohi] ʙar ʙestarason tahaqquq joftaast; pas, [lacocat mekunand va] imon nameovarand

[Misoli gumrohii kofiron, cunon ast, ki gui] Mo ʙar gardanhojason zancirhoe nihodaem, ki to zeri manahojason [pecidasuda] ast, cunonki sarhojason ʙolo mondaast [va az ancomi har xajre ocizand va rohi hidojatro namejoʙand]
Va az pesi rujason devore va az pusti sarason niz devore nihodaem va casmonasonro ʙo pardae pusonidaem; az in rust, ki [haqiqatro] nameʙinand
[Ej pajomʙar] ʙarojason jakson ast, ki ononro ʙim dihi jo nadihi; [dar har hol] imon nameovarand

Cuz in nest, ki tu ʙa kase ʙim medihi [va in kor ʙaroi kase sud dorad], ki pajravi Qur'on ʙosad va dar nihon az [Parvardigori] Rahmon ʙitarsad; pas, Uro [ki cunin ast] ʙa omurzis va podosi arcmand ʙasorat ʙideh
Jaqinan, Moem, ki murdagonro zinda mekunem va on ciro, ki az pes firistodaand va osori [ʙoqimonda az] esonro menavisem; va hama cizro dar Kitoʙi ravsan [Lavh-ul-mahfuz] ʙa sumor ovardaem
[Ej pajomʙar] ʙarojason [mocaroi] mardumi on sahrro misol ʙizan, on goh ki pajomʙaron nazdason raftand

Va vaqte du nafar az pajomʙaronro ʙa sujason firistodem; ammo [mardum] ononro duruƣgu angostand; pas, ʙo firistodani pajomʙari savum on duro [ta'jid va] taqvijat kardem. Onon [ʙa aholii sahr] meguftand: «Mo firistodagon [-i ilohi] ʙa sui sumo hastem»
[Onon dar posux] guftand: «Sumo cuz ʙasare hammonandi mo nested va [Parvardigori] Rahmon cize [az vahj] nozil nakardaast. Sumo cuz duruƣ namegued»
[Pajomʙaron] guftand: «Parvardigoramon medonad, ki qat'an, ʙa suji sumo firistoda sudaem
Va mo vazifae cuz rasonidani oskor [-i vahj] nadorem»
[Mardum] Guftand: «Mo sumoro ʙa foli ʙad giriftaem. Agar [az taʙliƣ] dast ʙarnadored, hatman, sangsoraton mekunem va ʙe tardid, azoʙi dardnoke az [coniʙi] mo ʙa sumo xohad rasid»
[Pajomʙaron] Guftand: «Sumii sumo ʙo xudaton [va nosi az kufru gunoh] ast. Ojo agar pandaton dihand, [onro sum mepindored?] ʙalki [haqiqat in ast, ki sumo dar irtikoʙi gunoh] mardumi isrofkored»
Va marde az durtarin nuqtai sahr sitoʙon omad [va] guft: «Ej qavmi man, az in pajomʙaron pajravi kuned»
Pajravi kasone ʙosed, ki az sumo podose namexohand va xud hidojat joftaand
Va caro ma'ʙudero naparastam, ki maro ofaridaast va [sumo niz] ʙa sujas ʙozgardonda mesaved
Ojo ʙa coi U ma'ʙudone ʙarguzinam, ki agar [Parvardigori] Rahmon ʙixohad, gazande ʙa man ʙirasonad, na safoatason ʙarojam sude dorad va na metavonand [az azoʙi ilohi] nacotam dihand
Dar on surat, jaqinan, dar gumrohii oskore xoham ʙud
Man ʙa Parvardigoraton imon ovardaam [va az marg harose nadoram] pas, suxanonamro ʙisunaved
[Pas, cun on mard ʙa dasti qavmas ʙa sahodat rasid] Ba vaj gufta sud: «Voridi ʙihist sav». U guft: «Ej kos, qavmi man medonistand
ki Parvardigoram maro omurzida va giromi dostaast»
Pas az [sahodati] u ʙar qavmas hec sipohe az osmon nafiristodem va [pes az in niz] furu firistanda naʙudem
[Kajfarason] Cuz jak ʙongi margʙor naʙud; pas, ʙa nogoh hamagi [murda va] xomus gastand
Ej afsus, ʙar in ʙandagon! Hec pajomʙare ʙa sujason najomad, magar on ki masxaraas mekardand
Ojo nadidand [va namedonand] ki qaʙl az onon ci ʙisjor naslhoro halok kardaem, ki digar nazdi inho [ʙa dunjo] ʙoznamegardand
Va [ruzi qijomat] hec kas nest, magar on ki hamagi nazdi Mo ehzor mesavand
Baroi onon [ki qijomatro ʙovar nadorand] zamini xusk nisonae [iʙratomuz] ast: Mo on [zamin]-ro zinda kardem va az [xoki] on donahoe rujonidem, ki [maxluqoti ilohi] az on mexurand
Va dar on [zamin] ʙoƣhoe az naxl va angur padid ovardem va dar on casmaho ravon soxtem
To mardum az mevaas ʙixurand, dar hole ki in [mahsulot, hosili talosi onho nest va onho]-ro ʙo dastoni xud amal naovardaand. Pas, ojo sipos nameguzorand
Pok va munazzah ast, on [Parvardigore] ki hamai naru modahoro ofarida ast; az on ci zamin merujonad [gijohonu daraxton] va az xudason [insonho] va az on ci namedonand
Va saʙ ʙaroi onon nisonae [digar az qudrati ilohi] ast, [ki] ruzro az on ʙarkanor mekunem va nogahon [hama] dar toriki furu meravand
Va xursed [niz pajvasta] ʙa suji qarorgohas dar harakat ast. In taqdiri [Parvardigori] sikastnopaziru donost
Va ʙaroi moh [niz] manzilgohhoe muqarrar namudaem, to [sarancom az qursi komil ʙa hilol va] ʙa sakli soxai xuski xurmo ʙozgardad
Na xursedro sazovor ast, ki [dar sajri xud] ʙa moh ʙirasad v na saʙ ʙar ruz pesi megirad; va har jak az [sitoravu sajjora] dar madore sinovarand
Nisonae [digar az qudrati Parvardigor] ʙaroi onon in ast, ki padaronasonro dar kisti anʙosta [az sarnisin va ʙor] haml kardem
Hamcunin, ʙarojason cize hammonandi on [kisti] ofaridaem, ki savoras savand
Agar ʙixohem, ƣarqason mekunem; dar in surat, na farjodrase dorand va na [az taqdiri ilohi] rahoi mejoʙand
Magar in ki rahmate az coniʙi Mo [ʙinand] va ʙahramandi [az ne'mathoi dunjo] to zamone [muajjan somili holason savad]
Va cun ʙa onon [musrikon] gufta mesavad: «Az on ci pesorui sumost [azoʙi oxirat] va on ci pusti sar meguzored [saxtihoi dunjo] parvo kuned; ʙosad, ki mavridi rahmat qaror gired», [itoat namekunand]
Hec nisonae az nisonahoi [qudrat va ʙuzurgii] Parvardigorason ʙar onon arza namegardad, magar on ki az on ruj megardonand

Va cun ʙa onon gufta mesavad: «Az on ci Alloh taolo ruzijaton kardaast, infoq kuned», kasone, ki kufr varzidaand, ʙa onon, ki imon ovardaand megujand: «Ojo ʙa kase ƣizo ʙidihem, ki agar Alloh taolo mexost, [Xud] ʙa u ƣizo medod? Sumo cuz dar gumrohii oskor nested»
Va [ʙo tamasxur ʙa mu'minon] megujand: «Agar rostgued, in va'da [qijomat] kaj xohad ʙud»
[In munkironi qijomat] cuz dar intizori jak ʙongi margʙor nestand, ki nogahon, dar hole ki sargarmi cidol [dar umuri dunjo] hastand, ononro faro girad
Pas, [dar on hangom] nametavonand [ʙa kase] vasijat kunand va na ʙa sui xonavodai xud ʙozgardand
Va [hangome ki ʙaroi duvumin ʙor] dar sur damida savad va nogahon az qaʙrhojason [ʙerun meojand va] ʙa sui Parvardigorason mesitoʙand

[Va ʙo noʙovari] Megujand: «Voj ʙar mo! Ci kase moro az qaʙrhojamon ʙarangext?» [Ba onon gufta mesavad] «In hamon [ruze] ast, ki [Parvardigori] Rahmon va'da doda ʙud; va pajomʙaron [dar in ʙora] rost meguftand
[Barangextani murdagon az gur] Cuz jak ʙongi havlnok [duvumin damidani sur] nest va nogahon hamaro nazdi Mo hozir mekunand
Pas, [ʙidoned, ki] imruz, ʙa hec kas sitame namesavad va cuz dar ʙaroʙari on ci [dar dunjo] kardaed, cazo nameʙined
Be tardid, ahli ʙihist imruz ʙo sodmoni sargarm [-i ne'mathoi ilohi] hastand
Onon va hamsaronason dar sojaho [-i gusturdai ʙihisti] ʙar taxtho takja zadaand
Dar on co [har guna] meva va har ci ʙixohand, ʙarojason [faroham] hast
[Bartar az in ne'matho] salomest, ki suxani Parvardigori mehruʙon ast
[On goh ʙa musrikon xitoʙ mesavad] «Ej gunahkoron, imruz [az mu'minon] cudo saved
Ej farzandoni Odam, ojo ʙo sumo pajmon naʙastam [va farmon nadodam], ki sajtonro naparasted, [ki] qat'an u dusmani oskori sumost
Va in ki [tanho] Maro ʙiparasted, [ki] rohi rost hamin ast
Va ʙe tardid, sajton ʙisjore az sumoro gumroh soxt. Ojo andesa namekarded
In [hamon] duzaxest, ki ʙa sumo va'da doda mesud
Imruz ʙa sazoi on ki kufr mevarzided, ʙa on [otas] vorid saved»
Imruz ʙar dahonhojason muhr menihem va dasthojason ʙo Mo suxan megujand va pojhojason ʙa on ci mekardand, guvohi medihand
Va agar ʙixohem, ʙe tardid, casmonasonro mahv mekunem, pas, [ʙo casmi ʙasta] ʙa suji [puli] sirot [az jakdigar] pesi megirand [to ʙa ʙihist roh joʙand]; ammo magar kucoro meʙinand
Va agar ʙixohem [zohirasonro taƣjir medihem va cunon] ononro dar coi xud masx [va zamingir] mekunem, ki natavonand gome ʙa pes ʙiguzorand jo ʙa aqiʙ ʙozgardand
Va Mo ʙa har ki umri tuloni ʙidihem, dar ofarinis digargunas mekunem [va uro ʙa notavonii zehni va ʙadani davroni kudaki ʙarmegardonem]. Pas, ojo [dar ʙorai qudrati Parvardigor] nameandesand
Va Mo ʙa u [Muhammad] se'r naomuxtaem va [soiri] soistai u nest. In [ki omuxtaem, cize] nest, magar andarz va Qur'one ravsan
To har kiro zinda [-dil] ʙosad, ʙim dihad va azoʙ ʙar kofiron muhaqqaq gardad
Ojo nadidaand, ki Mo az on ci dasthojamon soxtaast, cahorpojone ʙarojason ofaridaem, ki moliki onho hastand
Va onhoro dar xidmati eson guzostaem, to ʙar ʙarxe savor savand va az [gusti] ʙarxe taƣzija kunand
Va az on [hajvonot] ʙahrahoi digar va nusidanihoe [sir] dorand. Pas, ojo sipos nameguzorand
[Bo in hama ne'mat musrikon] ʙa coi Alloh taolo ma'ʙudone ʙarguzidaand; ʙa in umed, ki [az suji onho] jori savand
On [ma'ʙudhoi ʙecon] qodir ʙa joriason nestand; va in [musrikon dar qijomat] laskare ʙaroi onho [ʙutho] xohand ʙud, ki [hamagi dar otasi duzax] ehzor mesavand
[Ej Pajomʙar] suxani onon turo ƣamgin nasozad. Be tardid, Mo on ciro pinhon mekunand va oskor mesozand, [ʙa xuʙi] medonem
Ojo inson nadidaast, ki Mo uro az nutfae ofaridaem [on goh marohili rusdro taj kard va] sipas dusmane oskor sud
Va ʙaroi Mo misole zad va ofarinisi xesro faromus kard [va] guft: «Ci kase in ustuxonhoro [duʙora] zinda mekunad, dar hole ki pusidaast?»
Bigu: «hamon kase zindaas mekunad, ki naxustin ʙor onro padid ovard va U ʙa har ofarinise donost
Hamon ki az daraxti saʙz otase ʙarojaton padid ovard va sumo [dar surati nijoz] xud az on [daraxt] otas meafruzed»
Ojo kase, ki osmonho va zaminro ofaridaast, nametavonad hammonandi inhoro [pas az margason duʙora] ʙiofarinad? Ore [metavonad] va U Ofarinandai donost
Farmoni U cun cizero iroda kunad, tanho in ast, ki ʙa on megujad: «Mavcud sav»; pas, [ʙedirang] mavcud mesavad
Pas, pok va munazzah ast Parvardigore, ki [hokimijat va] ixtijori hama ciz ʙa dasti Ust va [hamagi] ʙa sui U ʙozgardonida mesaved
Savgand ʙa faristagoni saf ʙa saf [ki ʙaroi parastisi Parvardigor istodaand]
Va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki aʙrhoro meronand
Va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki Qur'on tilovat mekunand
[ki] Be tardid, ma'ʙudi sumo jaktost
[Hamon] Parvardigori osmonhovu zamin va on ci mijoni onhost va Parvardigori [xursed dar ƣuruʙgohho va] tulu'gohho
Ba rosti, ki Mo osmoni dunjoro ʙo zevari sitoragon orostem
Va onro az [dastrasii] har sajtoni sarkas hifz kardem
[On sajotin hargiz] nametavonand [suxanoni faristagoni] olami ʙoloro ʙisunavand va az har su [ʙo sahoʙhoi otasin] tirʙoron mesavand
[Az vurudi onon ʙa olami faristagon cilavgiri mesavad va hamvora ʙa] aqiʙ ronda mesavand va azoʙi covidon [dar pes] dorand
Magar kase, ki nogahon cize [az guftugui faristagon]-ro duzdida gus dihad, ki [dar in surat] sahoʙi duraxson uro dunʙol mekunad

Az onon [kofiron] ʙipurs, ki ojo ofarinisi [pajkarhoi] onon saxttar ast jo on ci ki Mo [az zaminu osmonho va cahoni ʙekaron] ofaridaem; [dar hole ki] Mo onhoro az gili [ʙearzis va] caspida padid ovardem
Tu [az inkori onon] dar sigifti va onho [niz suxanonatro dar ʙorai qijomat] masxara mekunand
Va cun pand doda savand, namepazirand
Va cun nisonahoi [dar mavridi rostguii Pajomʙar] meʙinand, [onro] ʙa tamasxur megirand
Va megujand: «In [Qur'on cize] nest, magar codue oskor
Ojo hangome ki murdem va xok va ustuxon sudem, ʙarangexta xohem sud
Ojo padaroni mo [niz ʙarangexta mesavand]?»
Bigu: «Ore, sumo, dar hole ki xor hasted [zinda mesaved]»
Pas, [vuqui qijomat] tanho ʙo jak ʙong [-i sahmnok] ast va nogahon [hama az qaʙrho ʙerun meojand va dar intizori dasturi Parvardigor, vahsati qijomatro] nazorat mekunand
Va megujand: «Voj ʙar mo! In [hamon] ruzi cazost»
[Gufta mesavad: Ore] in hamon ruzi dovariest, ki duruƣas meangosted»
[Ba faristagon gufta mesavad] «Kasonero, ki [ʙo sirk ʙa xes] sitam kardand,jo ʙo [hamfikron va] hammonandhojason
va on ci ʙa coi Alloh taolo meparastidand, gird ovared va ʙa rohi duzax hidojatason kuned
Va ononro nigah dored, ki, hatman, [pes az raftan ʙa duzax] ʙozxost xohand sud
[Az duzaxijon mepursand] «Caro [monandi dunjo] az jakdigar himojat namekuned?»
Balki imruz [hamagi] taslim [-i amri Parvardigor] hastand
Va sarzaniskunon ʙa jakdigar ru meorand
[Va ʙa rohʙaron va ʙuzurgoni xud] megujand: «Sumo [ʙaroi ʙa kufr kasonondani mo ʙo iddaoi dini rostin va] az coniʙi haq ʙa suroƣamon meomaded»
[Rohʙaronason] Megujand: «Mo muqassir nestem], ʙalki sumo xud imon nadosted
Va mo hec tasallute ʙar sumo nadostem; ʙalki sumo xud guruhi sarkas ʙuded
Pas, [aknun] farmoni mucozoti Parvardigoramon ʙar mo muhaqqaq suda va ʙa rosti, mo [hamagi azoʙi duzaxro] casandaem
Pas, sumoro gumroh namudem [caro ki] dar haqiqat, xud niz gumroh ʙudem»
Pas, jaqinan on ruz hamai [onon] dar azoʙ sarikand
Be tardid, Mo ʙo gunahkoron incunin [raftor] mekunem
Onon ʙudand, ki cun ʙa eson gufta mesud: «Ma'ʙude [ʙarhaq] cuz Alloh taolo nest» sarkasi [va takaʙʙur] mekardand
va meguftand: «Ojo mo ma'ʙudonamonro ʙa xotiri [suxani] soire devona raho kunem?»
[Cunin nest] ʙalki u haq [tavhid]- ro ovarda va pajomʙaroni [pesin] – ro tasdiq kardaast
Sumo [kofiron], hatman, azoʙi dardnoki [duzax]-ro mecased
Va cuz [dar ʙaroʙari] on ci mekarded, mucozot namesaved
Hama azoʙ meʙinand, magar ʙandagoni muxlisi Alloh taolo
Onon [dar pesgohi Parvardigor rizqu] ruzii musaxxase dorand
[Anvoi] mevaho [-ro dar ixtijor xohand dost] va giromi dosta mesavand
Dar ʙoƣhoi purne'mati [ʙihist]
Dar hole ki muqoʙili jakdigar ʙar taxtho [takja zadaand]
come az saroʙi noʙ [va zulol] peromunason megardonand
[Saroʙe ravsan va] safed, ki ʙaroi nusandagonason lazzatʙaxs ast
[Saroʙe, ki xumori va] sardardi dar nusidanas nest va az on mast namegardand
Va nazdason zanoni durustcasm ast, ki [ tanho ʙa savharoni xud] nazar dorand
[Zanon cunon safedandomand, ki] gujo tuxm [-i parandagon] hastand [va zeri par va ʙoli onho az dastrasii hamagon] pinhon mondaand
[Bihistijon dar ʙorai rujdodhoi dunjo suhʙat mekunand va] ʙarxe az onon pursiskunon ru ʙa ʙarxe digar mekunand
Jake az onon megujad: «Man [dar dunjo] hamnisine dostam
[U pajvasta] Meguft: Ojo tu voqean [ʙa qijomat] ʙovar dori
Ojo hangome ki murdem va xok va ustuxon sudem, ojo haqiqatan [zinda mesavem va ʙa xotiri korhojamon] ʙa mo kajfar medihand?»
[Sipas, ʙa dustoni ʙihistias] megujad: «Ojo [sumo niz hamrohi man] sar mekased [to ʙidonem u kucost]?»
On goh xudi u sar mekasad va uro dar mijoni duzax meʙinad
Ba u megujad: «Ba Alloh taolo savgand, ki nazdik ʙud maro [ʙo vasvasahoi kufromezat] noʙud sozi
Agar ne'mati [hidojati] Parvardigoram naʙud, man niz az hozirsudagon [dar duzax] ʙudam»
[On goh ʙa ʙihistijon megujad] «Ojo mo digar marge naxohem dost
cuz margi naxustin, va azoʙ namesavem
Ba rosti, ki in hamon komjoʙii ʙuzurg ast
Ahli amal ʙojad ʙaroi cunin [podos] ʙikusand
Ojo in [ne'mati ʙihist, karimonatar va] ʙaroi paziroi ʙehtar ast jo daraxti zaqum [dar duzax]
Be tardid, Mo on daraxtro mojai ozmoisi sitamgoroni [musrik] dodaem [caro ki megujand: «Hec daraxte dar otas namerujad»]
Dar haqiqat, on [mojai azoʙ] daraxte ast, ki az ƶarfoi duzax merujad
Mevahojas [cunon ʙadmanzar ast, ki] gujo sarhoi sajotin ast
Onon [duzaxijon] az [mevahoi talxi] on mexurand va sikamhoro az onho anʙosta mekunand
On goh rui in [ƣizoi nopok, ʙa coji nusidani] omezahoi az oʙi cuson dorand
Sipas, jaqinan, ʙozgastason ʙa duzax ast
Onon padaroni xudro gumroh joftand
Va [hamcunon] dar paji onon mesitoftand
Va, hatman, qaʙl az onon niz ʙestari pesinijon gumroh sudand
Va ʙe tardid, Mo mijonason husdordihandagon [-i ʙisjor] firistodem
Pas, ʙingar, ki sarancomi husdorjoftagon ci guna ʙud
[Hama giriftori azoʙ sudand] magar ʙandagoni muxlisi Alloh taolo
Nuh ʙa dargohi Mo duo kard va [Mo] ci naku icoʙatkunanda ʙudem
Va u va xonavodaasro [ʙo hamrohi mu'minon] az ʙaloi ʙuzurgi [tufon] nacot dodem
Va [pas az tufon, faqat pajravoni mu'min va] xonavodai uro [dar zamin] ʙoqi guzostem
Va ʙarojas dar mijoni ojandagon [nomi nek] ʙar coj nihodem
Salom [va sitoisi] cahonijon ʙar Nuh ʙod
Ba rosti Mo nakukoronro, incunin, podos medihem
Be tardid, u az ʙandagoni mu'mini Mo ʙud
On goh digaronro [ki dar tufon monda ʙudand] ƣarq kardem
Va, hatman, Iʙrohim az pajravoni u [Nuh] ʙud
[Jod kun az] hangome ki vaj ʙo dili pok [va xoli az sirk] ʙa [dargohi] Parvardigoras omad
On goh ki ʙa padar va qavmas guft: « Ci cize meparasted
Ojo ʙa coji Alloh taolo in ma'ʙudoni duruƣinro mexohed
Gumonaton dar ʙorai Parvardigori cahonijon cist?»
Sipas nigohe ʙa sitoragon afkand [va andesid]
Va guft: «Man ʙemoram [va dar casn sirkat namekunam]»
Mardum uro tark kardand va raftand
On goh pinhoni nazdi ʙuthojason raft va [ʙo tamasxur] guft: «Cize namexured
Sumoro ci sudaast, ki suxan namegued?»
Sipas ʙo dasti rosti xud zarʙahoi [muhkam] ʙar onho vorid ovard [va cuz ʙuti ʙuzurg hamaro sikast]
Pas, qavmas sitoftand va ʙa suji u omadand
[Iʙrohim] guft: «Ojo cizero, ki xud metarosed, meparasted
Va hol on ki Alloh taolo [ham] sumo va [ ham] on ciro ancom medihed ofaridaast
[Vaqte ʙutparaston az posux darmondand] Guftand: «Barojas ʙinoi [ʙaland] ʙisozed va uro dar otas ʙiafkaned»
Pas, ʙaroi [noʙudii] u najrang xostand, [vale] Mo ononro past va [maƣluʙ] soxtem [va otas ʙar Iʙrohim sard va ʙeasar sud]
Va guft: «Man ʙa sui [sarzamini digare ʙaroi iʙodati] Parvardigoram meravam va U hidojatam xohad kard
Parvardigoro, ʙa man [farzande] az soistagon ato kun»
Mo [duojasro mustacoʙ kardem va] uro ʙa tavalludi pisari ʙurdʙore ʙasorat dodem

Va cun [Ismoil] ʙa [sinni navcavoni va] haddi talos [va hamkori] ʙo u [Iʙrohim] rasid, ʙa vaj guft: Pisaram, dar xoʙ [ʙa man vahj mesavad va] meʙinam, ki turo zaʙh mekunam. Nazarat dar in ʙora cist?» [Ismoil] guft: «Padarcon, on ciro ki ʙa tu amr sudaast ancom ʙideh. Insoalloh maro [dar ʙaroʙari in farmon] sikeʙo xohi joft»
Pas, cun har du taslimi [farmoni Parvardigor] sudand va [Iʙrohim] uro ʙo guna [ʙar xok] nihod
Ba u nido dodem, ki «Ej Iʙrohim
Jaqinan xoʙatro tahaqquq ʙaxsidi». Mo nakukoronro cunin podos medihem
Be tardid, in [xoʙ] ozmoise oskor ʙud [va Iʙrohim az on sarʙaland ʙerun omad]
Va [coni] uro dar ʙaroʙari qurʙonii ʙuzurge ʙozxaridem
Va ʙarojas dar mijoni ojandagon [nomi nek] ʙar coj nihodem
Salom ʙar Iʙrohim
Mo nakukoronro cunin podos medihem
Be tardid, u az ʙandagoni mu'mini Mo ʙud
Va uro ʙa [tavalludi] Ishoq, ki pajomʙare az soistagon ʙud, ʙasorat dodem
[Mo] Ba u va Ishoq ʙarakat dodem, va [ʙarxe] az afrodi dudmonason nakukor ʙudand va [ʙarxe digar] oskoro nisʙat ʙa xestan sitamgor ʙudand
Va ʙa rosti, ʙar Muso va Horun minnat nihodem
Va on duro hamrohi qavmason az anduhi ʙuzurg [sitami Fir'avn va xatari ƣarq sudan dar Nil] nacot dodem
Va joriason kardem, to piruz sudand
Va ʙa on du kitoʙi ravsangar [Tavrot] dodem
Va ʙa rohi rost hidojatason kardem
Va ʙarojason dar mijoni ojandagon [nomi nek] ʙar coj nihodem
Salom ʙar Muso va Horun
Mo nakukoronro cunin podos medihem
Be tardid, on du ʙandagoni mu'mini Mo ʙudand
Va, hatman, Iljos [niz] jake az pajomʙaroni [Mo] ʙud
[Jod kun az] Hangome ki u ʙa qavmas guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
Ojo [ʙuti] «Ba'l»-ro [ʙa parastis] mexoned va ʙehtarin ofarandaro raho mekuned
Alloh taolo [-ro tark mekuned], ki Parvardigori sumo va Parvardigori padaronaton ast»
Ammo uro duruƣgu angostand va musallaman, [ʙaroi azoʙ] hozir karda mesavand
Magar ʙandagoni muxlisi Alloh taolo
Mo ʙarojas dar mijoni ojandagon [nomi nek] ʙar coj nihodem
Salom ʙar Iljos
Ba rosti, Mo nakukoronro cunin podos medihem
Be tardid, u az ʙandagoni mu'mini Mo ʙud
Va hatman, Lut [niz] jake az pajomʙaroni [Mo] ʙud
[Jod kun az] hangome ki u va hamai xonavodaasro nacot dodem
Magar pirazane, ki az ʙoqimondagon [dar azoʙ] ʙud
Sipas digaronro halok kardem
Va sumo [dar safar ʙa sarzamini Som] suʙhgohon ʙar [vajronahoi sahrhoi] onon meguzared
va saʙongoh. Ojo nameandesed [va iʙrat namegired]
Va, hatman, Junus [niz] jake az pajomʙaroni [Mo] ʙud
[Jod kun az] hangome ki [ xasmgin az kufri qavmas, ʙiduni icozati Parvardigor] ʙa kistii anʙosta [az musofir va ʙor] gurext
Pas, [cun kisti dar holi ƣarq sudan ʙud, Junus hamrohi musofiron ʙaroi ʙerun andoxtani ʙarxe afrod] qur'a andoxtand va ʙozanda sud [va uro ʙa darjo andoxtand]
Sipas mohii [ʙuzurge] uro ʙal'id [furu ʙurd], dar hole ki [xudro ʙa xotiri tarki vazifa] sarzanis mekard
Pas, agar dar zumrai tasʙehgujoni [Parvardigor] naʙud
Jaqinan, to ruze, ki [mardum] ʙarangexta mesavand, dar sikami on [mohi] ʙoqi memond
On goh uro dar hole ki [za'if va] ʙemor ʙud ʙa sarzamini xusk [va ʙegijoh] afkandem
Va ʙar [sari] u ʙutai kadu rujondem [to az soja va mevahojas ʙahra girad]
Va [duʙora] uro ʙa suji sad hazor nafar jo ʙestar [ʙa risolat] firistodem
Pas, onon imon ovardand va Mo niz to muddate [az ne'mathoi zindagi] ʙahramandason soxtem
Pas, az eson [musrikon] ʙipurs, ojo duxtarho ʙaroi Parvardigori tu va pisarho ʙaroi onhost
Ojo Mo faristagonro duxtar ofaridem va onho huzur dostand
Ogoh ʙos! Onon az [rui tuhmat va] duruƣgui
megujand: «Alloh taolo farzand dorad» va, jaqinan, duruƣ megujand
Ojo [Alloh taolo] duxtaronro ʙar pisaron tarceh dodaast
Sumoro ci sudaast? Ci guna hukm mekuned
Ojo [nameandesed va] pand namegired
Ojo [ʙar iddaoi ʙotili xes] daleli ravsane dored
Pas, agar rostgued, kitoʙatonro ʙijovared
[Musrikon] ʙajni U [Alloh taolo] va faristagon, xesovandi qoil sudaand; dar hole ki faristagon ʙa jaqin medonand, ki [musrikon ruzi qijomat ʙaroi hisoʙrasi] ehzor mesavand
Alloh taolo az on ci [musrikon] tavsif mekunand, munazzah ast
[Mardum dar tavsifi Parvardigor, suxani gazof megujand] magar ʙandagoni muxlisi Alloh taolo
Pas, sumo [musrikon] va on ci meparasted
[hargiz] gumrohgari [kase az dini haq] nested
Magar on ki [ʙa taqdiri ilohi] ahli duzax ʙosad
Va [faristagon megujand]: « Hec jak az mo nest, magar on ki maqomi musaxxase [dar pesgohi ilohi] dorad
Moem, ki [ʙaroi parastis va nijois ʙa dargohi Parvardigor] ʙa saf istodaem
Va ʙe tardid, moem, ki tasʙehgui [U] hastem»
Va [kofiron, pes az ʙi'sat] hamvora meguftand
«Agar kitoʙe az [kitoʙhoi osmonii] pesinijon nazdamon ʙud
jaqinan, az ʙandagoni muxlisi Alloh taolo mesudem»
Ammo [hangome ki pajomʙar ʙo Qur'on ʙa sujason omad, haqqonijati] onro inkor kardand; pas, ʙa zudi [naticai in korasonro] xohand donist
Va hatman suxanoni Mo dar ʙorai ʙandagoni firistodaamon az pes sodir sudaast
Onon, hatman, az coniʙi Mo jori sudaand
Va ʙe tardid, laskari Mo piruzand
Pas, [ej Pajomʙar] to muddate az onon [musrikon] ruj ʙigardon
Va ononro [dar hangomi nuzuli azoʙ] ʙingar; pas, ʙa zudi xud [niz naticai kufrasonro] xohand did
Ojo onon azoʙi moro ʙa sitoʙ xostorand
On goh ki [azoʙi ilohi] ʙar xonahojason furud ojad, ci ʙad ast ʙomdodi husdorjoftagon
Va to muddate az onon ruj ʙigardon
Va ononro [dar hangomi nuzuli azoʙ] ʙingar; pas, ʙa zudi xud [niz naticai kufrasonro] xohand did
Pok va munazzah ast Parvardigorat - Parvardigori izzat va qudrat-az on ci [musrikon ʙa duruƣ] vasf mekunand
Va salom ʙar pajomʙaron
Va sipos [va sitois] az oni Alloh taolo- Parvardigori cahonijon- ast
Sod. Savgand ʙa Qur'oni pandomuz [ki Alloh taolo hec sarike nadorad]
Ammo kofiron giriftori taassuʙ [-u cohilijat] va sitezand
Ci ʙisjor naslhoi kofirro pes az onon halok kardem, ki [dar hangomi nuzuli azoʙ] farjod mezadand, ammo [on zamon digar] hangomi nacot naʙud
Musrikon az in ki ʙimdihandae az mijoni xudason ʙa suroƣason omadaast, iʙrozi sigifti kardand va guftand: «In mard codugaru duruƣgust
Ojo ʙa coji ma'ʙudoni muxtalif ma'ʙude jagona qaror dodaast? Voqean, kori aciʙe ast»

Buzurgonason ʙa po xostand [va ʙa pajravoni xud guftand]: «Biraved va ʙar [parastisu hifzi] ma'ʙudonaton istodagari kuned. Be tardid, [Muhammad ʙo] in kor xostaast [ki sumoro gumroh kunad va xudro ʙa rajosat ʙirasonad]
Mo in [nazarijai tavhid]-ro hatto dar oini masehijat ham nasnidaem. In suxan cuz duruƣ [cize] nest
Ojo az mijoni [hamai] mo Qur'on ʙa u nozil sudaast»? [Cunin nest, ki onon megujand] Balki onon dar [asli] vahji Man tardid dorand va hanuz azoʙi Maro nacasidaand
Ojo gancinahoi rahmati Parvardigori sikastnopaziri ʙaxsandaat nazdason hast
Ojo farmonravoi osmonho va zamin va ʙajni onho hastand? [Agar cunin ast] Bo vasoil [-u imkonoti xud ʙa osmon] avc ʙigirand [va monei nuzuli vahj gardand]
[In kofiron] Laskare sikastxurda az cumla soiri guruhho [va ahzoʙi muxolifi pajomʙaron] hastand
Pes az onon niz qavmi Nuh va Od va Fir'avni sohiʙsipoh niz [pajomʙaroni Moro] takziʙ kardand
Qavmi Samud va qavmi Lut va ashoʙi Ajka [qavmi Suajʙ] niz az on guruhho ʙudand [ki pajomʙaronro takziʙ kardand]
Har jak [az in guruhho] pajomʙaron [-i xud]-ro takziʙ kardand va kajfari man [dar mavridason] tahaqquq joft
Inon faqat ʙonge sahmnokro intizor mekasand, ki hec ʙozgaste nadorad
[Bo tamasxur] Megujand: «Parvardigoro, pes az faro rasidani ruzi hisoʙ ʙahrai moro [az azoʙ] ʙa sitoʙ ʙideh»
[Ej pajomʙar] Dar ʙaroʙari guftorason sikeʙo ʙos va az Dovud, ʙandai tavonmandi Mo jod kun, ki hamvora [ʙo tavʙa va ancomi kori xajr ʙa dargohi mo] ʙozmegast
Mo kuhhoro ʙa u ʙa xidmat gumostem, ki hamnavo ʙo u somgohon va ʙomdodon [Parvardigorro] tasʙeh meguftand
Va parandagonro [niz ʙa xidmat gumostem], ki gird meomadand va hamagi muteas ʙudand [va ʙo vaj dar zikri Parvardigor hamovozi mekardand]
Mo farmonravoiasro ustuvor namudem va ʙa u pajomʙari va kalome fajsalaʙaxs ato kardem
Ojo xaʙari afrode ʙa tu rasidaast, ki ʙaroi dodxohi [ʙa suroƣi Dovud omadand va] az devori iʙodatgohas ʙolo raftand

Cun [ʙiduni ittilo'] ʙar Dovud vorid sudand, az didanason ʙa vahsat aftod; onon guftand: «Natars, mo du nafari soki [sikojatkunanda] hastem, ki jake ʙar digare sitam kardaast. Mijonamon ʙa adolat dovari kun va az haq dur nasav va moro ʙa rohi rost hidojat kun»
[Jake az onon guft] «In mard ʙarodari man ast. U navadu nuh mes dorad va man jak mes doram va [ʙa isror] megujad: «On [jak mes]-ro ham ʙa man vo guzor» va dar ʙahs ʙar man piruz sudaast»

[Dovud] Guft: «Musallaman, u ʙo xostani mesi tu [ʙaroi afzudan] ʙa meshoi xudas ʙar tu sitam kardaast va ʙisjore az sarikon [va hamkoron] dar haqqi jakdigar sitam mekunand, magar kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand, ki [onho niz] ʙisjor nodirand». Dovud [ki ʙiduni tavzeh xostan az tarafi digar hukm sodir karda ʙud] mutavacceh sud, ki imtihonas kardaem. On goh az Parvardigoras omurzis xost va ʙo furutani ʙa zamin aftod va [ʙa dargohi ilohi] tavʙa kard
Pas, uro ʙa xotiri on [xato] ʙaxsidem va ʙarojas dar pesgohi xud maqome volo qaror dodem va [dar oxirat] ʙozgasti nekue xohad dost

Ej Dovud, mo turo dar zamin xalifa va farmonravo qaror dodem; Pas, dar mijoni mardum ʙa haq dovari kun va pajravi havo [-i nafs] naʙos, ki az rohi Alloh taolo gumrohat mekunad. Be gumon kasone, ki az rohi Alloh taolo gumroh mesavand, ʙa sazoi on ki ruzi hisoʙro faromus kardaand, azoʙi sadide [dar pes] dorand
Mo osmon va zamin va on ciro, ki mijoni onhost, ʙehuda naofaridaem. In gumoni kofiron ast. Pas, voj ʙar kofiron az otasi duzax
Ojo kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand, monandi kasone ʙa hisoʙ meovarem, ki dar zamin taʙahkori kardaand? Ojo parhezkoronro monandi ʙadkoron ʙa hisoʙ meovarem
[Ej Muhammad, in Qur'on] Kitoʙest purʙarakat, ki ʙar tu nozil kardem, to [mardum] dar ojotas ʙiandesand va xiradmandon pand girand
Mo Sulajmonro ʙa Dovud ato kardem, neku ʙandae ʙud va hamvora [ʙa dargohi Parvardigoras] tavʙa mekard
[Jod kun] On goh ki asrgohon asphoi asil [va tundpo] ʙarojas ovardand
[Sulajmon sargarmi tamosoi aspho sud va vaqti namoz guzast.] On goh guft: «Ba rosti, ki dustii in aspho, maro az jodi Parvardigoram ƣofil kard, to on ki [xursed] dar pardai maƣriʙ pinhon sud
[Bori digar] Onhoro nazdi man ʙozgardoned». On goh [ʙa nisonai vaqf dar rohi Alloh taolo] ʙa soqu gardani aspho dast kasid

Sulajmonro ozmudem va casadi navzodero [ki ʙiduni tavakkal ʙar Alloh taolo mustoqona dar intizori tavalludas ʙud] ʙar taxtas afkandem [to darjoʙad, ki qudrat ʙa tamomi dar ixtijori Alloh taolo ast]. On goh [tavʙa kard va ʙa dargohi ilohi] ʙozgast
Guft: «Parvardigoro, maro ʙiomurz va hukumate ʙa man arzoni dor, ki pas az man ʙenazir ʙosad, ki ʙaxsojanda Tui, Tu»
Pas, [Mo] ʙodro dar xidmatas gumostem, ki har kuco iroda mekard, ʙa farmoni U ʙa oromi ravon mesud
Va har ʙinokor va ƣavvose az cinnijonro [ki mexost, ʙa farmonas darovardem]
Va [guruhi] digare [az cinijon]-ro [ki hamagi] dar ƣulu zancir ʙudand, [tahti sultaas] darovardem
[Ba u guftem] «In atoi Most, pas, [ʙa har kas mexohi] ʙiʙaxs va az har ki mexohi, ʙoz dor. Hisoʙe ʙar tu nest»
Be tardid, ʙaroi Sulajmon dar pesgohi xud maqomi volo qaror dodem va [dar oxirat] ʙozgaste neku xohad dost
[Ej pajomʙar] Az ʙandai Mo Ajuʙ jod kun, on goh ki Parvardigorasro nido dod, ki: «Sajton maro ʙa rancu dard ovardaast»
[Ba u farmon dodem] «Poji xudro ʙar zamin ʙikuʙ [to casmae ʙicusad]. In casmasore xunuk ʙaroi sustusu va osomidanist»
Va xonavodaasro [ki az dast doda ʙud] ducand ʙa vaj ʙaxsidem, to [nisonai] rahmate az coniʙi Mo va andarze ʙaroi xiradmandon ʙosad

Va [ʙa u farmon dodem] «Dastae az soxaho [-i ʙorikro] ʙargir va ʙo on [hamsaratro] ʙizan va savgandatro [ki dar hangomi xasm jod karda ʙudi] nasikan. Be tardid, u mardi sikeʙoe ʙud. Ci neku ʙandae! Ba rosti, ki u ʙisjor tavʙakor ʙud
Va [ej pajomʙar] az ʙandagoni Mo Iʙrohim va Ishoq va Ja'quʙ, ki tavonmandu ʙoʙasirat ʙudand
Mo ʙo [mavhiʙati] jodi oxirat ʙa onon xulusi viƶae ʙaxsidem
Onon dar pesgohi Mo nekmard va ʙarguzida ʙudand
Va [niz] jod kun az Ismoil va Jasa' va Zulkifl, ki hamagi az nekon ʙudand
In [Qur'on] pandest va ʙe gumon, parhezgoron [dar ʙihist] manzilgohe neku xohand dost
Boƣhoe covidon, ki darhojas ʙa rujason kusodaast
On co, dar hole ki ʙar taxtho takja zadaand, dasturi mevahoi farovon va nusidani medihand
Va nazdason zanoni durustcasm ast, ki [ tanho ʙa savharoni xud] nazar dorand va [hamagi] hamsin hastand
In hamon ne'mathoest, ki ʙaroi ruzi hisoʙ ʙa sumo va'da doda mesavad
In rizqu ruzi az coniʙi Most, ki hargiz [qat' namesavad va] pojon namepazirad
In [podosi parhezkoron] ast va sarkason ʙadtarin ʙozgastro dorand
[Hamon] Duzax, ki dar on vorid mesavand va ci ʙad qarorgohe ast
In [mucozot] oʙi cuson va xunoʙai cirkoludest, ki ʙojad az on ʙicasand
Va cuz inho kajfarhoi gunoguni digare hammonandi on dorand
[Ba rahʙaroni duzaxi gufta mesavad] «In guruh niz hamrohi sumo [ʙa duzax] darmeojand». [Onon posux medihand] «Xus omad ʙar onon maʙod! Caro ki ʙa otas darmeojand»
[Pajravon] Megujand: «Balki, sumoro xusomad maʙod, ki in [azoʙ]-ro pesi poji mo nihoded. Pas, [duzax] ci ʙad qarorgohe ast»
[Sipas] Megujand: «Parvardigoro, har kas, ki in [azoʙ]-ro ʙaroi Mo faroham kardaast, azoʙasro dar otas ducand kun»
[Duzaxijoni mutakaʙʙir] Megujand: «Caro kasonero, ki [dar dunjo] dar zumrai asror mepindostem, [dar duzax] nameʙinem
Ojo [ʙe cihat] ononro, ki tamasxur megiriftem jo [in co hastand va] casmon [-i mo] ʙar eson nameaftad?»
In mucodalai ahli otas qat'an rostast
[Ej pajomʙar, ʙa kofiron] Bigu: «Man faqat ʙimdihandaam va hec ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] cuz Allohi jagonai piruzmand nest
Parvardigori osmonho va zamin va on ci mijoni onhost. [On] Sikastnopaziri omurzanda»
[Ej pajomʙar] Bigu: «In [Qur'on] xaʙare ʙuzurg ast
sumo az on rujgardoned
[Agar ʙa man vahj namesud] Az olami ʙolotar on goh, ki faristagon [dar mavridi ofarinisi inson] cidol mekardand, hec ittiloe nadostam
Tanho az on ruj ʙa man vahj mesavad, ki ʙimdihandae oskoram»
[Jod kun az] Hangome ki Parvardigorat ʙa faristagon guft: «Man ʙasare az gil meofarinam
On goh ki uro somon dodam va az ruhi xes dar u damidam, dar ʙaroʙaras sacda kuned»
Pas, [cun Odam xalq sud] faristagon hamagi sacda kardand
Magar Iʙlis, ki takaʙʙur varzid va kofir sud
[Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Ej Iʙlis, ci ciz muciʙ sud, ki dar ʙaroʙari on ci ʙa dastoni xud ofaridaam, sacda nakuni? Ojo takaʙʙur varzidi jo ʙartaricui kardi»
Guft: «Man az u ʙartaram: Maro az otas ofaridai va uro az gil»
Alloh taolo farmud: «Az ʙihist ʙerun sav, ki tu [manfuru] rondasudai
Va la'nati Man to ruzi qijomat ʙar tu xohad ʙud»
[Iʙlis] Guft: «Parvardigoro, pas to ruze, ki [ʙandagonat] ʙarangexta mesavand, ʙa man muhlat ʙideh»
[Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Muhlat xohi dost
To [ruzi qijomat] on vaqti muajjan»
[Iʙlis] Guft: «Ba izzatat savgand, ki hamai ononro gumroh xoham kard
Magar ʙandagoni xolisi Tu az [mijoni] onon [ki hidojatason kardai]»
[Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Pas, [suxani Man] haq ast va haqro megujam
Qat'an, cahannamro az tu va har ki az tu pajravi kunad, anʙosta xoham soxt»
[Ej pajomʙar, ʙa musrikon] Bigu: «Man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham va fireʙkor nestam [va ʙa duruƣ iddaoi nuʙuvvat namekunam]»
In [Qur'on] cuz pand ʙaroi cahonijon [inson va cin] nest
Va qat'an, pas az marg az xaʙari [haqqonijat va rostii] on ogoh xohed sud
Nuzuli in kitoʙ az coniʙi Allohi sikastnopaziri hakim ast
In kitoʙro ʙa haq ʙar tu nozil kardem, pas, Allohro ʙo xulusi e'tiqod parastis kun

Ogoh ʙosed, ki dini xolis [va xoli az sirk] az oni Alloh taolo ast va afrode, ki ƣajri Allohro [dust va] korsozi xud intixoʙ kardaand [pindorason in ast, ki]: «Onhoro faqat ʙa in dalel meparastem, ki moro ʙa Alloh taolo nazdik gardonand [va manzalatamonro ʙestar kunand]». Alloh taolo dar mavoridi ixtilofason mijoni onon [va muvahhidoni rostin] dovari xohad kard. Be tardid, Alloh taolo kasero, ki duruƣgui nosipos ʙosad, hidojat naxohad kard
Agar Alloh taolo mexost farzande ʙarguzinad, az mijoni ofaridagoni xud har ci mexost, ʙarmeguzid. U munazzah [az in nisʙatho] ast va Ust Allohi jagonai piruzmand

Osmonho va zaminro ʙa haq [va ʙo hadaf] ofarid. Saʙro ʙar ruz megusturonad va ruzro ʙar saʙ va xursedu mohro dar xidmat [-i sumo] gumost, ki har jak to saromadi muajjane ravon ast. Ogoh ʙosed! U sikastnopaziri omurzgor ast

U sumoro az jak tan ofarid, on goh hamsarasro niz az vaj padid ovard va ʙaroi [istifodai] sumo hast nav' az cahorpojon [naru modai sutur, gov, gusfand va ʙuz]-ro ofarid. Sumoro dar sikami modaraton taji marohili muxtalif dar nihongohhoi segona meofarinad. In ast Alloh taolo, Parvardigori sumo, ki farmonravoi xosi Ust. Ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] cuz U nest, pas, ci guna ʙa ʙeroha meraved

Agar nosiposi kuned, [ʙidoned, ki] Alloh taolo az sumo ʙenijoz ast va hargiz nosiposii ʙandagonasro namepisandad va agar sukri Uro ʙa coj ovared, in korro ʙarojaton mepisandad va hec gunahgore ʙori gunohi digarero ʙar dus namekasad, pas, ʙozgastaton ʙa suji Parvardigoraton ast. On goh U sumoro az on ci ancom medoded, ogoh mekunad. Jaqinan, U az rozi dilho ogoh ast

Hargoh inson ducori [rancu] zijone mesavad, Parvardigorasro [ʙo tazarru' va zori] mexonad va ʙa dargohas ʙozmegardad. Ammo hangome ki ne'mate az coniʙi xud ʙa vaj meʙaxsem, muskilero, ki qaʙlan ʙarojas duo mekard, az jod meʙarad va ʙaroi Alloh taolo [dar qudrat] hamtojone qoil mesavad, to [digaronro niz] az rohi U gumroh kunad. [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa cunin kase] Bigu: «Andak zamone ʙo nosiposi [az ne'mathoi dunjo] ʙahramand sav, ki qat'an duzaxi xohi ʙud»

Ojo [cunin musrike ʙehtar ast jo] on ki dar tuli saʙ dar holi sacda va qijom ʙa iʙodat masƣul ast va az [azoʙi] oxirat tarson ast va ʙa rahmati Parvardigoras umed dorad? Bigu: «Ojo kasone, ki [haqqi ʙandagii Parvardigorro] medonand va kasone, ki namedonand, jaksonand? Tanho xiradmandon pand mepazirand»

[Ej pajomʙar] Bigu: «Ej ʙandagoni ʙoimoni man, az Parvardigoraton parvo kuned. Afrode, ki nekui mekunand [ilova ʙar oxirat dar in dunjo niz] podosi neku dorand. Zamini Alloh taolo gusturdaast [pas, agar ʙaroi hifzi aqidai xud ducori muskil suded, hicrat kuned]. Qat'an, podosi pojdoron komilu ʙedareƣ ato xohad sud»
Bigu: «Man ma'muram ʙo xulusi e'tiqod Allohro ʙiparastam
Va ma'mur sudaam naxustin kase [dar in ummat] ʙosam, ki taslim [mahz dar muqoʙili Parvardigor] ast»
Bigu: «Agar dar ʙaroʙari Parvardigoram nofarmon ʙosam, az azoʙi ruzi ʙuzurg [qijomat] metarsam»
[Ej pajomʙar] Bigu: «Man Allohro ʙo xulusi e'tiqodi xud meparastam

Sumo niz ƣajr az Alloh taolo har ciro mexohed, ʙiparasted». Bigu: «Zijonkoron [-i voqei] kasone hastand, ki [ʙa tama'i dunjo] xud va xonavodaasonro dar rastoxez ʙa zijon andoxtaand. Ogoh ʙosed, ki in hamon zijoni oskor ast
Bar ʙoloi sar va zeri pojason taʙaqote az otas ast. In ast on ci Alloh taolo ʙandagonasro az on metarsonad. Ej ʙandagoni Man, az [nofarmonii] Man parvo kuned
Basorat ʙaroi kasonest, ki az parastisi toƣut [ʙutho] ictinoʙ varzidand va [tavʙakunon] ʙa dargohi ilohi ʙozgastand. Pas, [ej pajomʙar] ʙa ʙandagonam [ʙihistro] ʙasorat ʙideh
[Hamon] Kasone, ki suxan [-hoi muxtalif]-ro mesunavand va az ʙehtarini on pajravi mekunand. Onon kasone hastand, ki Alloh taolo hidojatason karda va xiradmandand
Ojo kasero, ki farmoni mucozot ʙar u qat'i sudaast [metavon hidojat namud]? Ojo tu metavoni kasero, ki dar otas ast, nacot dihi

Ammo kasone, ki az Parvardigorason parvo dorand, [dar ʙihist] ƣurfahoe dorand, ki ʙar farozi onho ƣurfahoe [digar] soxta sudaast [va] az zeri onho cujʙorho corist. Alloh taolo [ʙa durusti] va'da dodaast va va'daxilofi namekunad

Ojo nadidai, ki Alloh taolo ʙorone az osmon firistod va onro [ʙa surati] casmahoe dar zamin cori soxt. On goh ʙa vasilai on kistzore ʙo ranghoi gunogun padid meovarad. Sipas paƶmurda megardad va meʙini, ki zard sudaast. On goh onro xurdu xosok mesozad? Be tardid, dar in [digarguniho] pande ʙaroi xiradmandon ast

Ojo kase, ki Alloh taolo dilasro paziroi Islom karda va az coniʙi Parvardigoras az nur [hidojat va ʙasirat] ʙarxurdor gasta [hammonandi saxtdilon ast]? Voj ʙar onon dar ʙaroʙari zikri Alloh taolo sangdil sudaand! Onon dar gumrohii oskorand

Alloh taolo ʙehtarin suxanro dar surati kitoʙe nozil karda, ki [ʙarxe az ojotas] hammonandi jakdigar va [ʙarxe niz] mukarrar ast. Kasone, ki az [mucozoti] Parvardigorason ʙim dorand, [ʙo sunidani in ojot] muj ʙar tanason rost mesavad va sipas dilu conason ʙa jodi Alloh taolo orom megirad. In hidojati Alloh taolo ast, ki har kiro ʙixohad, ʙa on roh menamojad va har kiro Alloh taolo gumroh sozad, hec hidojatgare naxohad dost

Ojo kase, ki dar ruzi qijomat [dastonas ʙasta ast va nocor] ʙo rujas on azoʙi saxtro daf' mekunad, [hamcun kasest, ki dar osoisi ʙihist qaror dorad]? Ba sitamgoron [-i musrik] gufta savad, [naticai] dastovardatonro ʙicased
Kasone, ki pes az onon ʙudand, niz [ojoti Allohro] duruƣ sumurdand va az coje, ki fikr namekardand, azoʙ domangirason sud

Pas, Alloh taolo [ta'mi] rasvoi va xoriro dar zindagii dunjo ʙa onon casond va musallaman, azoʙi oxirat ʙuzurgtar [va saxttar] ast. Agar musrikon medonistand [ki raftorason ci pajomade dorad, iʙrat megiriftand]
Dar in Qur'on az har [guna] masale ʙaroi mardum ovardaem, ʙosad, ki pand pazirand
Qur'one ʙa zaʙoni fasehi araʙi va ʙiduni hec guna iʙhomu inhirof [nozil kardem], ʙosad, ki [tahti ta'limotas az Parvardigori jakto] parvo kunand

Alloh taolo [ʙaroi muqoisai musriku muvahhid] mardero misol mezanad, ki cand sarik dar ʙorai [molikijati] u pajvasta ʙo ham ixtilofu musocara dorand va dar muqoʙilas marde, ki tahti farmoni jak nafar qaror dorad. Ojo in du nafar [az nazari mavqeijat] jaksonand? Sitois maxsusi Alloh taolo ast, vale ʙestarason namedonand
[Ej pajomʙar] Qat'an, tu xohi murd va onon [niz] xohand murd
On goh [sumo-mardum] dar ruzi qijomat nazdi Parvardigoraton [dar ʙorai masoili mavridi ixtilof] mucodala xohed kard
Va kist sitamgortar az on ki ʙa Alloh taolo, duruƣ nisʙat medihad va suxani rostero, ki ʙa vaj rasidaast, duruƣ mesumorad? Ojo dar duzax cojgohe ʙaroi kofiron nest
Ammo onon, ki pajomi rostin ʙijovarand [va digaronro ʙa pazirisi on da'vat kunand] va xud niz onro tasdiq namojand, ʙa rosti, parhezgorand
Har ci ʙixohand, nazdi Parvardigorason dorand. Podosi nekukoron hamin ast
To Alloh taolo ʙadtarin raftorasonro az [kornomai] onon ʙizudojad va ʙar asosi ʙehtarin a'molason ʙa eson podos dihad
Ojo Alloh taolo ʙaroi difo' az ʙandaas kofi nest? Ammo musrikon turo az ʙutho va ma'ʙudonason metarsonand va har kiro Alloh taolo gumroh kunad, hec hidojatgare naxohad dost
Va har kiro, ki Alloh taolo hidojat kunad, hec kas gumrohas naxohad soxt. Ojo Alloh taolo sikastnopaziru dodsiton nest

[Ej pajomʙar] Agar az musrikon ʙipursi: «Ci kase osmonho va zaminro ofaridaast»? Musallaman, megujand: «Alloh taolo». Ba onon ʙigu: «Pas, ʙa nazari sumo, agar Alloh taolo noxusi va rance ʙarojam ʙixohad, ojo on ci ʙa coji Alloh taolo [ʙa nijois] mexoned, metavonand oseʙasro ʙartaraf kunand? Jo agar Alloh taolo rahmate ʙaroi man ʙixohad, ojo metavonand moneas savand?» Bigu: [Pustiʙonii] Alloh taolo ʙarojam kofi ast. Ahli tavakkal tanho ʙar U tavakkal mekunand»
Bigu: «Ej qavmi man, sumo ʙar hol [va vaz'i sirkomez]-i xud ʙosed, man niz [ʙa vazoifi xud] amal mekunam. Ba zudi xohed donist
[Ba zudi xohed donist, ] ki kist on ki [dar dunjo] giriftori azoʙi rasvogar mesavad va [dar oxirat] azoʙi pojanda ʙar saras meʙorad»

In kitoʙi osmoniro ʙaroi [hidojati] mardum, ʙarhaq ʙar tu nozil kardem. Har ki hidojat savad, ʙa sudi xudi ust va har ki gumroh gast, ʙa zijoni xes gumroh sudaast va tu [nigahʙon va] korsozason nesti [ki ononro ʙa hidojat icʙor kuni]

Alloh taolo conhoro dar lahzai marg megirad va[niz] coni kasero, ki namurdaast, ʙa hangomi xoʙas [megirad], on goh conhoero, ki hukmi marg ʙar onho rondaast, nigah medorad va coni digaronro ʙozpas mefiristad, to hangomi muajjan [marg]. Dar in [amr] ʙaroi har ki ʙiandesad, nisonahoe [az qijomat] ast

Ojo musrikon ƣajr az Alloh taolo [ʙaroi xud az mijoni ʙutho] safoatkunandagone intixoʙ kardaand? [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa onon] Bigu: «Hatto agar onho moliki cize naʙosand va [cizero] dark nakunand [ʙoz ham onhoro ʙa safoat metalaʙed]»
Bigu: «Safoat ʙa tamomi az oni Alloh taolo ast. Farmonravoii osmonho va zamin niz az oni Ust va nihojatan [hamagi] ʙa pesgohi U ʙozgardonda mesaved»

Hangome ki Alloh taolo ʙa jaktoi [va tavhid] jod mesavad, dilhoi kasone, ki ʙa oxirat imon nadorand, mutanaffir [va ʙezor] megardad. Va cun az ma'ʙudone ƣajr az Alloh taolo jod savad, on goh ast, ki musrikon sodmon megardand
Bigu: «Bor iloho, [ej] ofarinandai osmonho va zamin, ej donoi nihonu oskor, Tu dar mijoni ʙandagonat dar mavoridi ixtilofason dovari xohi kard»

Agar du ʙaroʙari on ci dar zamin ast, dar ixtijori sitamgoron [musrikon] ʙosad, hamaro ʙaroi nacoti xud az saxtii azoʙi ruzi qijomat fido mekunand [Vale paziruftani nest]. Va az coniʙi Alloh taolo umure ʙarojason oskor megardad, ki tasavvurasro ham namekardand
[Dar on ruz] Dastovardi zistason ʙar onon oskor mesavad va azoʙe, ki masxara mekardand, domangirason xohad sud

Har goh inson ducori [rancu] zijone savad, Moro [ʙa nijois] mexonad va cun az coniʙi xes ne'mate ʙa vaj arzoni dorem, megujad: "Faqat [lajoqat va] donoii xudam muciʙi in ne'mat sudaast. [Na] ʙalki in ozmois [-i ilohi] ast, vale ʙestari mardum namedonand
Pesinijonason ham hamin suxanro guftand, vale [ʙa hangomi azoʙ] dastovardason sude ʙa holason nadost
Va [uquʙati] dastovardi zistason domangirason sud. In sitamgoron [-i musrik] niz ʙa uquʙati dastovardason giriftor xohand sud va [Parvardigori mutaolro] ʙa tang naxohand ovard
Ojo musrikon namedonand, ki Alloh taolo [ne'mat va] ruziro ʙar har kase, ki ʙixohad, gusturda medorad va jo tang megirad? Be gumon, dar in amr ʙaroi mu'minon nisonahoe [az tadʙiri ilohi] ast

[Ej pajomʙar] Ba ʙandagonam, ki [dar irtikoʙ ʙa sirku gunoh] zijodaravi kardaand, ʙigu: «Az rahmati ilohi ma'jus naʙosed, caro ki [agar tavʙa kuned] Alloh taolo hamai gunohonatonro meʙaxsad. Ba rosti, ki U ʙisjor omurzanda va mehruʙon ast
Pes az on ki azoʙ ʙa suroƣaton ʙijojad va hec kas natavonad joriaton kunad, ʙa suji Parvardigoraton ʙozgarded va taslimi [farmoni] U garded
Va pes az on ki nogahon, dar hole ki ƣofiled, azoʙ ʙa suroƣaton ʙijojad, az ʙehtarin dasturhoe, ki az coniʙi Parvardigoraton ʙa sumo nozil sudaast, pajravi kuned
[Ham aknun ʙarhazar ʙosed] to kase [dar ruzi qijomat] nagujad: «Ej dareƣ ʙar man, ki dar haqqi Alloh taolo kutohi namudam va [mu'minonro] masxara mekardam»
Jo [gunohi xudro ʙar gardani taqdir naandozad va] nagujad: «Agar Alloh taolo maro hidojat karda ʙud, qat'an, parhezkor ʙudam»
Jo hangome ki azoʙro meʙinad, nagujad: «Ej kos, ʙozgaste [ʙa dunjo] dostam, to dar zumrai nekukoron qaror megiriftam»
[Alloh taolo mefarmojad] «Ojoti Man ʙarojat omad va tu onhoro duruƣ pindosti va takaʙʙur namudi va kufr varzidi»
Va ruzi qijomat kasonero, ki ʙar Alloh taolo duruƣ ʙastaand, sijahruj meʙini. Ojo dar duzax cojgohe ʙaroi mutakaʙʙiron nest»
Alloh taolo parhezkoronro ʙo vorid kardan ʙa makoni komjoʙiason, [az azoʙ] nacot medihad. [Dar ʙihist] Na rance ʙa onon merasad va na anduhgin mesavand
Alloh taolo ofaridgori har cizest va U ʙar hama ciz [nigahʙonu] korsoz ast
Kalidi gancinahoi osmonho va zamin az oni Ust va kasone, ki ʙa ojoti ilohi kofir sudand, qat'an, zijonkorand
[Ej pajomʙar] Bigu: «Ej ʙexaʙaron, ojo ʙa man farmon medihed, ki [ma'ʙude] ƣajr az Allohro parastis kunam?!»
Ba tu va pajomʙaroni pes az tu vahj sudaast, ki: «Agar sirk ʙivarzi, [podosi] korhojat, qat'an, ʙarʙod xohad raft va zijonkor xohi sud
Balki tanho Allohro parastis kun va siposguzor ʙos»

Musrikon Allohro cunon ki sazovori Ust, arc nanihodand, hol on ki dar ruzi qijomat zamin jaksara dar qaʙzai Ust va osmonho ʙa dasti Vaj darhampecida xohad sud. Poku munazzah ast Alloh taolo va az on ci ʙo vaj sarik mesozand, ʙartar ast

[Dar ostonai qijomat] Dar sur damida mesavad. Pas, har ki dar osmonho va dar zamin ast, madhusi marg xohad sud, magar kase, ki Alloh taolo ʙixohad, on goh ʙori digar dar on damida mesavad va nogahon [hama az marg] ʙarmexezand va casm ʙa roh [-i farmoni Parvaridgor] hastand

[Dar ruzi qijomat] zamin ʙa nuri Parvardigoras ravsan xohad sud va noma [-i a'mol] nihoda mesavad va pajomʙaron va guvohonro meovarand va mijoni ʙandagon ʙa haq va adolat dovari mesavad va ʙa hec kas sitam naxohad sud
Va cazoi amalkardi har kas ʙa tamomi doda mesavad. Va Alloh taolo nisʙat ʙa a'molason donotar ast

Kofiron guruh-guruh ʙa suji duzax ronda mesavand. Hamin ki ʙa on co merasand, darhojas kusoda megardad va nigahʙononas megujand: «Ojo pajomʙarone az mijoni xudi sumo ʙa suroƣaton naomadand, ki ojoti Parvardigoratonro ʙaroi sumo mexondand va dar ʙorai didori in ruz husdor medodand? Onon [dar posux] megujand: Ore, vale [mo inkorason kardem va] farmoni mucozot sazoi kofiron ast»
[Ba onon] Gufta mesavad: «Az darhoi duzax vorid saved va covidona dar on ʙa sar ʙared. Va [ʙa rosti] cojgohi mutakaʙʙiron ci ʙad [cojgohe] ast!»

Va kasone, ki az Parvardigorason parvo dostand, guruh-guruh ʙa suji ʙihist hidojat mesavand. Hamin ki ʙa on co merasand, dar hole ki darhoi ʙihist kusoda sudaast, [ʙo izzatu ehtirom vorid mesavand] va nigahʙononi on co megujand: «Salom ʙar sumo. Xus omaded. Covidona ʙa ʙihist daroed»

Bihistijon megujand: «Sitois va sipos maxsusi Alloh taolo ast, ki va'dai xesro dar mavridi mo tahaqquq ʙaxsid va sarzamin [-i ʙihist]-ro ʙa mo meros dod, ki dar har coji on ʙixohem, manzil megirem. Va [ʙa rosti] podosi ahli amal ci nekust»

[Dar on ruz] Faristagonro xohi did, ki peromuni Ars halqa zadaand va Parvardigorasonro ʙa poki mesitojand. Va mijoni mardum ʙa haqqu adolat dovari xohad sud va gufta mesavad: «Sitoisu sipos maxsusi Alloh taolo Parvardigori cahonijon ast»
Ho, mim
Nuzuli [in] kitoʙ az suji Allohi sikastnopaziri donost
[Parvardigore, ki] Omurzandai gunoh va tavʙapazir, saxtkajfar va ne'matʙaxs ast. Hec ma'ʙude ʙa [haq] cuz U nest va ʙozgast [-i hama] ʙa suji Ust
Tanho kofiron hastand, ki dar ʙorai ojoti ilohi mucodala mekunand, pas, maʙodo raftuomadason dar sahrho [ʙaroi ticoratu ʙahramandiason az ne'mathoi dunjo] turo ʙifireʙad

Pes az onon qavmi Nuh va pas az onon niz guruhhoi digare [hamcun qavmi Od va Samud va Lut niz pajomʙaronasonro] duruƣgu sumurdand va har qavme xost pajomʙarasro dastgir kunad [va ʙa qatl ʙirasonad]. Onon ʙa ʙotil mucodala kardand, to ʙad-on vasila haqro az mijon ʙardorand. Man niz ononro azoʙ kardam. [Pas, ʙingared, ki] azoʙi Man ci guna ʙud
Va farmoni azoʙi Parvardigorat dar ʙorai kofiron incunin ʙa tahaqquq pajvast, ki onon ahli otasand

Faristagone, ki Arsro haml mekunand va onon, ki girdi on halqa zadaand, Parvardigorasonro ʙa poki mesitojand va ʙa U imon dorand va [in guna] ʙaroi ahli imon omurzis mexohand: «Parvadigoro, rahmat va donisat har cizero faro giriftaast, pas, kasonero, ki tavʙa kardand va pajravi rohi Tu sudand, ʙijomurz va az azoʙi duzax nigah dor»
Parvardigoro, onon va padaron [va modaron] va hamsaronu farzandoni solehasonro dar ʙoƣhoi covidoni ʙihist, ki va'da dodai, doxil kun, ki ʙe tardid, Tu sikastnopaziru hakimi
[Bor iloho] Ononro az [kajfari] ʙadiho hifz kun va har kiro dar on ruz az [kajfari] ʙadiho nigoh dori, farogiriftai rahmatat qaror dodai. In hamon komjoʙii ʙuzurg ast»

Va kofironro [dar duzax] nido medihand, ki: «Dusmani va xasmi Alloh taolo saxttar az dusmani va xasmi sumo nisʙat ʙa xudaton ast, caro ki ʙa imon da'vat mesuded, vale [ʙo dusmani nisʙat ʙa xud aqidai tavhidro] inkor mekarded»
Onon [dar posux] megujand: «Parvardigoro, moro du ʙor mirondi va du ʙor zinda kardi, pas, [aknun ki] ʙa gunohoni xud e'tirof kardem, ojo rohe ʙaroi xuruc [az duzax] vucud dorad»

[Ba onon gufta mesavad] «In [azoʙ] ʙad-on saʙaʙ ast, ki cun Alloh taolo ʙa jaktoi xonda mesud, inkor mekarded, vale agar ʙa U sirk ovarda mesud, imon meovarded. [Aknun] Dovari az oni Allohi ʙalandmartaʙai ʙuzurg ast»
Ust, ki nisonahoi [tavon va tadʙiri] xudro ʙa sumo iroa medihad va ʙarojaton [ʙo nuzuli ʙoron] az osmon ruzi mefiristad, vale tanho kasone pand megirand, ki [xolisona ʙa dargohi ilohi] tavʙa kunand
[Tanho] Allohro ʙo xulusi e'tiqod ʙixoned, harcand kofiron noxusnud ʙosand
U doroi daracoti rafe' va sohiʙi Ars ast va ʙa suji har jak az ʙandagonas, ki ʙixohad, ʙa farmoni xes vahj mefiristad, to [ʙa onon] dar ʙorai ruzi muloqot husdor dihad

On ruz, ki mardum hozir va namojon mesavand va cize az onon ʙar Alloh taolo pusida naxohad mond [Alloh taolo mefarmojad]: «Imruz farmonravoi az oni kist»? [On goh xud mefarmojad] «Az oni Allohi jagonai piruzmand»
Imruz har kas dar ʙaroʙari on ci kardaast, podos doda mesavad va hec sitame dar mijon nest. Be gumon, Alloh taolo dar hisoʙrasi sare' ast

Ba onon dar mavridi ruzi qijomat [ki ʙisjor nazdik ast] husdor ʙideh, on goh ki [az siddati vahsat] conho ʙa gulugoh merasad, dar hole ki sarsor az anduh sudaand. [Dar on ruz] Sitamgaron na dusti mehruʙone dorand va na safe'e, ki suxanas pazirufta savad
[Alloh taolo] Harakoti ʙadi casmho va on ciro, ki dar dilhoi afrod nuhufta ast, [ʙa xuʙi] medonad
Alloh taolo ʙa adolat dovari mekunad va ma'ʙudone, ki [musrikon] ʙa coji Alloh taolo iʙodat mekunand, hec guna dovari nadorand. Ba rosti, ki Alloh taolo sunavovu ʙinost

Ojo musrikon dar zamin gardis nakardaand, to ʙuʙinand sarancomi kasone, ki pes az onon ʙudand, ci guna ʙudaast? On aqvomi guzasta nerumandtar az inho ʙudand va osoru ʙinohoi ʙestare dar zamin padid ovardand, ammo Alloh taolo ononro ʙa [saʙaʙi] gunohonason azoʙ kard, dar hole ki dar ʙaroʙari [azoʙi] Alloh taolo hec [jor va] mudofe'e nadostand
In [kajfar] ʙad-on saʙaʙ ʙud, ki Pajomʙarason nisonahoi ravsan ʙarojason iroa mekardand, vale onon inkor mevarzidand va Alloh taolo niz azoʙason kard. Be gumon, U tavonmandi saxtkajfar ast
Mo Musoro ʙo mu'cizoti xud va daleli qote' firistodem
Ba suji Fir'avn va Homon va Qorun, vale [onon] guftand: «[U] Codugare duruƣgust»

Ammo hangome ki Muso mu'cizoti ilohi va daloili mahkamro az coniʙi Mo ʙar onon nisondod, [Fir'avn va joronas sarkasi kardand va] guftand: «Pisaroni kasonero, ki ʙa Muso imon ovardaand, ʙikused va zanonasonro [ʙaroi kanizi] zinda nigoh dored», vale najrangi kofiron mahkum ʙa fanost

Fir'avn guft: «Biguzored, to Musoro ʙikusam va [cun kasero nadorad] noguzir ast Parvardigorasro ʙa jori ʙixonad [va man az vaj harose nadoram]. Metarsam, ki u dinatonro digargun sozad jo dar in sarzamin taʙohi ʙa ʙor ovarad»
Muso guft: «Man az [sarri] har mutakaʙʙire, ki ʙa ruzi hisoʙ ʙovar nadorad, ʙa Parvardigori xes va Parvardigori sumo panoh meʙaram»

Va mardi mu'mine az xonavodai Fir'avn, ki imonasro pinhon medost, guft: «Ojo mexohed in mardro [faqat ʙa xotiri in curm] ʙikused, ki megujad: «Parvardigoram Alloh taolo ast» va [dar ta'jidi suxanas niz] daloili ravsane az suji Parvardigraton ʙaroi sumo ovardaast? Agar duruƣgu ʙosad, [gunohi] duruƣas ʙar uhdai xudi ust va agar rost gufta ʙosad, [dasti kam] ʙarxe az azoʙhoe, ki va'da medihad, ʙa sumo xohad rasid

Be tardid, Alloh taolo kasero, ki isrofkoru duruƣgust, hidojat namekunad. Ej qavmi man, imruz farmonravoi dar ixtijori sumost va dar in sarzamin sulta dored, vale agar saxtgirii Alloh taolo domangiramon savad, ci kase moro jori xohad kard»? Fir'avn guft: «Man faqat on ciro saloh medonam, megujam va sumoro ʙa rohi rost hidojat mekunam»
On mardi mu'min guft: «Ej qavmi man, metarsam azoʙe hamcun azoʙi aqvomi pesin [ki az pajomʙaronason sarpeci kardand] ʙar saraton ʙijojad
Monandi sevai [azoʙi] qavmi Nuh va Odu Samud va kasone ki ʙa'd az onon ʙudand, dar hole Alloh taolo sitame ʙaroi ʙandagonas namexohad
Va ej qavmi man, ʙar sumo az ruze metarsam, ki mardum ʙa farjod az jakdigar jori mexohand
[Hamon] Ruze, ki hamagi [az tars] ʙa aqiʙ ʙoz megarded va dar ʙaroʙari [mucozoti] Alloh taolo hec muhofize nadored va har kiro Alloh taolo gumroh kunad, hec hidojatgare naxohad dost

Pes az in niz Jusuf ʙo daloili ravsan nazdaton omad, ammo sumo az on ci ʙarojaton ovarda ʙud, pajvasta dar sak ʙuded, to zamone, ki az dunjo raft [va ʙar tardidaton afzuda sud]. On goh gufted: «Alloh taolo hargiz pas az vaj pajomʙarero maʙ'us naxohad kard». Alloh taolo isrofkori ʙadgumonro in guna gumroh mesozad

Kasone, ki dar mavridi ojoti ilohi, ʙe on ki dalele dosta ʙosad, ʙa mucodala ʙarmexezad, [raftorason] nazdi Alloh taolo va mu'minin saxt nopisand ast. Alloh taolo in guna ʙar dili har mutakaʙʙiri xudkoma muhr [-i ƣaflat] mezanad
Fir'avn [ʙa vaziras] guft: «Ej Homon, ʙaroi man ʙinoi ʙalande ʙisoz, sojad ʙa rohhoe ʙirasam

Rohhoe dar osmonho [ki maro to Arsi ilohi ʙiʙarad], to ʙa ma'ʙudi Muso ʙingaram [va az U ogoh savam], harcand, man qat'an uro duruƣgu mepindoram». Bad-in son zistii kirdori Fir'avn [dar nazars] orosta gast va az roh [-i haq] ʙozmond va najrangi Fir'avn ʙa zijon va taʙohi ancomid
On mardi mu'min guft: «Ej qavmi man, az man pajravi kuned, to sumoro ʙa rohi rost hidojat kunam
Ej qavmi man, in zindagii dunjo ʙahrae [andak va zudguzar] ast va oxirat saroi covidon ast
Har ki kori ʙade murtakiʙ savad, ʙa tanosuʙi on kajfar xohad did va mardon va zanoni mu'min va nekukor ʙa ʙihist vorid mesavand va dar on co az ne'mati ʙesumor ʙarxurdor xohand sud
Ej qavmi man, ci suda, ki man sumoro ʙa rohi nacot da'vat mekunam, vale sumo maro ʙa otas faro mexoned

Maro da'vat mekuned, ki Allohro inkor kunam va cizero, ki [dar qudrat] ʙo Alloh taolo sarik gardonam, ki hec ittiloe az on nadoram, dar hole ki man sumoro ʙa suji [Parvardigori] sikastnopazir va omurzgor faro mexonam
Noguzir on ci maro ʙad-on da'vat mekuned, dar dunjo va oxirat [tavoni icoʙati] duoero nadorad va ʙozgasti mo ʙa pesgohi Alloh taolo ast va isrofkoron [dar kufru gunoh] duzaxi hastand
Ba zudi suxanoni maro ʙa jod xohed ovard va man kori xudro ʙa Alloh taolo voguzor mekunam, zero Alloh taolo nisʙat ʙa [kirdori] ʙandagon ʙinost»
Pas, Alloh taolo uro az oseʙi dasisai onon hifz namud va azoʙi saxt domangiri fir'avnijon sud
Hamon otase, ki [dar qaʙrhojason] ʙomdodu somgoh ʙar on arza mesavand va ruze, ki qijomat ʙarpo gardad [farmon merasad]: «Fir'avnijonro dar saxttarin azoʙ vorid kuned»
On goh ki dar otasi duzax kasmakas [mucodala] mekunand, mardumoni zerdast ʙa rohʙaroni gumrohgar megujand: «Mo pajravi sumo ʙudem, ojo mumkin ast ʙaxse az azoʙi otasro az mo dur kuned?»
Rohʙaroni gumrohgar megujand: «Be tardid, hamai mo dar otas xohem ʙud. Alloh taolo mijoni ʙandagonas dovari kardaast»
Va kasone, ki dar otasand, ʙa nigahʙononi duzax megujand: «Az Parvardigoraton ʙixohed, ki ʙaroi jak ruz in azoʙro az mo ʙardorad»

Onon posux medihand: «Magar pajomʙaronaton nisonahoi ravsan ʙar sumo iroa nakardand»? Duzaxijon megujand: «Bale». Va ma'muron megujand: «Pas, [ʙe natica] darxost kuned, ki darxosti kofiron [mardudu] taʙoh ast»
Be gumon, Mo pajomʙaroni xud va ahli imonro dar zindagii dunjo va ruze, ki guvohon [ʙa sahodat] ʙarmexezand, jori mekunem
Ruze, ki uzrxohii sitamgaron sude ʙa holason naxohad dost. Onon az rahmati ilohi ʙa durand va dusvorii azoʙi oxiratro [dar pes] dorand
Mo ʙa Muso [maqomi] hidojat ʙaxsidem va Bani Isroilro vorisoni Tavrot qaror dodem
[Kitoʙe, ki] Baroi xiradmandon hidojatu pand ast
Pas, [ej pajomʙar, ʙar ozori musrikon] sikeʙo ʙos, [ki] jaqinan, va'dai Alloh taolo rost ast va ʙaroi gunohat omurzis ʙixoh va Parvardigoratro somgoh va ʙomdod ʙa poki sitois kun

Kasone, ki dar mavridi ojoti ilohi, ʙe on ki dalele dar ixtijorason ʙosad, ʙa mucodala ʙarmexezand, dar dilhojason [ƣururu] takaʙʙurest, ki hargiz ʙad-on naxohand rasid, pas, [az sarri eson] ʙa Alloh taolo panoh ʙiʙar, ki ʙa rosti, U sunavovu ʙinost
Musallaman, ofarinisi osmonho va zamin ʙuzurgtar az ofarinisi insonhost [pas, ʙarpo kardani qijomat ʙaroi Alloh taolo dusvor nest], vale ʙestari mardum namedonand
Hargiz noʙino va ʙino ʙaroʙar nestand, va mu'minoni nakukor ʙo ʙadkoron jakson naxohand ʙud, [vale] iddai kame az sumo pand mepazired
Hec tardide dar in nest, ki ruzi qijomat faro merasad, vale ʙestari mardum imon nameovarand
Parvardigoraton farmud: «Maro ʙixoned, to [duoi] sumoro icoʙat kunam. Kasone, ki az iʙodati Man sarkasi mekunand, ʙa zudi ʙo xori ʙa cahannam vorid mesavand»

Alloh taolo ast, ki saʙro ʙarojaton padid ovard, to dar on oromis joʙed va ruzro ravsaniʙaxs [qaror dod, to ʙa talos pardozed]. Ba rosti, Alloh taolo nisʙat ʙa mardum [lutfu] ʙaxsis dorad, vale ʙestari mardum sipos nameguzorand
In ast Alloh taolo Parvardigori sumo, [ki] ofarinandai har mavcude [ast]. Hec ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] cuz U nest, pas, ci guna [az parastisi U] munharif mesaved
Ba hamin surat kasone, ki ojoti ilohiro inkor mekunand, niz [az haq] munharif megardand

Alloh taolo ast, ki zaminro qarorgoh va osmonro sarpanohaton muqarrar dost va sumoro sakle ʙaxsid va saklhojatonro zeʙo ʙiofarid va az ne'mathoi pokiza ʙa sumo ruzi dod. In ast Alloh taolo – Parvardigori sumo, pas, purʙarakatu ʙuzurgvor ast Alloh taolo, ki Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Alloh taolo zinda [va pojanda] ast va ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] cuz U nest, pas, Uro ʙo xulusi e'tiqod ʙixoned. Sitois va sipos maxsusi Alloh taolo-Parvardigori cahonijon ast

[Ej pajomʙar] Bigu: «Man az parastisi afrode, ki sumo ʙa coji Alloh taolo [ʙa nijois] mexoned, nahj sudaam, zero nisonahoi ravsane az coniʙi Parvardigoram ʙa man rasidaast va farmon joftaam, ki [tanho] dar ʙaroʙari Parvardigori cahonijon taslim ʙosam»

Ust, ki sumoro az xok va sipas [taji marohili muxtalif] az nutfa va on goh xuni ʙasta [canini iʙtidoi] ofarid, sipas sumoro [ʙa surati] kudake [ʙa dunjo] meovarad va imkon medihad, to ʙa haddi rusd [va kamoli neru] ʙirased. Sipas [solho zindagi mekuned, to] solxurda mesaved. Barxe az sumo ducori margi zudras xohand sud va [ʙa guruhe digar imkon medihad], to ʙa acali muajjan ʙirased, ʙosad, ki ʙiandesed
Ust, ki zinda mekunad va memironad va hangome ki cizero mexohad, tanho ʙa u megujad: «Mavcud sav», pas, [ʙedirang] mavcud mesavad
Ojo nadidi kasone, ki dar ʙorai ojoti ilohi mucodala mekunand, ci guna [az rohi haq] munharif megardand
Kasone, ki kitoʙi [osmoni] va pajomi pajomʙaroni moro duruƣ sumurdand, ʙa zudi [naticai kirdorasonro] xohand donist
On goh ki ƣul va zancir ʙar gardanason qaror girifta va kasida mesavand
[Iʙtido] Dar oʙi cusomada va sipas dar otasi duzax afruxta mesavand
On goh ʙa eson gufta mesavad: «Buthoe, ki sariki [Alloh taolo] qaror medoded, kuco hastand

[Hamon ma'ʙudone, ki] ʙa coji Alloh taolo [iʙodat mekarded]. Onon gujand: «Az [nazari] mo nopadid sudand, gui mo hargiz pes az in cizero [ʙa parastis] namexondem». In guna Alloh taolo kofironro gumroh mekunad
In [azoʙ] az on cihat ast, ki ʙa nohaq dar zamin sodmoni va sarmasti mekarded va faxr mefuruxted
[Aknun] Az darhoi cahannm vorid saved va covidona dar on co ʙimoned. Va [ʙa rosti, ki] cojgohi mutakaʙʙiron ci ʙad [cojgohe] ast

[Ej pajomʙar, ʙar ozori musrikon] Sikeʙo ʙos, ki va'dai ilohi haq ast va agar ʙarxe az mucozothoero, ki ʙa onon va'da dodaem, [dar zindagi] ʙa tu ʙinamoem jo [pes az nuzuli azoʙ] coni turo ʙigirem, dar har hol ʙa pesgohi mo ʙozgardonda mesavand [va rohi gureze az azoʙ nadorand]

Pes az tu niz pajomʙarone firistodaem, ki [sarguzasti] ʙarxe az esonro ʙarojat hikojat kardaem va ʙarxe digarro hikojat nakardaem va hec rasule nametavonist ʙiduni farmoni ilohi mu'cizae iroa kunad va on goh ki farmoni Alloh taolo [ʙaroi podos va kajfar] faro rasad, ʙa haq va adolat dovari xohad sud va ʙotilandeson zijonkor xohand ʙud
Alloh taolo ast, ki cahorpojonro ʙarojaton ofarid, to az ʙarxe ʙaroi savori va az ʙarxe ʙaroi taƣzija istifoda kuned
Va ʙaroi sumo dar onho sudhoi digare niz hast va niz ʙaroi on ki savor ʙar onho ʙa maqsade, ki dar dil dored, ʙirased va ʙar onho va ʙar kistiho [ʙa har co ki mexohed] muntaqil mesaved
Alloh taolo nisonahoi [qudratu tadʙiri] xudro ʙa sumo nison medihad, pas, kadom jak az nisonahoi ilohiro inkor mekuned

Ojo musrikon dar zamin gardis nakardaand, to ʙuʙinand sarancomi kasone, ki pes az onon ʙudand, ci guna ʙudaast? On aqvomi guzasta sumorason az inho afzuntar ʙud va osoru ʙinohoi ʙestare dar zamin padid ovarda ʙudand, ammo [ hangomi nuzuli azoʙ] dastovardason sude ʙa holason nadost
Hangome ki pajomʙaronason ʙo nisonahoi ravsan ʙa suroƣason omadand, ʙa donisu kordonii xud sarmast [va az tavhid rujgardon] sudand va hamon azoʙe, ki masxaraas mekardand, domangirason sud
Pas, cun azoʙi Moro didand, guftand: «Tanho ʙa Alloh taolo imon ovardem va ma'ʙudonero, ki sariki U qaror doda ʙudem, inkor mekunem»

Ammo imon ovardanason ʙa hangomi musohidai azoʙ hec sude nadost. In sunnati ilohi [ki dar hangomi azoʙ tavʙai kase pazirufta namegardad, hamvora] dar mavridi ʙandagoni Alloh taolo cori ʙudaast va dar in co kofiron zijonkor sudand
Ho, mim
[In Qur'on] Az sui Allohi ʙaxsandai mehruʙon nozil sudaast
Kitoʙest, ki ojotas ʙa zaʙoni araʙi ʙaroi mardume, ki medonand, ʙa sevoi va ravsani ʙajon sudaast
[Kitoʙe] Basoratdihanda va ʙimdihanda ast, vale ʙestari mardum rujgardonand va [haqoiqro] namesunavand

Musrikon guftand: «Dilhoi mo nisʙat ʙa on ci moro da'vat mekuni, dar pusise [az ʙetafovuti] qaror dorad va dar gushojamon sangini ast va mijoni mo va tu fosila ast, pas, tu ʙa kori xud masƣul ʙos va mo niz ʙa kori xud»

[Ej pajomʙar, ʙa onon] ʙigu: «Man faqat ʙasare hamcun sumo hastam [ʙo in tafovut], ki ʙa man vahj mesavad: «Ma'ʙudi sumo ma'ʙudest jagona, pas, ʙa U ruj ovared va az U omurzis ʙixohed va voj ʙa holi musrikon!»
Onon, ki zakot namepardozand va oxiratro inkor mekunand
[Vale] Mu'minoni nekukor podose ʙepojon dorand
Bigu: Ojo on [Xoliqi tavonmand]- ero, ki zaminro dar du ruz ofarid, inkor mekuned va ʙarojas hamtojone qoil mesaved? In [Ofaridgori jaktost, ki] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
U taji cahor ruz ʙar ruji zamin kuhhoi ustuvorro padid ovard va dar on xajru ʙarakati farovon nihod va rizqu ruzii onro durust ʙa andozai nijozi taqozokunandagon muqaddar namud
On goh ʙa osmon pardoxt, dar hole ki [hanuz] ʙa surati gaz [dud] ʙud. Va ʙa osmonu zamin guft: «Xoh- noxoh az dari taslim daroed». On du guftand: «Bo majl az dari taslim daromadem»

Sipas on tudai gazro ʙa surati haft osmon dar du ruz ofarid va ʙa har osmone ʙarnomaasro vahj kard va osmoni dunjoro ʙo caroƣhoe [az sitoragon] orostem va [az sarri sajotin] hifz namudem. In ast taqdiri [Parvardigori] sikastnopaziri dono»
[Ej pajomʙar] Agar onon [az pazirisi islom] ruj gardonand, ʙigu: «Ba sumo dar ʙorai soiqae naziri [on ci] qavmi Odu Samud [-ro az poj darovard] husdor mediham»

On goh ki pajomʙaroni ilohi pajopaj ʙa suroƣason meomadand, [ʙo in pajom] ki: «Cuz Allohro naparasted», onon [dar posux] meguftand: «Agar Parvardigoramon mexost, [pajomi hidojatgare ʙifiristad] faristagone nozil mekard. Mo pajomero, ki sumo ma'muri [iʙloƣi] on hasted, ʙovar namekunem»

Ammo [qavmi] Od ʙa nohaq dar zamin takaʙʙur mevarzidand va meguftand: «Ci kase nerumandtar az most»? Ojo namedonistand Alloh taolo [on Xoliqi jakto]-e, ki ononro ofarida, nerumandtar az onon ast? Vale [ʙo sitezu gardankasi] ojoti Moro inkor mekardand

Sarancom tundʙode sardu saxt dar ruzhoe sum ʙa onon firistodem, to azoʙi rasvoi [va sangin]-ro dar zindagii dunjo ʙa onon ʙicasonem, vale azoʙi oxirat rasvokunandatar ast va [az hec su] jori naxohand sud
Va ammo qavmi Samudro niz hidojat kardem, vale onon kurdiliro ʙa hidojat tarceh dodand va ʙa [sazoi] dastovardason soiqai azoʙi xorkunanda ononro faro girift
Va kasonero, ki imon ovarda va [az gunohu nofarmoni] parvo mekardand, nacot dodem
